1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya badz+ra tan+t+ra rAng / bod skad du/ dpal
1b2(rgyud): gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'a
1b3(rgyud): lo sdom pa ru// gsang ba'i 'khor lo mi gsung ba// bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs/ 
1b4(rgyud): phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo
1b5(rgyud): spyan bzangs ring // gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin du zag/ rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs
2a1(rgyud): ga/ khyod kyis ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gleng ba slang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
2a2(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// de'i rdo rje ji ltar lags// 
2a3(rgyud): deyi pad+ma ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba'i pho brang dang po ste/ 
2a4(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste/ 
2a5(rgyud): deyi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir// ban pa gsang ba bde skyong ste// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yin// de rnams don ni gsang ba ste/ 
2b1(rgyud): gsang // rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba// phan po gnas pa'i rten yin to// dpe na khang rten ka ba bzhin// rgyud kyi doni ni rgyun yin no// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sol ba lo'u ste gnyis pa'o/ 
2b2(rgyud): lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// re re'i dbye ba ma 'tshal bas// 'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du lhung // 'khrig pa'i zug du mi bzad pas// bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
2b3(rgyud): pa// gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug/ 'dab ma'i grangs ni gnyis 'gyur ro// rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes// gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis// brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no// rig pa'i pho brang
2b4(rgyud): / 'dab ma lnga// rigs ni me tog lta bu'o// b+ha ga rab 'bring gsum yin te// rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snum gyi ri lu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo la bskul la// gzhad kha na
2b5(rgyud): mas bdug/ gsang ba nas kyang sngam gyis bdug/ de nas rnal 'byor po 'am mos// rtse de sor mos legs par btsal// ring thung ched ni sor gnyis nas// sor brgyad par ni gar gnas pa// shes rab tu
2b6(rgyud): gache chung dang // de bzhin b+ha ga drang dro dang // bu rnams ci zhing bde ba rung // de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// b+ha ga chen bde bachung // b+ha ga chen chung ngu b+ha// chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs// grang na
2b7(rgyud): bzhin 'gro bar bya// chu rnams chen chung bar bya// 'di 'dri b+hag gang la yod// bud med 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das// thabs kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang // ring ba dang ni thung ba ste/ 
2b8(rgyud): rab ji bzhin thabs la'o// de 'i gnas su gzung bar bya// gsang ba rdo rje rgud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// e be rma
3a1(rgyud): dbus gang du// bde ba'i khyad par tshal ba la// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu dben pa'i gnas btsal la// bza'
3a2(rgyud): can sna tshogs dang // btung bzhim po sang po dang/ gur gum la sogs dri nim dang // shin tu 'jam pa'i stan bting la// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// dri zhim thig le rer bya// rnal 'byor pa 'i
3a3(rgyud): gnas lnga ru// de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya// de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// e las gru gsum gti ring bsam// de yi nang du be las ni// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam// de yi dbus su la'o/ 
3a4(rgyud): losas// laja mo'i dbus su migadogad// de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang // hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga bas sa// oM lam rdo rje mgo bor bsam// 'bralas rdo rje phrag pa sas// de nas bde ba'i stan thog du/ 
3a5(rgyud): rnams gsas kyi ste// yan lag thabs dang sbyong bdang sa// 'kho mo nyi buH dgul// chags pa skye ba'i dris byug/ bde bskye ba'i gas thos nas// bde'i stan la 'duganas ni// thabs kyis gnas das
3a6(rgyud): yang bya// shes rab gyis kyang gnas ldar bya// thabs kyi shes rab pad+mal//  rgyab pad+ma rgyas su gsug/ zhes rab kyis kyang de bzhin no// chags lnga ste 'i'i rtags 'byung ste// de nas gcig gis
3a7(rgyud): gyur mag/ sa dpa gsong pas/ shes grang pa gnyis brkyang nas// ba pon thabs ldan kyis bskyod nas// ma rtags kyi bstan pa'i phyir// shes 'im la rtags gas pa 'byud/ 
3a8(rgyud): mi rtags/ mi 'od ga don pa shegags/ shes pa rgyas 'thugs pa rtags/ 'din g.yang 'i dkyi la // desas blo dag gnyi ma thong / nad kyi zug du sa cad
3b1(rgyud): 'do / 'din gsang ba'i bdud kyis yin// byam dkyil ma'i bcwo paman// gas ba'i dkyil mtsha nyid sa gnas// skyon thog la so gas bya yin// gas pa'i rdo rje hud 'di na// kun gyis thasu
3b2(rgyud): 'gyur te// glega'a'am sor ni bcu gnyis bya// glegs pas gsang pa'i gnas sus// yongs su srid pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'gar yis mthong gi gnan pa sa// gsang bston pa'i bla mar// sangs rgyas nyid pas
3b3(rgyud): btsud pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu// gsungs pa'i spyod thabs kun byas nas// lnga bcunas bzung stong gi bar// rnal 'byor ma kun pade med kyang // spyong thabs mkhas pas bskyod byas nas/ 
3b4(rgyud): gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam// sbyor thabs mi shes sbyor byas pas// rlung mkhris pad kan kun nas skye// shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste// sbyor babs mkhas pa'i shes rab ma// thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par
3b5(rgyud): bya// spyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma yi gsang la brten// gsang la bsten pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ming srid tshul lam rje 'bangs tshul// pa spad tshul la
3b6(rgyud): gtan grob tshul// gzhan gyi mi rig ngocha bsdug/ dben pa'i gnas su snang dbya// gal tem bsnyen dam tshig nyams// tshe di nyid la dmyal bar srug/ lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// thabs med rnal
3b7(rgyud): 'byor de kya lags// bde ba spyad med de ltar lags// phyag rgyam bsnyen de kya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bde ba la gnas gsang pa'i don// khyod kyis ngor mdza da nga yis bshad/ 
3b8(rgyud): bzas che shes nas 'byor dang // stan pang gcig la pa 'dug ste// 'dod cags bsam pa yang bya// gas nyid 'dran gyu // 'jig rten pal pa'i 'dod chags te// gi nas man med byas
4a1(rgyud): 'dod chags spyod pa shal ma 'i// lcags kyi so ni bcu drug pa// yar la mdzeg cing ma la 'bag// thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba dzod// rdo ky-i hU~Mdza~MHbas mkhas pas bston/ 
4a2(rgyud): thabs las ni bde ba skye// de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba khyad med lus zungs nyams// rlung khris pad kan kun nas skye// las kyi phyag brgya rtag tu bsten// phyag brgya ma bsten dam tshig nyams// 
4a3(rgyud): phyag brgya bsten pa'i dus su yang // rnal 'byor ming sring brda yis mtshon// gang shig mdzub mo ston pa na// 'ongs samazhes ni 'dri ba yin// so ra ma gnyis ni ston pa dang // mthe bo drang por ston pa dang // des
4a4(rgyud): srin lag drang por stod// rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste// pad+ma ga k+ko la zhes bya// de ltar ma byas dam chog nyams// brda yis bye brag ma lus pa// sam bu Ta ru shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ 
4a5(rgyud): pad+ma dga' ba'i gnas// da ru gzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab kyi dbugs dang shes pas gzung // dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas ka
4a6(rgyud): bdu drug cang // gcig sa pa sgoms ga /  zhin ni rnam pa she// can ga can gyis shes pa skye// gas te du ma yin na// 'khor ba byung pas nga shisas//  ma
4a7(rgyud): posdu// lce yis byang chub sems blangs la// ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// shes rab bskyod papas 'ba' zhig gam// thabs kyi
4a8(rgyud): pal zhig gas// napa khyo sa dang rnal 'byor pa// bde ba gyud pa med ma// ni mi ba'i ltu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsam pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang saspyod// rgya
4b1(rgyud): ni thabs kyis bya// de las padang khyad par 'phags// dper na dang dang snal ma bzhin// thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong/ shes rab dang gyi sham bu tsam// de phyir rnal 'byor mA hud// rnal 'byor ma yi 'grub par gsungs// 
4b2(rgyud): rkad kyi nang na mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang // khrus dang bsrung ba la sogs pa// gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste/ 
4b3(rgyud): ye shes lnga li spros dang bral// de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tshom yongs su zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas
4b4(rgyud): na po'i ros gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lalnga lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gas
4b5(rgyud): da kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // paN+Di tarat+na badz+ra dang / lo ts+tshab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ku h+yas prats+tshin+da tad+hA rA dA/ bod skad du/ dpal gas
4b6(rgyud): baM thabs cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / 
4b7(rgyud): thugs rdo rje btsun ma'o b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ji snying po la sogs pa'i 'khong rnams kyis g.yon gyi phyogs nas skor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa
4b8(rgyud): mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzid// gsang ba zhes pa 'i ltar lags// de mi gcod pa di ltar lags// hud kyi don niji ltar lags// de'i rgyal po'a' di ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das
5a1(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba nas pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bus dbang dang 'brel pa'i// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brten par bsgom pa ni// snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam
5a2(rgyud): tog rnams// sAng pying dayis gsungs pa yin// dege khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang ba zong ted la sogs pa// rgyud gzhan du ni dayis gsungs// rten dang brten pa'i bye brag la// deng po rten gyi dgongs pa
5a3(rgyud): thugs ka'i yi ge hUM las ni// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po'i me 'phros pas// gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam// gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dus gsum 'joms pa dag
5a4(rgyud): pa'i don// logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te// lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i dor// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab// de phyir rgya chen dgos
5a5(rgyud): pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting ring ba ru dgongs pas bshad// de nas thugs ka'i hUM las yang // hUM 'phros
5a6(rgyud): las rdo rje dkrun// rdong kur du gyur pa lag// dang 'i tshal bar chad dang // gnyis pa par ba'i bar cad de// bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phye la bgegs dang na ga bgegs// phyi mas tshe 'i bar chad de// ma
5a7(rgyud): gi thar pa'i bar chad byed// bar chad rnam pa gnyis bsrung ba// rdo rje gur kyi dgongs pa'i dor// baM las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyibs ni klags lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang // mi rtog pa ni skye ba la/ 
5a8(rgyud): dbang du byed pas dbang gis don// ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang // chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa yin par nga yis gsungs// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum drag po'i dan
5b1(rgyud): yin// rdo rtsa gsum su gsum don// ba las chu yi dkyil 'khor te// zlum po smras pa ni par gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i lanamag 'an// mi las gser kyis gzhi ste// gru bani byas pa'i rang bzhin te/ 
5b2(rgyud): rnge rtse lnga ye shes la// de steng re rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam sa rabargyad kyis dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// du bzod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yor// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// de ma
5b3(rgyud): / brag rnam rtog yang // bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas// shing rnams rims bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog me dge bcu 'i don// 'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dge
5b4(rgyud): 'dod chags ni sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'joms phyer gru brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi rgyal gyis// lus dang ngag gi sems can gyis// don mad pyir ni mar sprin dag
5b5(rgyud): nang dgra sang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang // snyan nas rgud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khag/ b+h+rUM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyis dang
5b6(rgyud): yongs su gyur bas rnam snang sku// phyi nas bsdus pas nang du gsal// de bzhin na nas phyiraru ste// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// tshon chen sna lnga spu lnga 'don// kha dog su ni rigs ka'i don// gru bzhi tshapa
5b7(rgyud): pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// sogs bzhi bsdu pa'i dngos pa ste// sgo ba ni dran pa nyer gzhag yin// ka ba brgyad ni rnam par brgyad// gdung bzhi ye shes pani ye don// tA ran la sogs pa kun// stos
5b8(rgyud): sogs pa len par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ne// pad+ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad+ma'i gdad// de ste nyim zlab ste// ba
6a1(rgyud): da shes rab gnyis kyi bad// da tsho tsho dang bdag gas// rnam rtog 'doms phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag pan ldan gtso gdan//  mar ngagadan du myer// ma
6a2(rgyud): lag yin pa'i phyir// dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yis// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung rdzus pa'i tshul// dperan
6a3(rgyud): gting las ni nya// rkyen las skyes pa drod gsher skyes// dper na nyi mas pad+ma bzhin// spro ning bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo las bangs bzhin no// sbyar ba las byung mngal skyes tshul// yar la skye
6a4(rgyud): ci mar lags so// dper na sgra tshil las ni gzugs// pho brang rnam par snang mdzad de// rjes su skyed pa he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod papo
6a5(rgyud): / bod grub pa'o// bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med// yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa 'am bsgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring ba ma ste// rab kyis yong
6a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa yi// bsgom pa 'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs// 'bring gis gtso ba la la yum yin// tham me dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum cu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sprob/ 
6a7(rgyud): 'bring po las kyang de bzhin te// gnas brtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// za' ba sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di lis bstan pa shin tu
6a8(rgyud): go du gas sa lams can kyag// rnam pa pan seMnas la gyi// rimams pa ni na te// dutsa tshu ni shin su ba/ byed da ni sngags kyi // gzugs brnyan kyim mang bya ba na/ 
6b1(rgyud): nas na yin te// ni nyid gas 'a gas pa 'dod// las sa mad pyad do// gzugs nan kyis mtsha bya sa dan// na nyid do//  da lda nas sa// 
6b2(rgyud): 'drabs la// lnga'am drug gas sum bcu 'dun// gams nayon ste 'og rlos sogs// bla ma'i gsalas shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// tsam cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba'i// yongs sa rdzogs pa
6b3(rgyud): ltar lags// bskyed pa zhes bya ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar lags// lha spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa' bos bdag la ba
6b4(rgyud): du gsolan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkara' sprul pa// s+yAng cu rtsa bdun lang dag tu// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// dpyir 'bras ba ldan 'gro ba'i// rkyen gtso bor sang pa yid// he ru kar byang gcig
6b5(rgyud): hA rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyu nor pa las ma yin te// gro las nas kyi myu gu min// ma tshang ba las ma yin te// 'bru nyams pa las spu gu med
6b6(rgyud): rgyu med pa las ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri// rgyu de rkyen med pa las min// nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang // lha yi rnal 'byor la gar
6b7(rgyud): bas// bskyed pa zhes na gsungs pa yin// phyi dang nang du du ma cha// de yi rim par bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // byams dang bragab med pa dang // bla ga ba bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos
6b8(rgyud): dbang su gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin mtshan bzhi du gsungs pa yin// mtshams kyang bani ru shes par bya// dbyug gu mu chod 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 6
7a1(rgyud): dang mtshams ni mnyam par gsungs// mtshams kyi tshed rnal 'byor ba// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis// lha rnams rdzogs par sgo byas la// mang me gcig las gnyis kyi tshum// 
7a2(rgyud): pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste// rjes thob spyod padun bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa las// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnas/ gsang pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba las/ 
7a3(rgyud): rgyan dang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnas// rdo rje rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rags// spyod pa gnang ba yis gsungs// sher rab ye shes dang 'brel pas// gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste/ 
7a4(rgyud): khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnag/ lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam sri ste// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir lha med spyod pa spang // srin po khros pa
7a5(rgyud): spyod pa'o// spyod med lta ba'ang spang ba ste// dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing // phung sogs nam snang la sogs la// brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin// des na ste spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chen bzhengs kyang ma
7a6(rgyud): par 'azhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs// rdo rje snying pos yang nus pa// bdud ci zhes padi ltar lags// de mi spyod pa ji skar lags// de ma yon tan de ltar 'byung / rgyan la sogs pa
7a7(rgyud): rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang po dpyi yi bdud rtsi bsten// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha snga la// lcags
7a8(rgyud): lda ni dgod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzaH/ si hA mi bskyod lud skam blag// bcu gnyis bcu drug dang par 'dzag/ he ru ka dang rnam snang dang // yud nam snying po blang bar bya// yang gying dpas
7b1(rgyud): brgyad dang btun bcos la// ma du su gsungs// seng ga'i gzugs ni dgang po cag/ lus ngag sngo ni nyes pa med// 'di ni na mi smram pa'i rten// glang po blang sa chen po ste// gta
7b2(rgyud): mi rgyu nyid las// gartsil so dam 'byung ba'i sha/ ba lang gi la bldan pa'i sha/ rta ni ta'i rgyal po ste// kha dog dkar min dmar ba min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur na/ mi skye ba 'dun pa'i sha/ lus ngag yid la mkhas pa
7b3(rgyud): brtag/ 'pha' ba'i snod ni dum bu gcig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'drang tha ma'i mtshan pa ni// 'bar dang dud pa spo ba rnams// mtshan ma phyi yi yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni nas chen sel// skad ma phyir na
7b4(rgyud): dngos grub med// skad phyung bas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin// dril can bug dbu'am nas// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// a ba d+hU tI dbugs chud pas/ 
7b5(rgyud): ste gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin// sih+la ga pur dbus na gnas// 'og gi drug pa rgyu ba yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste// spa dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dpal
7b6(rgyud): dang po// bskyed pa'i rims la legs gnas shig/ rigs su 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug pa'i bdud ci sbyin// las dang po la phyinang gnyis// 'di 'i nus pa'ang dus ste// skra dgar med cing nas tog 'jom/ 
7b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas// lnga pa goms par gyur pa yis// drug pa gzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni dbus su bzhugs// lte ba'i gnas su dbugs gnas
7b8(rgyud): // steng gi drug pazin pa yin// 'ad mi nus pa 'ang dum ste// sred pa med cing yang pa'o// 'dab chags rgyal ba de brten du// nam ma khar 'phur zheng spang ba mad// mchog dang chad pa'i dbul gnas pa// 'og she
8a1(rgyud): pa yin par bshad// gang bag mchags gsungs pa // 'dus pa'ang rnam sa// dras can bug 'gag par byed// rgyan gyis dang pon sdang 'joms// du rjod can pa mi rnamag
8a2(rgyud): du 'dum pa'i rim pa ste// bdud rtsis rnam tog la sogs 'angabs// phrirnams shi ni dran mong ba// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdorje sring pos yang gsol pa// drug pa nas pa di wA / 
8a3(rgyud): zag mchog ni de lta bu// 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bo bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gabs g.yon steng 'og bani las no// lnga ba nas ma khA sh+tsa
8a4(rgyud): lnga ba rang zizhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral pa'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas//  ba bde 'i chen po 'thung // de min dang bzhin med pa dag/ 
8a5(rgyud): sgo la drug pa yin// de pyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang // bani bsngon du song ba yis// rdza yongs su rdzogs pa bsgos// dper na 'angs kyi dngom pol// gser bkrung tu'i dus pa yis// ma nyidag
8a6(rgyud): du gyur ba ste/ mangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang // lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// lo dang zla ba zla ba byed// nyin nag dus drug du ma gnyis la// skad cig re
8a7(rgyud): drug pa 'byung // las dang po yi spyod yul min// dper na chu yi snod nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig gzhag pa// chu ru nyams su myong ba las// gcig shos nyams su myong med// mul brten nas
8a8(rgyud): dri yag/ nyams su myong bar pyod pa ste// de bzhin spos bcas lnga pa la// rten nas spros med drug pa 'byung // rgyud gzhan du ni ngayis gsungs// mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad dam// sa brgyad non nas mngon
8b1(rgyud): ldan// las kyi phyag brgya yongs su spangs// ye shes phyag brgyal gnas shing// phyag rgya can po la 'jug pa// 'di ni gang zag sa tshogasan to// mdapes drug pazhin pa bshad// 'dod chags rnas pa
8b2(rgyud): // nam dag kya ngan 'das par gsung sa// de nas gsang ba gnyis pasang // gsang pa'i dbang dang shes ste// na ci 'brel ba ba tsha da// dang ba ste ba rgyal gyi// bka' pos sushes pa bya// dpa
8b3(rgyud): byang chub sems su shes// 'tshong mi'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang // de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// tshangs mdo bar du sor mo tshad// bcu can pani dang brgyad yin te// sor ga
8b4(rgyud): la ni 'khor loro// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin len// dbang gis gnas kyi 'khor lo'i gnas// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdom la gzhad kha rlung // song gsum sor ba ni mkhas pas brtag/ 
8b5(rgyud): gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o// sor 'ani tam grin gnas yin te/ sor brgyad gsang babad skyong gnas// rnab 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ba'i// lus kyi rten gyi bye brag sa / 
8b6(rgyud): na bcu brgyad nyid las// brgyan ni gsang ba'i 'khor mo gnas// bani bcus ni 'kho ba gzhan// bla ma'i gas nas shes par bya// khams 'danam tshigs dbyug du ste// bye dang dang du mkham pas
8b7(rgyud): dzu ma snang rnam bya gnyis// dang por 'khob po gnyis pa// rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa bzhi du gsungs// rgyan la gnyis te gas ba ba ni// rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni gnyis/ 
8b8(rgyud): li nyi shu bzhi// 'khom ma bzhi du sbas pa ste// bram tshogs nang mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag gzhan du spel zhing daphyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i don la rgya
9a1(rgyud): / skur ba 'debs// gsang sngags par gcod rnal 'byor gzhan la gshe/ 'di ni mnar med sems dmyal chen por skye// sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig rdzogs che'i tshad// 'di la sras kyi
9a2(rgyud): cad ga// ngamasas pa lags/ dpying rgyud gan la// rlud na sa sa da// sa gnyis // drug bani zang su thugs//  sa gnyi
9a3(rgyud): zung // bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// skye gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor smras// gsang ba bde skyong lte bar sbas// bcu drug las
9a4(rgyud): zung 'gyur ba// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin// bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su sbam// mchi
9a5(rgyud): ba longs spyod 'khor lo ru// ro drug la ni longs spyod pas// ro ma longs spyod 'khor lor sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon cha gnyis cha// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa
9a6(rgyud): yin// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi cha// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// 
9a7(rgyud): mdom ma ni me ma sbas// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ru// chos kun rig pas rig pa sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni thug/ sum su rtsa gnyis grangs kyi smras// drug cu rtsa ban las ni bzhi// bcu drug grangs pa
9a8(rgyud): sbas pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// gnad kha rlung ni rlung las sbas// gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas// 'khor lo ril 'khor lo bzhi// phyi ru srog ki na
9b1(rgyud): par 'khyud// chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur// lte bar rol pa bde chen zla// rnam par thar dang ster pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying
9b2(rgyud): chos kyi sku yin te// rnam thar la sogs de bzhin no// mgrin pa longs spyod de dang 'dra// bde chen sprul pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan rnams stong la stong pa 'og/ dang po'i bde chen kha sbyor yin// rnam thar steng la dpe
9b3(rgyud): 'og/ 'di chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin// gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya// stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor bcu// rlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang // me ni gos dkar rang bzhin
9b4(rgyud): zung rtsa gsum ni drod kyis gang // rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga yi mtshan nyid la// brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad// lnga la kA li dang po lnga// rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga// rta mgrin da
9b5(rgyud): yig gakhon dang galas// a gnyis mthar gzhag 'dab dgu yin// gsang ba'i 'de skyong 'khor lo ni// ma ni nga ba ni dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang // 
9b6(rgyud): stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// shal gnas nas tshil bu skyed// nang gi brgya dang nyi shu ni// tshil la gnas nas rkang skyed pa'o// gsang gsum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rus par gnas shing gzur skyed// de kho ni
9b7(rgyud): ne// gsang bar gan sa shing bde ba skyed// khang pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// khang pa thegapang ba 'bum// khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// grangs ni 'thum du shes par bya/ 
9b8(rgyud): dadags ca rgyal lag/ srin gyi gas ni grangs su gsungs// de seMn gsum las// 'ad cags myed pa'i srin bu dgu// nyen dang mtshan mamatshams dang gsum// dgu rmugs pas ga
10a1(rgyud): bya// rtsa dang gnas pa'i ga 'ur yang // bdud rtsi sbyor ba wa byung ba// bdud rtsim sogs gong du gsungs// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / 
10a2(rgyud): a las ka pA la// ba las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pasam// nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// gtso tsa steng du sor 'azhi 'am// mtho gang tsam du bsam bdi// mi gas
10a3(rgyud): bsam par bya// sngon po dmar po dkar po ste// hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam// de steng yi ge oM bsam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du bsam// 'di ni bdud rtsi'i kha sbyor ro// sha lnga las ni gdan
10a4(rgyud): gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur// las kyi rlung gis me bus te// zla ba gtso bo la sogs nu// tha mal pa yi bdud rtsi yin// yi ge gsum dang nyi ma nu// lha yi bdud rtsi zhes ni bya// 'od zerd kyis bkra
10a5(rgyud): / shes kyi// bdud rtsi yin par nga yis gsungs// lan gsum bskor ba sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin brlabs rnal 'byor ro// de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod// mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes ni gsunga'o// 
10a6(rgyud): rol pa'i rnam 'byor te// galas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas nu pa'i rnal 'byor yang // mnyam pa'i rlung dang gtum ma'i shes// ya~M shes 'di yi ngo bar gyur// cha gci ga mi spyod napa snang ste/ 
10a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro mnyam pa nyid// cha gcig bya ba nan tan te// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// cha gcig rlung dang mkhris pa ste// mkhris pas pad kan la sogs pa// ga ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 
10a8(rgyud): 'gro ste// so song kun rtog ye shes mchod// chagacig rang bzhin med pa ste// me mang lta bu 'i le gas kyis// rdo rje gakha' 'gro mchod par mdzad// rlung de rdza mkha' 'gro ste// rtswa de ye shos mkha'
10b1(rgyud): yin// gzung na pa'i mkha' 'gro ste// phrin bu las kyi mkha' rga yin// gzhan sang ma sogs pa pa// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun// do mas bzhin du shes par bya// sU ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// gsu
10b2(rgyud): ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o// thugs ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o// gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus nas ni// mkha' 'gro'i bye brag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// 
10b3(rgyud): sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o// rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o// dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi ma'o// tsaN+Da li ni nyi shu ba na// sbas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru nges// bde
10b4(rgyud): spyod 'khor lor bsdu// longs spyod chos kyi 'khor mor bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang / cig le la ni thams cad 'dus// dpe na nyima'i dkyil mkhor gcig nyid la/ nyi ma'i 'od ce daphyogs bcu dumar snang // du
10b5(rgyud): ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus// dper na 'khor los smar ba'i rgyal po'i gdugs// shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbyong ba de bzhin no// snying ga chos kyi 'khor long bsdus nas kyang // nyi zla'i dkyil na tsan
10b6(rgyud): de'i dbus su thig le yungs kar chad// sngags phreng ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyis ni// g.yon bskor gal pa bskor dubyangs gsal sprul ltar 'khyel// de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te// 'di sa sems ni brtan 'gyur nas/ 
10b7(rgyud): de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgos// zla ba kA le kA li a// a mi nyi ma la zis nas// nyi ma nabs rgyas thim pasapa// zhabs pa skyed la sa gas rim pa mam// yan lag lnga ni ma shes lnga// de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te/ 
10b8(rgyud): dadabra mos// sems ni ngem par bskos pa'o// denas rang rig le zhes te// chos sun stong par ro gcig pa'o// gzhanas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ sprus pa yin mthomacho gnyis// 'bar ba dang ni 'jug pa kyi tshul// bla
11a1(rgyud): rgal nas shes par bya// phyil nas rtog rtsol ba ste// nang gi nam rtog srog gi drug/ srog col gnyis 'gas dbum ste// kun rdzachu byung gi staH nas// mang bzhinas ni rgya gsum na
11a2(rgyud): dbugs dgag pa mi gnas yin pas// dang po drug zung ba bya// de nas sku 'i pa'i gnas su gzung // langan 'azang ba shes 'a bya// de nas gas pa gsum pan// shes rab pa shes dang 'brel pag/ 
11a3(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// gzhang kha gala' zhing baspu ldang // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// byang chub sems rgyu mi rtog snyam// mchog dga' mi da migs
11a4(rgyud): \u0f7f// gsang sa na tu yangs su gag// stan cig kyis dgang mi dmigs pa// sa kyi phrin len par gdungs// de 'i rgyun cad bral pa'i dgal// de 'i mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis// gzhanas
11a5(rgyud): du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa'o// ska pa'i tshogs ltang du mar spros maud kyag/ ti khrag/ khung tu 'jug/ nyi ma zla ba lta bur chung 'jug kyang/ sgra gtsun
11a6(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// bung du 'jug pa ji lta bu// gnyis su med pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun ni/ 
11a7(rgyud): ye khyad par spros pa'o// sku gsum dang ne ye shes lnga// 'bras bu'i khyad par spros pa yin// su rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang // 'bras bu gsum du bslu ba// sgyu rnams 'bras bul thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis
11a8(rgyud): bar bya// chos kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yin// thams cad stong bar ro gcig pa// 'di ni thung dor med pa'i dbyings// 'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags sku'i
11b1(rgyud): rgyal// phyag rgya can tha ma shes gnyis// dam tshig chos dang las phyag rgya// 'di la brted pa shin tu zag// 'din de chen po ste// bskyed dang rdzogs pa dang bzhin dag/ bad can 'khor mo rnam pa gsug// gsang ba'i
11b2(rgyud): rtse e la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang ba yin// rig pa la sogs de bzhin te// gsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas// rang bzhin pade chen 'khor lo ste// bde 'a chen pos rol gang ba// til dang til ma ring bzhin no// dper
11b3(rgyud): dashing sna bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin no// bde ba chen po de nyid las// skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong dang // khri dang 'bum gyis bsgom pa ste// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o// gsu
11b4(rgyud): ge rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// 'di dag kun gyi rim pa yang // sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni// a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// mar me lta bu 'chi ba yis// haM gi mtshan mar gsung
11b5(rgyud): pa yin// lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni// gnyis su med pa bar ma do'o// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang bdar ba la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang // shes
11b6(rgyud): rab ye shes 'brel ba ste// dga' ba bzhi'i mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang lam g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba rdo rje rtsa lam nas// byang chub sems rgyu bde ba snyam// mchog dag
11b7(rgyud): mi ni rdo ba ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'gas pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo 'o yin// bde ba'i tshun chad 'de bskan// bras ba dga' ba'i ngo bo min// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub sems phyogs la
11b8(rgyud): pa// gong du gsungs par shes par bya// dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste// mchog dag ba sdang ba mched pa yin// rab tu dga' ba snang bama'o// lhan cig skyes pa'od gsal ba'o// ye shes ba zhi yi rang bzhin te/ 
12a1(rgyud): bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i nges pa yin// rags pa bzhin gsang bar 'joms// phra ba'i bdud shi nga bzhin gyis// 'khor mo ban du 'joms pa yin// 'tshar rol tan dga' ba na/ 
12a2(rgyud): de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snag// de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la brten dug gsum ni// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// 'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong nyon
12a3(rgyud): mongs 'joms// kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// sbal ba bzhin lha yi bdud// rig pa la bar lo lha bdud 'joms// skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med
12a4(rgyud): bdag 'joms// phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde ba bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba bshe dang yum bzhi dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// ye shes bzhi po 'di
12a5(rgyud): nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang // gzhan yang mos pa'i bye brag dang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum bgrod pa'i
12a6(rgyud): dal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di la thams cad bya bar gsungs// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags// de yi bya ba ji lta za// bcom ldan 'das kyis
12a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor bar dang byang chub sems// rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo // gcig dang bani dang bcu dang ldan// nyis brgya lnga cu'i go rim gyis// bsnyen gan
12a8(rgyud): dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang // shin tu gtong dang rnam par gtog/ bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong byang chub sems dang
12b1(rgyud): yin// dkyil 'khor du zhugs dge ba ste// de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin// bdun dang ldan byar chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de la bsnyen pas dge bsnyen
12b2(rgyud): /  da/  // dge gas te// de nyid rje bas dag tha / na
12b3(rgyud): chen po yod// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin pa gatshar mo dang // theg pa dman par ldog pa ni// spong ba gsuman go rams bzhin// theg pa gsum gyis nges
12b4(rgyud): de// rigs 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas// 'bras bu 'di gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa'ang rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// cha lugs su ni gnas byas la// dbang bskur rab gnas la sogs bya// theg pa gsum kyi
12b5(rgyud): kyis// gsang ba spyad par ma gsungs te// dper na rdo las 'angs su 'gyur// zangs las gser gyi rnam par rol// zangs kyi dus na rngo med do// gser du gyur pas rngo ma sdang// rigs 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so
12b6(rgyud): bang dang bya chu tha sa thas// gnyis la gnas pa nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// de nas gsang ba bzhi pa yang // bane pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste// rtag tu g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs
12b7(rgyud): sogs pa bkug nas ni// sgos bya snyan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas de bsgom par bya// gzung ba dang 'dzid pa yi// dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// sems nyid bsam du med pas na// c-i yang
12b8(rgyud): ma bya'o// soms nyid stong bar bcuganas su// stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong sa sogs pa'i// tog pa bcom pas mkha'i ltar 'gyur// rten yod ma yin parten pa med// dab med gnas
13a1(rgyud): rgya maud maman// de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste// stan rgyas gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas spyod pa bka' stsal pa// khro tshul gang dang phyag tu rnams// sbrum tsam du gas par// phyag
13a2(rgyud): / por yang dag bsgos// dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag ga// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug gi/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas// bskob dang
13a3(rgyud): pal sogs med// gsang sngags par du gcod cing gshe/ rnal 'byor kun la skur ba 'debs// rdo rje spun tshig slob la 'byar// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis// man
13a4(rgyud): sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo yi// rtsa yi 'khor mo 'don ma rtogs// lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa// mdzeg pa ru ni nga yis bshad// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa
13a5(rgyud): / dmigs rnam gsum gyis// mthur du sems can dmyal ba skye// shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor// shes pas rang gi rang rig dang // rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang // 
13a6(rgyud): rig sgyu ma gang 'dod pa// rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang // dbyings dang ye shes la sogs pa// lta ba'i don nyid bcad pa'o// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo rgyu 'i rgyud// gsang ba'i sna rtse
13a7(rgyud): kyi rgyud// gsang ba bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud// bum pa sku 'i chud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgud yin te// shes rab mi zhes 'bras kyi brgyud// skye brgya 'i chud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi chung du
13a8(rgyud): gsungs// bar mdon 'bras bu'i rgyud// rgyud ces pa ni hud len te// rgyal po gsang ba ston pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bani du gsungs// bum pa las dang po la gsang // gsang ba bum pa'i dus sug
13b1(rgyud): dkyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to// // dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// 
13b2(rgyud): chede 'a dus na 'kho dus pa thams cad kun rdol latshang gyi chos mi stsol gyur to// de nas shes ba'i bdag po phyag nga rjes gsol pa// rtse rtse mdzad te// kun rdzob pa
13b3(rgyud): dpa' // des yin // kyi sami bdug sa bshad du gas/ maldan 'das kyis paka//  mapa das can pa sdug// denyi pan rdzobal mchog/ 
13b4(rgyud): sas kyis mi khyab pa/ 'bang gyis kyi rang bzhin na// phyag na de rjes la zhus pa// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid rjes// dbye ba mi mthun grangs dkan// dus dang gnas pa la dung yang// 'jug
14a1(rgyud): 'grel lcag gi/ rang bzhin dag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo yin// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsag/ de ni bas
14a2(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon// rtag chad skye 'gag la sogs pal// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig cig/ gdod nas spos bral bden pa nyid// de don bsam gyis mi khyab des// de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring ma
14a3(rgyud): rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// dang por rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang lab rtags bsam mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab// chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khyab// yi ge bsam gyis
14a4(rgyud): khyab pa// mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye// gzugs sgra dri reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// i ni yi ge dam pa ste// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// skye ba kun gyi rgyur gur pa// yi ge dang
14a5(rgyud): bsam me khyab// phrag byung khrus dang gcod sgra dang // rgyan cha gcer bu thal gos sogs// chad dang bdud rtsi sha dang yang // ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// rol pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yi 'dul ba
14a6(rgyud): sems can la// mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas// de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chad sgo skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags ni sdang
14a7(rgyud): brag sogs// nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa// lha bsgom rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 
14a8(rgyud): nam mapa'i sprin char tshul// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab / rgyu 'bras pa skad kun dang bral// rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha' lta ma bcos pas/ 
14b1(rgyud): spyid rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang dag bsam kyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sprul sogs kyi// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis// mi go'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni sdug dang mi spug sogs// @
14b2(rgyud): dgu pra ra ras kyi 'ar// skal sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum drug ste// reg bya ba cu gcig chos de bzhin// gang shig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dpa
14b3(rgyud): brgyad dang // ji snyed ladu shes yod kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong lam bsgom lam mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtags dud rtags
14b4(rgyud): ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang sgo skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang // 
14b5(rgyud): thabs dang shes pa'i mtha' yi bar// mtha' yi dbyi bas rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi dro dang// tshig steng rtsa ba nye ba dang // ne sdangs sonas de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas bya'o// kun nas nyon ma
14b6(rgyud): dpa'ar byang // 'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs// rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems dang nam mkha' ye shes dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// blos brtags mtshan ma
14b7(rgyud): spang ba dag/ sgro 'dogs pa dang spar 'de'as dang // ram min mos pa khyad par tshol// rdul tsam khas len zlos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub byed pa// gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste// gang zhig mas
14b8(rgyud): srung lta ba de// rang rag gzhan rig sems la yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rig rtog ge skam po dang // mthara' ltung dbu ma pakhas len pa// de ni sems nyid rang rig dang // brjod med bsam gyis kyi
15a1(rgyud): khyab do'o// mi mthun pas phyogs yin te// de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rang rig le shes chen po yin// sbyin sogs dag po'i chos rnams dang / rang rig kyi mi rnam pa yis// 
15a2(rgyud): ye shes chen po la// thabs dang thabs las byung ba'am// rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// rab 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang // de
15a3(rgyud): ba ma yin te// nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no// rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su dbye// rang rig sprin med nam mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtog nam mkhar mtshungs/ 
15a4(rgyud): sprin sogs rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid// gzhani rag rnam rtogs bral ba la// sgrub bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu nam mkha'
15a5(rgyud): // sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las// nam mkha' del ma sgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te// gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol mi
15a6(rgyud): 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o// kun kyang nyon mongs rnam par byang // gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus dag sems kyis rang
15a7(rgyud): / las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi yi grangs
15a8(rgyud): nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rig li ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sngang lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin las// yul drug dbang po drug
15b1(rgyud): bsam byas ma khyab drug nyid de// brgyad sogs grangs na pas ma mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gnan ngag gnyis son ma med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang bral tshul du gnas// rang ga med par gnan
15b2(rgyud): dag/ so ma skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rigs ma spangs rang rig 'dod// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan 'das// kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rig pas blang dor gnyi
15b3(rgyud): rtogs// de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin la brgya rtsa bcu// theg chen mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon
15b4(rgyud): bsam me kyag// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grug/ bde 'a chen po rol gang ba// khams gsum 'khor ba kun shes ra// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la// 'khor ba nyid ni mya
15b5(rgyud): na'adas// lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs// sems med nam mkha' chos nyid med// 'khrul pa med cing ma 'khrul med// theg
15b6(rgyud): rim pa med// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// ye shes med cing bde ba med// mtha' bral dbu ma rim gnas pa// phas ma mi khyab du gnas pa ste// 'di rtogs khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs
15b7(rgyud): rtsom pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing // mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas// rigs 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang ma
15b8(rgyud): bang de bslab// rig 'dzin sa la gnas par bya// 'dzin pa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas te// bco lnga ma yi bdag nyid las// sku gnyis ka
16a1(rgyud): kyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs// de mi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgya med// rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdas
16a2(rgyud): ngag dang // rig 'dzinas la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig skye yi rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du byas pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid de// yul dang yul can la sog
16a3(rgyud): rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba yis// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdag nyid de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa/ 
16a4(rgyud): mthar phyin pa yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu chod dang // dbyu bu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi byang rgod la sogs spyod// bral te dben par gnas pa ni// snang med mthar phyin tshad yin te// rang rig
16a5(rgyud): tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing sgyu ma med// bya ba rtsal med cing bgrod pa med// rang byung lhun gyi grub pa ru// rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa
16a6(rgyud): yin no// 'dod chags ro yis myos pa dang // sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dus// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal ba'i dus// khyad par can dugs
16a7(rgyud): gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi// gzugs la brten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa'i rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral chu de nyid// bsam
16a8(rgyud): khyab su mi dus// sgral sogs pa'i de ban do// 'dod chags ni sda gti mug sogs// nyen mongs rjes nas rtsub ste// byams dang sbyin pag sa de bzhin no//  zo ma zhes pa sa
16b1(rgyud): te// bsam gyis ma kyab rgyal dus// bla ma'i nas nas shes par bya// sbyin dang tshul skams la sog pa dang // byams dang snying rjem sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar zam chos rnams dang // bzod su
16b2(rgyud): sogs dang // bskyed rdzogs pasgom pa'i rim pa kun// skye ba gcig gam du mas ni// yongs su rdzogs par byung ba dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyob// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// bskyed
16b3(rgyud): rdzogs sogs mi gnas shi // rdzogs pa chen por gang 'dod pa// de bang 'jug ce 'dus yin te// bdud rnams pasas kyis mi khyab pas// bar mchod par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs ni
16b4(rgyud): brgyad de// mkhara' mnyam gan bcas gni med dang // yul drug drug gsum brten pa dang // lhan cig skyes nyid tu la brten// sa nu me drung sgra brten no// chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i// rang rig pa
16b5(rgyud): ba mkha' mnyam ste// bla ma'i sems gzung dang bar gces// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro// sems ni gzod
16b6(rgyud): rang rig pa// gzhi med bsam gyis me khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de brted sems gzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bod de blang bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // gti
16b7(rgyud): su mkhas pas gzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par bsgom// bye brag sems gzung bas ma mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg chen la// man ngag yad pa ma
16b8(rgyud): ba spyod pa sems gzung dang // sgyid nga 'bras bul mi dpa pag/ dus dang yongs spod rnal 'byer dang // bdag dod gnan don dgongs pa dang // ngas dubamatha' spangs chags rlung dang // chags
17a1(rgyud): mi khyad par dang // khyad par rnam pa bco lnga yis// rig lang dachagapa khyad par 'phags// kyan bcom ldan 'jigs pa // rang rig pasam ma khyab pa la// sbyin dang byams
17a2(rgyud): dgongs pa ci// sku gnyis gzhan don gang las byung // bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas// de nyid ci lags phyi ru ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pas/ 
17a3(rgyud): gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang // sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems cad rnams ni sangs rgyas su// 'byung ba'i rkyen du nges pas na// bsam mi khyab la mi gnas kyang // sbyin sogs
17a4(rgyud): 'bad de bslab par bya// de la bsam ma khyab pa 'byung // sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin las rnams kun// sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas nas// bsam mi khyab pa la
17a5(rgyud): bar nges// denyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab// de nyid ma rtags 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor bu'i byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang // bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems
17a6(rgyud): nas// de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te// sems kyi yig yog gcad pa gces// rang sems las su rung 'an// deni phyi rtags nang du ste// de nyid nang rtags kyi ru 'brung // lus la dri med srin du
17a7(rgyud): sle dkar gnyer sa sogs med pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba lta mar snang ba dang // sprin med mkha' ltar gang snang ba// bsam ma khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas
17a8(rgyud): rus pa de dag thams cad thos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de khon nyid bsam kyis me khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
17b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// // dan Di ta kA ma d+ha dang / oM tsA ba shAkya 'i shes kyis bskur ba'o// / ma// rgyag skad du/ shrI khA sa ma tan tra dzan ma/ bod skad du/ da
17b2(rgyud): nam ma' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de banan gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsu
17b3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la btsugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gis nang nam mkha' spyod ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / sa 'og na spyod pa ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad
17b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/ dad ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems// lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing phab ma yi// lam la spro bar gyis la
17b5(rgyud): par tor// mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid de// nga mi khyod la bshad par bya// mkha' spyod steng sgo'i rlung yin te// sa spyod par du theg le'i sgo// sa log spyod pa shu ba'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yi
17b6(rgyud): dang po mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid ye shes rlung // mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye// gnyis med rang ni ma ning
17b7(rgyud): 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang // le ba lus kyis khyab pa ru// rigs la'i rlung ni khab par gnas// rgyu ba bdir 'byung ba'i rlung
17b8(rgyud): dadangs sdigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di nyid rlung ni can brgyad de// bar re la ni 'pho ba gnyis// rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin// 'phe ba gcigal chu tshod gnyis// ma med me la dbyal sa
18a1(rgyud): dbyug gu drug su bzhi// de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sogs// sems dang sems min 'dres pa'i drug/ rags pa dang ni phra ba la// mkhas pas
18a2(rgyud): sems kyi gnon par gzung // rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyis rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// de nyid re shes rdo rje 'drug/ dbye 'a thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams
18a3(rgyud): mkha' spyod rang bzhin te// de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyis// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang // gnol ma dang ni g.yon ma dang / 
18a4(rgyud): 'di ni gsu yi rnam par gnas// bems po rlung gi la ma yin te// dbang po mngon sum lam yin pas// sna yi'i rab gling 'ani la// zla byang chub sgor rgyag gis// tha'as dang shes rab skor molas
18a5(rgyud): la// 'bad pas sems ni gzung bar bya// 'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas// mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di
18a6(rgyud): gyur ba// rom dang ni rgyang ma'o// sbrul 'khyil lta bu'i rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'gag go// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i nub
18a7(rgyud): kun 'dar ma li rtsal brten// tsaN+Da li ni shing lta bu// rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas der 'bad de rang rig gzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin no// de nas sa spong
18a8(rgyud): bshad bya ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsan+da li li bye brag brtag/ dang por rang bzhin tsaN+Da li// gnyis pa gtum ma tsiN+Da le// gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+Da li// de bzhin gcer lu tsaN+Da / 
19a1(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing // las kyi me yis me 'dzag par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las// mi shig
19a2(rgyud): haM gi dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun de'i mdog lta bu// dkar la mtsher dang gzi mdangs snum// bde ba chen po'i skur 'byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la dngas pa'i rang bzhin la/ 
19a3(rgyud): par bzhi ni thun mong ste// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnas shing srid pa skye// dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de phyir don dam kun rdzos
19a4(rgyud): kyis// sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'chol ba las dngos grub med// rkyen 'chol ba las de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// don dam sems kyi spyod yul min// kun rdzob
19a5(rgyud): ba bde ba'i yul// sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum bsgom mi phyed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yan lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi don// sbas pa'i don dang mthar
19a6(rgyud): thug don// sna tshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rten las sna tshogs 'byung // A li kA li ma ning dang // drug tu sbyor ba brtag par bya// spu mtha'i yi ge ba
19a7(rgyud): khyab// yan lag rnam pa gsum yin te// rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang // brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do// de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las gzhan// thun mong
19a8(rgyud): le// bye brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa dbang dang sngags su dbye// sngags la lan ste dbang la gnyis// choseMn spyi dang bye brag go// de dag kun gyis mtshan nyid kyang // bla ma lanas nas shes
19b1(rgyud): bar bya// snod dang sdod min bye brag kyang // bla mas lags par brtag bya ste// de nyid yang dag rtog gyur da// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs 'jig pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs
19b2(rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung // bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya med rnal 'byor de stag la// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor na
19b3(rgyud): de ltag la// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// shes rab snying po brtser gyur pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bsrub shing la// gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las// bdud rtsi'i ron nyi shu yin// nor bu ran
19b4(rgyud): da ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ma dkrogs 'o ma las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba yin// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos lnga
19b5(rgyud): radu 'byung ba min// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bani// bdud rtsi ro 'dra seng ge'i gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang // sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs te// mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la gtang // phyag
19b6(rgyud): zhi yis rgyas btab po// dam du smra zhing dam du spel// rgyu las 'das nas dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi ngo bor rgyud
19b7(rgyud): rtag/ sngags la gnyis te chos la gnyis// dbyibs kyang de bzhin shes par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phye nang sbas pa mthar thug pa ni// rgyud kun phyag
19b8(rgyud): yin te// de nyid dbya ba mkhas pas brtag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ni tsaN+Da li// gan pan nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rtsa gsum gyi san gyi
20a1(rgyud): gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi sa// rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtang // pu ru rab gtum gsang rdo rje// dza drug tum mig gsang ba gcod// o ru 'od ldan
20a2(rgyud): mi khyab// a ru sna rtse nam mkha' mnyam// go ru bstan blo nam mkha' che// ra ru me'u thung sku gsung thugs// de ru lang ka rin chen phreng// ma ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru er stobs po che// o/ 
20a3(rgyud): du 'jigs byed ye shes gsapa// tri dra rung shugs la shes phreg// ko rumang 'thung ye shes 'byar// ka ru byA ma zla ba'i phreg/ sa du shin pa zang chen chen 'bad/ ka ru ta na nyi ma'i 'khor// he mug
20a4(rgyud): shes rgyal// tre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'grogs pa// gri mub rgya gsang me 'bar// oM ru no N+Di gas bdud ci// su ru kho lo du khrod rgyan// na tshunan dpar rdo rje rgyal// su ru stobs chen po
20a5(rgyud): shes rgyal// ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus mkha' 'gro sdom// de dag gtar ngo legs par spos// nang du tsaN+Da li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni gtad pa ste// dang po gas
20a6(rgyud): gnyis pa'ang // rang bzhin yon te de nas dbang // rkyen ni thams gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rang bzhin te// de nas dngos grub ging 'dod sbyid// dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pas// dab
20a7(rgyud): dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyug// bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te// bdud rtsi ro ser lo las// bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub blang // 
20a8(rgyud): yidas zung sa dra pa gyis// de nas lakhor 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su 'i rang 'ar gyur to// sbugs pathugs kyi yang bzhin dpal rnam mkha' das nyis pa'i rgyud kyi rgyam po zhes bya
20b1(rgyud): rdzog s+ho// pan+ti tagapa dang / dge slong sakyi nas kyis nus shing 'gyu so// rgyag skad du/ skem khan+d+ha dang / bod nad du/ da sa namasan po skad kyi rgyam po/ 
20b2(rgyud): bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ 
20b3(rgyud): gzhan lang dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa dang babs gcig tu bzhugs so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas
20b4(rgyud): lan gsum byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kye ho bcom ldan 'jig pa che// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang // 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang / 
20b5(rgyud): da kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste// dang
20b6(rgyud): dbang bdud yin pag// kha dog dbyibs la log rtog gis// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// 
20b7(rgyud): dag lam ston bla ma med// zhe sdang du drang skye ba yi// rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ lha 'i bu yi bdud yin te// las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyas// srog 'chad pa ni 'chi bdag bdud// bskyed pa'i rim la
20b8(rgyud): gnas nas// lha yi bu mi bdud kyang bcom// log rteg du pa'i rtog pa 'gag/ des na phung po'i bdud bcom mo// rten dang brten pa ro mnyam pa sa// nyon mongs pa 'i bdud bcom mo// dus min 'chi dang tsherang
21a1(rgyud): / pas// 'di dag 'chi 'dag bdud yin te// tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi// tshe yi 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// gshan yang 'dud 'jobs bye brag ni// bya mtsho yi bcud kyi len/ 
21a2(rgyud): grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms so// de bani rnams kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems kyis wa ye bdud bcom ste// rten dang brten na snga mar ldan// de nas gsang da
21a3(rgyud): bdud 'ani yang // phyag mtshan khro tshul gang la sogs// phyi ru dum phung por bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin na// dman po'i lam gang stan pa yi// bla ma
21a4(rgyud): le bu le bdud// phye ye che yi bdud kyis ler// de nyid 'tshobadag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag ri// sgo gsum 'khrul bar gang stod pa// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// sgo gsum las ni du
21a5(rgyud): ma'i cha// de nyid ma shes phung po'i 'dud// de nyid 'bad de bsa' byas kyang // 'bras bu 'i 'byung sems nyon mongs// nyon mongs pa le bdud len te// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// 
21a6(rgyud): lha yi bu li bdud bcom mo// de nyid ska mar shes par bya// da nyid shes pas phung po dang // nyon mongs pa yi bdud 'atsam mo// dngos po'i ba / bskye pas 'che// rma med las kyetshig ste/ 
21a7(rgyud): rkyen ma bskyed pang bzhin gnas// sums 'chi bdag bdud bsam mo// chol dbang sa ma lta bu// gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rang la shes bad dpa yang / 
21a8(rgyud): pa'i// dman pa'i lam ldad b+ha yi bdud// de nyid dus lung ba'i bdud// de zhos rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyod mong pa de bdud yin do// khad/ mas dmyas pasadze
21b1(rgyud): bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang // 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston par// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// dga' ba bzhi ni dum skye// rgud ma spungs pas phung po'i bdud// rang sems
21b2(rgyud): mongs nyon mongs bdud// 'khor bar ltung bas skye ba ste// skye ba las byung 'chi bdag 'dud// rnam par rtog pa skye bas so// 'dod chags kyis ni 'chi bdag 'dud// ma spangs sum cu drug gci
21b3(rgyud): dang // nges pa sum cu rtsa drug gi/ lam bsten bra mas lha bdud bcom// dga' bzhi smra ba rang bzhin med// bde chen ror 'gyur phung po bcom// 'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin// rang sems nyon ma
21b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// de mes 'chi ba dang bral bas// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud pani yi// da pas stoms kyis zin pa ste// rgyal
21b5(rgyud): ba~M dmangs su babs pa bzhin// de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin// rgyal ba rgyalas shor ba bzhin// dzin pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni// gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la// bani pa'i lam ston bla ma na/ 
21b6(rgyud): me bu yi bdud yin te// bdud gsub bla ma'i nal nas shes// sngon min gsang bsgrogs pa dang // mar dag ral sogs pa// 'thungs ta ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin// khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste/ 
21b7(rgyud): rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra// dbang dang gdam ngag 'drel bcas pa'i// bdud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug/ ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags// bla ma gcig pa snod bcung
21b8(rgyud): gnyis// ma da dpapa ste// blam gcags dbang po dag//  ma gcigs mnyan par bya// bris rnam pa gnyis bugs / phyi ma tha ma tod de// na ge bras padag // bded
22a1(rgyud): snga rnams kun// thams cad 'jigs shing skrag byed pas// 'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi gsul las rgyal// dmigs pa lta sogs bdud dang ldan/ 
22a2(rgyud): de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / thams cad rgyud la dgal ning mgu nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal nam
22a3(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // t+ya gar kyi la khan lo gA pa d+ha ra dang / lo rgya ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsku ba'o// 5\u0f7f// rgya ga skad du/ shI kA la thA ka tsi t+ta tan+t+ra rA dza/ 'od na
22a4(rgyud): dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mchog kur 'di la yang dag gnas// mgon po thugs rje tshe ldan pa/ 
22a5(rgyud): dak+Shi bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo 'dod// thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kA
22a6(rgyud): dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar po// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsol// hud kyi don la rim goms shing // smra ba'i tshig gis ma rmongs la// gzhan gyis rtsod pas mi rdzi yang // dbang dang man ngag mtho
22a7(rgyud): dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs// sngags spyod pal ba don med yin// shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir gtso bos dbang bskur gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol// ro
22a8(rgyud): 'dzin pas bka' stsal po// dang por yum dbang rim pa lag/ gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa batshal// bkra shis yang dgal shin tu sum// bkra shes bya rnams snyan par rdzogs// dpag
22b1(rgyud): byas med par 'dod// gzhan yang du bgrod shing gcig gam// tshu ngogs dgas logs pa ru// sa bdag pa'i lha mo sa// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gyis// sa bslang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs// de nas
22b2(rgyud): dang po bsnyen pa dbul// bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring ste// mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra// grangs ni stong dang waM dang 'dra
22b3(rgyud): dus ni bco lnga bcu gsum dang // bdun dang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams mnyes pas bsnyen byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin bya// bkra shis lo hA
22b4(rgyud): ldan pa yi// bu mos ma yi phyogs mthun pa'i// ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtag/ so shing rtse mor me tog dri// bsrung srud la sogs mtshan ma brtag/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// dkyil
22b5(rgyud): 'khor slob ma rab 'bring tha// ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram// khaM bi ra yi sngags kyis kyang // de la rdo rje byab par bya// de la ku sha la se
22b6(rgyud): / dkyil bI cho ga dang bcas bya// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas// bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang // dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir// rta dang glang po ma he dang // rin chen la sogs gter rna
22b7(rgyud): dang/ spos dang shar me la sogs pa// brgya'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// bla re rgyan dang pa dan sogs// byin brlabs chogs bsag phyi ru dgod// de na slob ma gtsug par bya// khrul dang yan lag hri
22b8(rgyud): sa kya/ kyed byed ni ngaHsa// 'jig rten sprul pa las medan// he ruka dgrags chen poyi// dkyil la chen par byed rol lamo// dad pa dang bcis slo bar gyis// nam tog dang bral da
23a1(rgyud): dga' rkyen khyod bdag ston pa'o// rdo myongon pa dgongs su gsaso// byang chung chen por lung bstan pa// ma gan ma tshan pa bdag 'tsham 'o// dmachag nyid bdag la sum
23a2(rgyud): byang chub sems ni bdag sa stsos// pad+ma las nyung ba dgal stsol// gsang ba dgyes pa bdag la stsos// bar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// legs so lags so/ 
23a3(rgyud): rigs kyi thu// rgyam sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'jig byed pas// gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyod bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi non khyod kyis tham
23a4(rgyud): tshig spyod pa spyad pa yi// mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du sbal// nam yang khyod kyis spang mi bya// tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam gtan la// 'bad pas sems ni brtan par
23a5(rgyud): chang na rtag 'atung khro'i bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgyab ster bar bya// 'di ni dang tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// thun mong sdom dang sems skye
23a6(rgyud): skyer// bsring ba lan gsum phyag gsum bya// yol bas bar du bcad nas ni// mig la sogs bsdu bka la// lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis gsang dag bya// me tog dang bcas rdo
23a7(rgyud): yong // de 'i snying la gzhag la bsgom// slob dpon la ni brnyes byed pags// klung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya// phyi ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dpa// sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral// mag gis gzugs
23a8(rgyud): bzong ba dang // rna bas spa dang snga me dri/ ste yis rod lus kyis reg/ dngos kyu srin las so so ru// mkhas pas brtag par shes par bya/ me tog dong te lha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gco
23b1(rgyud): 5/ de gzugs dun / nga kyi la krA /  sa// gnan ga pa /  ma ga/ 
23b2(rgyud): brarnams 'phrug// de kya na chen 'byu sa/ nyim nyid tshogs nga na ces// de ni rigs kyi pam 'jug// 'od pag med mdza rje dpa / ma mang ste pa'i rang bzhin gyig/ 
23b3(rgyud): rigs kyis dr-id ma byud// dris bu da yod bubab bye// bu dan ta la shes cis// srin sas tshogs byed par 'gyur// regs las dris na ming gi dbang// rdorje dang ni rdo rje mas// rnam snang chen
23b4(rgyud): zo ste// cho sa dbyings legs rang bzhin las// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs pa ng+ge'i khri stengs su// rigs byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'jobs pas rgyal chen bzhi// 
23b5(rgyud): rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan gzugs// chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab// gdugs kyis steng nas dkab par bya// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya dmachog gsum po yin// dbugs dbyung
23b6(rgyud): sreng bstan dang // rjes gan nga byer mi ldog/ brtan par byed dang rnam pa lnga// gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thun mong yin par yis gsungs// bum pa'i
23b7(rgyud): gis las rnams te// dkyil 'khor du jug dang yid// gnyis pa rig pa'i dab pa pan te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang sa bshang byug/ ma ni re sa rnan po'o// bya
24a1(rgyud): ci gnas nas// da pa stan la gnas nas su// gsang pa'i dbang ga rten srung ba/ rig pa dang po brtsal bar bya// dang kyi shes pas brtag pa dang // bdag dbang yad
24a2(rgyud): ba dang // nyes padag par sbyang ba dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang // bar chad bgegs rnams na pa dang // bsrung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// dri'i thig le dum bya// g.yon na gnas pa
24a3(rgyud): bsub dang bsrub bcas sbyor byas dang // sub las bde ba'i chu rgan gyis// lus kun khyab nas gsang ba ru// dkar la rtsa dmar lta thur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug gang dang 'dra// ro ma'i
24a4(rgyud): bya bsams la// lce de pad+mar byin brlabs te// lce li rtse mor b+haHbsams la// sih+la ga bur 'dres pa yis// b+h+yaHla gzhag ste de la bstim// so gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la// dbus su
24a5(rgyud): sgom par bya// gsanga'i'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje rtse mor dbyon pa dang // sbom po khroms sbyin pa dang // rdo rje gre tshangs sbyid pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang por shes rab brtag
24a6(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad par lnga brtags te// rigs dang lang tsho longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par lnga// phye yi brtag pa 'i
24a7(rgyud): gsungs// sems brtan rngardo rje yin rigs// khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs// rnam rtog chung ba rdo rje 'i// yang tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas brgyan shes pa ste// rdo rje rkyen
24a8(rgyud): 98// de nyid gsum du mi 'gyur ba// me nu chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzugs kyi khyad par yin// chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// de yi rol longs spyod pa// rdo rje'i longs
24b1(rgyud): ra ro// kun 'dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o// de nyid mnga' ltar mkhreng pa ni// thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro// rtsa de dmar la gdang ba dang // byang chub sems ni dkar la dang
24b2(rgyud): gnyis su med par gsal ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke ru// dngal brgyas pa de bzhin du// thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro// la la nA dang ra sa nA// ya bang+ga trer gnyis med la// thugs
24b3(rgyud): longs spyod kyang par ro// dang por phyi la gnyis pa na// gsum pa gsang ba'i brtag pa'o// lus brtag pa ni sku mer te// ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid brtag thugs su 'gyur ba'o// sgyus
24b4(rgyud): gsum pa sreg su mi snang ban// de ba'i nal nas shes par bya// tshul bdun dom la gcig/ dri ni bdun to she la gnyis// slong 'ini bye 'om gsan/ 'di rnams btsal ba'i rted kur pa// ma na na
24b5(rgyud): len par gsung mi// zla ma gnyis te zung ma gcig/ chang ni gnyi wa shes par bya// rgyad bye brag sa tshogs so// dgun dang de na stor gyi// zhag gcigan ni brgyad dang ldar// dbyar dang
24b6(rgyud): khyed kyi ga nas/ da lan zung da dza/ rang bzhin ges ga yin te// 'dun pa kyi rnyed khyig1/ 6 na / gzhanam smras sul pogs na/ 
24b7(rgyud): sa kyi// na tsha zhid de// de na byed //  kya/  byed go gnon dunan/ pa shin la// las da
25a1(rgyud): ma 'am// shadang mnyam por snyen par bya// 'di ni yan lag smos bcas so// de nas mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang / dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang // gos pa med pa'i yar lagayan// dbang 'phrus
25a2(rgyud): sngon du bskam pa'i dor// dbang ba phyir ni ngasas gsungs// rigs gtad dang man ga sbyin// brda rnams byagang 'dod pa'i rtags// brtag pa shin du rnas pa med// phyag dang gabs la sogs pa'i/ 
25a3(rgyud): 'khyud// dang po'i sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste// langs bcog pu gan kyal dang // kha sbu ba 'breng dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams
25a4(rgyud): kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyod pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// tha mal ba las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste// gsang ba las
25a5(rgyud): gzhan gsum pa ste// de yi rnam smin brjod mi long // dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa pa n-i// bla ma'i zhas nas shes par bya// yan lag bdun ba sgoms sbyor bdangs// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byug/ 
25a6(rgyud): sngags dang sman ni dang po ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa ting nge 'dzin yin te/ sngags dang sman gyis kun da dang // rked bcing ched dang gnas pa'i tshad// drang ba'i tshad rnams shes
25a7(rgyud): ba bya// 'gyul bab ni dang chags mthun pa'i// rked bcing med pa'i chad dang mnyam// sar gsum mar bather ma men// gnas pam tshad ni rnam pa byu// rnam pa gas pa'i yo brang gnas/ 
25b1(rgyud): 'dzid rig par gnas pa'o// stong pa ta mgrin mkho lo gnas// khams rnams gas ba bdi stong gnas// 'dab la sprum pa mthong bar gnas// yang dag spong ba ster gang gdas // he ru kar nir
25b2(rgyud): gshegs cig/ rdo rje ma da' las ma brgyab pa'o// dra 'i phyi ni sor bzhi 'thung // dang por lus gyis gnyis pa la// sla dang stsal dang dri dgasag// bums sum gnyis snang spad du/ lasal ldan
25b3(rgyud): la bdug/ rtse gsu ma rgya ni shin tu // bkra pa dang ba dang // rang sa te de r+ya shing dang // ra so shegs dang ma nas ga //  migs pa lngas dang // gzhan yang sman dang sum dang dri// da
25b4(rgyud): pa'i nang du blugs// sgo gnyis nas nin sngos bdug// zab pa'i sngags btang bsgom byas na// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan sna tshogs 'brang // thama'ang gsum ma 'dunan
25b5(rgyud): dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur na// sngags deng dman dang byad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya// 'dis sdig pa bsam mi khyab// 'dug pa'i sbyor thabs na
25b6(rgyud): gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa kha byed pa// sbyor thabs su mar yin par gsungs// 'de chen go k+kon slong ba dang // mthor mo'i go bzlog spong ba dang // mU yi go bzlog shor ba dang // ye shes go bzlog
25b7(rgyud): dang // 'byung ba go bzlog sbyong ba dang // sum gyi go btsug rkyong ba dang // thig le ga bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan go bzlog spong ba dang / yi ge ga bzlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa ga bzlog song ba dang // 
25b8(rgyud): gaslong ba dang / dag cheg brjod byung da do//  ga phyog bdang / mayin badrug sa bdag/  mas ga kya bdapa/ 
26a1(rgyud): ga bzlog sbyor ba dang // rten gyi go bzlog sbyong ba rnams// kun ma byed pas kyang ma gzigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhugs kyi gsang // byang chub sems dpa' kun bya yug/ 
26a2(rgyud): rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad par ma dpag par// zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin// dbang bskur ba'i sngon du yang // gdams ngag smin par gsungs pa yin// 
26a3(rgyud): ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma la brten nas su// bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pas na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// sih+la ga zur shes rab ste// do la bde ba ye shes yin// si
26a4(rgyud): / rar ces bya ste// ga pur ye shes su ni bshad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de yi thig le ye shes yin// la lA nIn ye shes so// rA sa nA na shes rab ste// byang chub sems ni ye shes so// mkha'
26a5(rgyud): de shes rab ste// dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te// rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin// 'og ni shes rab ces bya ste// steng pa ye shes su yang bshad// g.yon pa shes
26a6(rgyud): ces bya ste// g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab ces bya ste// ye shes bzhi ni ye shes te// phyag mtshan ming dang yi ge rnams// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// shes ra
26a7(rgyud): yang gsum// tshig la bslab pa'ang gan 'a yin// gzugs brnyad la ni bshad pa ste// mngon par rtogs pas bsgom pa gsungs// e waM ma yA'i rnam pa bzhi// me ni sa ste wa nai chu// mA ni
26a8(rgyud): rerlung // e na shing rjes de byams// mni dga' ba ba tang snyoms// oM ni skad wa sA ma k+Sha/ ma ni gos dkar yA sprol ma// e ni sbyin ze tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa lnga bsam gtan// oM ni h+yaH
26b1(rgyud): dra ste// wa ni dang chag phyag men// man ngos kyi phyag sas// man shes rab phyag rgya'o// yon shar te mra tshwa phyogs// man dub phyogs sa byang phyags// a ni sku yi legs ste// me ni gsungs sun
26b2(rgyud): sa reg pa'o// san sngon rdzo rdza ba// sa ni ba chos sa sa// yon ma'a' 'gro ches pa// ma sa lag chags can// oM ye shes mkha' 'grolan// chen no/  mkhara' 'gro ban/ 
26b3(rgyud): za'i mkha' 'gro ste// yA na las kyi mkha' 'gra'o// e ni 'gog pa waM ni lam// ba ni sdug bsngal la kun 'byung // e ni bde chen waM longs spyod// ma ni chos la yA sprul pa// e na mtshan la waM stong pa// ma 'i
26b4(rgyud): mthar lnga dpe byad//  ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// wan rnam par smin pa'o// ma ni rnam par nyid pa ste// yA ni rnam pa mtshan nyid bral// e ne ru ba wa 'dring po// ma ni sgeg pa sA cher lhag/ yon g.yas nas
26b5(rgyud): ste// waM ni g.yon nas rung d+ha'i// ma ne gnas sa rlung rgyu// pA ni sdang nas tu rlung rgu// en gnas brtan waM phal chen// ma ni bku dang ya thams cad// men bskon pa ma te bsnyed// ma ni sdung pa
26b6(rgyud): che// e ni shar lho wa lha rug// ma ni rub byang lnga byang shar// me ni rgud la waM ni sngags// ma ni ye shes lnga gsang ba// e ni sdang ba waM snang 'ched// man snang thob yA 'od gsal// e de bdag gi
26b7(rgyud): 'azang po yin// wa ni dus kyi 'bang po'o// ma na ye shes bzang por gsungs// yAni rlung gi bzang po yin// ye de bdag gi gnas par te// waM ni nal 'byor gnas su bstan// pa ni//  kyi gnas par
26b8(rgyud): te// 'dri chud kyi gnas yin no// yon dgar 'jis tshag dga'/ mini byan cag rdza dag 'bral// yon ma long zeb tam nyid// pa ni bu tig 'din ta// med nam bu la mangs ca/ 
27a1(rgyud): // do dad pa/  ga/ sngag na gag/ na sum // na gsang gan na/ rkyen thugs
27a2(rgyud): yed// oM ni rnam snang AH dadapag/ hUM ni mi stod pa bzhin no// oM ni phyag g.yon tu ni g.yas// U ni dbus kyi snying ga yin// oM na g.yon gyi spyan yin te// hUM ni g.yas pa A dbum// oMn
27a3(rgyud): rtsol pa// A.A ni gnas par shes par bya// oM ni sku la hUM ni thugs// A ni gsung du shes par bya// oMn lus la A ri ga/ hU~M ni yid du shes par bya// oMn thabs pa NAM shes rab// An gnyis
27a4(rgyud): pa'o// oM ni g.yon gyi la lA nA// hUM ni g.yas kyi rA sa na// A ni a ba d+hU tI yin// oM ni g.yas kyi rA sa nA// d+haM ri gapon rtsil lA nA// AHni de bzhin dbus na gnas// oM ni ga zur hU~M sih+la// A ni dkar la/ 
27a5(rgyud): bya dpar yin// min mchog dge 'du bya ba dga'// A ni ring bzhin dga' ba 'don// dga' ba lhan cig skyes dkar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa dka' bar 'gyur// rgyal 'bras bu myong ba dang // 'bras
27a6(rgyud): spyor dang // rgyal sku'i sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor// chu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyor// thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang // shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor// thabs pa
