27a7(rgyud): / skye ba dang // shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor// sbyor ba 'di yi dgongs pa yang // kun mkhyen pas kyang rtogs par dka'// a ni nam snang mi bskyod pa// na
27a8(rgyud): brdzun te// bla cho ma 'od dpag med pa yin// zag le don 'od grub pa'o// in 'de shegs lnga rang bzhin// zhabs skyed don yod grub pa ste// a ni de bzhin 'ad dpag med// ti ni rnam par sngang ma
27b1(rgyud): nacan tung ldan yid// chags pa pyad pa bzhind do// @na / mnagos dag sa yin// do rje byings blugs// sa ma ra nga bzhin/ ga pa stan du shes
27b2(rgyud): brje dang nA kr-i dag/ la lnga dang dga' Ta// ga ngas bzhin du shes par bya// zhabs skyed bya ba nan tan yin// yA ni mnyam nyid kyi nas so// ha ni mos kyi dbyings men te// dri tsham ma
27b3(rgyud): pa'o/ cigs mi ma zhes so// 'di dag kun gyi dgongs pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // kun tu ga sang zhing dpyad par dka'// yi ge tshum gyis rgyas ri ta ba pa'o// de nas byang chub
27b4(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshigs kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// mkhar 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // paN+Di ta ka la d+ha ra da gso
27b5(rgyud): ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// // #// rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na mA le tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// g+ha
27b6(rgyud): gsol ba rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor ma sngonang ru// rin chen phreng ba'i don mi rtogs// khyod kyi dag pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cigs la spyad gzangs rang / 
27b7(rgyud): dpal ldan 'khor la ldas pa ru// ma gsungs de mis rgyud la bshad// rin po chen rnam pa gas// de mi phreng ba'ang rnam pa gsum// dang po yod 'i dngo// gnyis kyi da pa ma// sbed bcud
27b8(rgyud): rang bzhin bral// de ni red med gsum pa yin// byams gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa ga 'jug sungs pal ma// dedams rin da gal gas// dpe phrengs snang lags// denams
28a1(rgyud): le sod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dnga'i snod kyi rin po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// ga gdon dkar ba// ma bskyod pa mi byin brlabs te// 
28a2(rgyud): de rgyags lta ba la// rang ni dang pa'i sgor tsam// 'di ni rin chen 'ab ba ste// bdakar dkar lug mo yis// 'o ma bsku nang spangs pa dang // mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya// de ni spyi bor gdags pa'o// 
28a3(rgyud): 'chod pa'i bye brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang // gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni gzhan skyes sbom po tsam// 'di ni rin chen dge ba ste// dngul mu rnam pa gnyis blugs la// rkye
28a4(rgyud): kyerdzas rnams tshang ba dang // kha yi nang du gzhug pa ste/ ro sI la rdo lo lces mnan la// de nas dal gyi bskyod pa dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje sa rtse ru// bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa man
28a5(rgyud): dper na rdul gyi sha zos pa// mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'byung // de bzhin mnan pas byang chub sems// bA rtse las kyang gyen la ldog/ til dang ti la mar bzhin du gnas// khyad par 'de ba gyen pa ste/ 
28a6(rgyud): 'deb ster phyir rin po che// de yi dum phreng bar bshad// tha ma skyes pa'i khro bo tsam// a ra la sogs sman lnga dang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu btags gyur na// lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag
28a7(rgyud): gnyis pa nga // 'dUr+yan sngon po ste// rin chen 'thung ldan byin brlabs te// dbyibs ni sogs ka sta bu ste// rab kyi tshadan glang ci'i tshig/ 'dini rin can mu gu ste// rang mi'i sgo sdang ris dang / 
28a8(rgyud): sham dang gsum sbyar nas// des gdugs rnapa g.yas su gdags// lho yi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni ngang pa'i nong tsam// 'di ni rin chen meraH// gzung
28b1(rgyud): /  jug / na ga du / das kyang chu sa// ga ni dugs// ma bya / 
28b2(rgyud): rung// bdu dang rdzong sa rnapal// 'bras te lum la thug 'grus te// 'di tan ka s+phar// lus kyi srin bu 'byer bar byed// da nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad+ma kyi dasar gyi ste// dbyibs na
28b3(rgyud): tshul// 'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te// rAng ni ka~M shwa/ pa ni stong// sur sum gzung sbya pa// de sa pa ldan thugs bya'o// khro ba'i dbus su gzhag la bcib/ 'di nir hA ka rung// rlub kyi gdan
28b4(rgyud): su la gas sa// tha~M d-i kun ste// dir rdzu //  / du pa'i da mes// de nang thugs sde pa man// 'dims kyang lams gang te/ 
28b5(rgyud): dra gnag de bzhin no// tha ma kan pa ni ste// 'bras bu gi sum dang dusna dang // mir gyi snying po dang sbyar te// spyi bo gtsug tu sra ba dang // 'di ra sna de bsar// sgra dgar med pa byed pa'o// de nas yang dag ba'i
28b6(rgyud): // don gamang sdu zhwa ste// dbyibs ni klu bzhis na ste// dan mo grub par byed brlabs te// rab brtson shug pa ma// den ga ga ni// byab lnga dang yan lag bcas/ la napagayon
28b7(rgyud): // 'di 'i byang gi gdod rnams // 'brang na sa// ma hU~M rna// gnyis cig k+ta sa// thug ses skye ba nang dugasug/ gzung marba / 13
29a1(rgyud): du mar snang // rnam par snang mdzad byin brlabs te// don rnams so so dum byed// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs sos su bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang las
29a2(rgyud): btsal// rin chen mi 'tshal de ltar lags// rin po che de ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyam tsho chen pom phyir man// rin po che mo gling mod de// de yi gnas nas btsal ba
29a3(rgyud): bya/ gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser dngul la sogs rdo rnams kyi// gnas ni kun na yod par gsungs// rin chen shes pa rnam pa lnga// dang por rgyud rnams thams cad la/ 
29a4(rgyud): sa dpas shes pa dag / bla ma'i man ga shes pas thob// gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes// gsum pa rgyud ci man dag la// zhugs pa'i chang dpon can pas shes// bzhi pa mar tan
29a5(rgyud): kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po chen po des shes so// lnga pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang // rgyal po dang ni 'brel ba yi// gser makar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur// lha mos gsol pa bcom
29a6(rgyud): 'das// dang pa'i man ngag ji ltar yin// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// gsum brgyud ni ji ltar lags// bzhi pa'i yon tan thams cad dpa// lnga pa 'brel 'di ltar lags// @
29a7(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po man ngag shes pa yang // rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la// yon tan du mar shes pa ste// dper na rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin// tshul mi 'bring 'bigs la sogs/ 
29a8(rgyud): pa ya ngag yin// rnas 'byor shes brtse gcig ste// doms thams cad shes pa yin// rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi// chang dpon da mis shes pa yin// sngags dang tud la sogs pa yi// yon tan
29b1(rgyud): kun ldan rgyal po shes// rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel pa'i// sa 'og gser gyi rlangs pa shes// gser ma gang de las shes pa'o// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang namatshan pa ste// 
29b2(rgyud): lam yi sogs dang // me du la sogs pa yi// mngon sum gtan la phab pa yin// ma hA nI la la sogs pa// gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang // sernam
29b3(rgyud): sogs so// dang por gdon gyi mtshan pa ni// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas gdon gyi mtshan ma la// de nyid cog tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu mig gtsang ma ru// gtor ma btang la thug tsa
29b4(rgyud): kaser das/ rjod dugra thugs la// lha'am klu 'as gnod sbyin sogs// mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Dal la// rnal 'byor ma yis gzhag par bya// gos la gsum gyis gcad par bya// gzod gyi ma pango/ 
29b5(rgyud): tu ri// bu yi dang du bo long gzhag phyi ru gtor ma cha gcig gzhag/ nang du yol nga dkar pos bcad// de ru tshogs dang dkra shis gnag/ rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la// lha yi rnal 'byar rdzogs par
29b6(rgyud): khro bos drag tu mtshams cad la// sbom mo khro mo sgra ru bsgom// de yis rin chen dang po gzung // de nas sor ba zhi 'phyad du gzhung// thung bam mi nub pa sogs pa// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// 
29b7(rgyud): dpa'adog re dpos// yon tan med pag 'a srid// depe na du gcig skyes ku dade// phra med pa yang ga pa srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsal pa bcom ldan 'das// gser dngul la
29b8(rgyud): daltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang yanan dang ni 'azor byas yin// rang bzhin gyis na 'cheb bru// bzor byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis// gser 'gyur
30a1(rgyud): gser gyi rgyan yin te// dang pa'i gser gyis srid pa 'gags// mdang nu ba zlab byed// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dngul la sogs pa de bzhin te// mdo nga sdang ni dz+rang
30a2(rgyud): rdzas// thams cad ri po che yin te// mnang gcan gyis shes par bya// de nas bcud kyi rin po che// lus kyi ri rab lhun po la// rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang // thabs dang shes rab rin poH// shes
30a3(rgyud): rin po che// thabs ni byang chub sems yin no// dmar dang gdang ba shes rab ste// dkar dang gdang 'thabs su gzungs// a ba d+hA tI rin chen las// thig le du ma phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol par
30a4(rgyud): ldan 'das// a ba d+hU tI ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a bad+hU tI'i rang bzhin las// steng du sgo lnga la dag gnas// bar dang 'og tu de bzhin te// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhi
30a5(rgyud): las// yon tan gyon gyi mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig le he yin no// oM dang bruM dang A.AH dang yi ni// bde ba chen po'i 'khor mo ru// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// 'ab rab bzhi ru yang dag ba shad// 
30a6(rgyud): thugs dang 'deb che// mgrin pa drin 'jug pa bzhi// snying gar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi// sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te// chos kyi sku ni rin chen la// stong pa bcu drug phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu
30a7(rgyud): don// pad+ma rdo rje gnyis pa ya ga// a ba d+hU tI rin po che// a phaT e dang waM dang bzhi// gsang ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad// a ni ma long lta bu ste// paT ni bya ba nan tan yin// e nes sa
30a8(rgyud): nyam nyid ye shes so// rin chen chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par ba dang stong pa dang // mtshan dang de bzhin da'i byed rnams// a ni la bar sa 'byung ba ba'o// phaT n+ya gnas su ye shes lnga/ 
30b1(rgyud): da de'i byed snang ba dang // rdung ba ldan du// rjes med m-i grum// khams rnams rted cingo// de rnams rten gyi ste// rnam rtag slong phyir na pa6// byang chub sems
30b2(rgyud): rib pa med // gams brkyang bas ni khas kyis te// yon gyis shes rab tu mdud dgag/ sags rnam mkha' gag par bya// zlum po sa gas pa'is cwo dag ga/ sa ldan dang ram na/ 
30b3(rgyud): dang dudaka/ de rnas pa' phrul pa te// dpe sa kyi ste gnas pa// dug dang seM ni me pa zhin// gzhan yang dag stongs kyi phyug gis// dag gi 'i TI ba shes pa bya// dgas
30b4(rgyud): rten// de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang // rim nas rim par byen ma drang // skad cig nas gzung mo ma bar// sma dag ga nyer mi'i rang bzhin dgag// gangal brten pa'i dri
30b5(rgyud): da// das gnas pa sa stsags//  / na nas kyis pa sa pa/  rna/ 
31a1(rgyud): kun da ma dug gnas pa// den dkris par bya// mchog ga dag bcug pa bal// bram pa'i dga' ba dza pa nga// spyan cag dga' ba dgyur bshad//  nga
31a2(rgyud): de mtha' gnyis te// ma yi rnam par dbu bar gnas// A li kIs mtha' gnyis te/ ma ning yi ge dbu ma yin// skyes ba bud med mtha' gnyis te// ma ning gnyis su med par gsungs// 'di ni la
31a3(rgyud): pa zung du 'jug/ de ni gnas par dbu ma'i don// shes rab pha rol sbyin pa ru// 'brel la zung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyu// snang bzung du 'jug par gsungs// dbaldan gsapa
31a4(rgyud): 'a'adus pa sa// steng zla chung la chung du 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru// sib+ha gzur zung du 'jug/ rim nas rim du grang ba yang // gsang ba'i 'khor po ma yin// bde brdzogs pa'i med pa
31a5(rgyud): pa// pad+ma rdo rje 'gas pa snyam// de ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas// bad chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang // dang po de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni brtan 'gyur
31a6(rgyud): deb chen pa'i 'khor lo nas// gsang ba'i snga rje bar du drang // lha mas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas// den shes pa su'i shes// da mi brtag pa ji ltar lags/ 
31a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du// a ba d+hU tA tsan dan gnas// la wA rA sa sprul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams pa zag khrug par ga
31a8(rgyud): di rnams rang bzhin kun la gnas// rtsa dang mngo po 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyi por gsung sa// rgya yi tsa dang na gca// gsang 'de bzhin 'amar thug pa'i// man dag yod
31b1(rgyud): shes par gsungs// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis su bstad// dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste/ gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya/  lul la spyi dang bye brag gnyis// spu ngan rlung gi rang bzhin te// yan lagadung ba du mi
31b2(rgyud): khams// yan lag rgyas pas yi khams// smad zheng che ba me yi khams// sna tshogs dus nam mkha'i khams// spyi ru dkar ba chu yi khams// dmar ba me chu shes par bya// ser na de bzhin sa yi khams// 
31b3(rgyud): sngon rlung du shes par bya// yangan rlung gi khams min te// drod rnams chen me gzims// brtan nas mi khams su gsungs// mu khams chen tu sa khams// de rnams sun ldan nam mkha' khams// 'jug pa
31b4(rgyud): nam yin te// ldog pa skul ba chu ru gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni bye brag gis// sems kyi gnas su shes par bya// shukra rlung sa si twa me// sbrul dang chos su ba sbyar yin// gzhan yang mkhas pas
31b5(rgyud): shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa yi// dbyibs dpa' dag mtshan ma gsum// kun la mkhas pas shes par bya// dang por dbyibs kyi brtag pa yang // dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi// khru bzhi
31b6(rgyud): ma po nags dang // gru gsum du yang shes par bya// dka na sogs de dang dra// rnab nas gzung rkang pa'i bar// kun la brtag cing shes par bya// ska na phra dang sdom pa dang // ring du 'don dang thung ba dang / 
31b7(rgyud): 'dir ba la lags tha brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// rtags des brtag pa'amatshan mni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku dang zhe sdang zhugs// mud pa gsung du shes
31b8(rgyud): 8\u0f7f// dang pa 'ad mags dbyes lag/ yang ngo ma mtshams dang gargyas// dbyib sa dang pa dag sa dag sum 'i// malas la 'dus skye brtag/ nyin par bzhe pa yin par can// de bdan ce
32a1(rgyud): tsakanaH/  gtsang na \u0f7f//  rdzang ma sogs// kyims kyi 'das kyi/  nan/ ka la/ 
32a2(rgyud): dkar la sogs pa dang // skad 'ad la ni skam la sogs// 'dod pa skye ba'i rtags su bshad// gzhan yang 'dod pa rgyas pa'i rtags// kha dog dbyibs la
32a3(rgyud): sogs pa de bzhin no// gsung dang thugs la'ang shes par bya// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar lags// 
32a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba la zhen nas// srid pa la
32a5(rgyud): sa bon mi zad pas// dper na chud kyi mdang bzhin du// 'bras bu ma nar med dmyal bar skye// chen po me rtog rang bzhin te// 'bras bu gnyis med la shes skyed// 'dod chags zhes pa spang bya ste// de
32a6(rgyud): / po gnyen por gsungs// 'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste// de yi chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten pa kru ru bstan// brjod pa dang bral
32a7(rgyud): gsung du bstar// rnam rtog bral ba thugs su shes// rnam rtog chung zhing gtong bod che// bla ma la gus snying rje che// gnan la dbye brag kun shes pa// 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang // bla ma
32a8(rgyud): ldan zhig// dbang dang man dag 'brel shes dang // gsang ba'i don la marmongs shing // thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// chos la ser sna med pa dang // gsal la gsong bar smra ba dang // rigs
32b1(rgyud): cwa pa dang / as b+hag tu rdzu nga/ shri kad ldan smra // 'dis kyi mas pa dang // na /  gla ga // 
32b2(rgyud): skyes pa ste// rtog bral smos pa med pa yin// de rtags rin cher phreng ba'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ga' ba zhes pa di ltar lags// de ye sa bras bu ltar smin// klas pa zhes pa'i
32b3(rgyud): lags// de la 'bras bu ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gal ba shes pa ye shes te// sum cu rtsa bdun sdu gsung thugs// chos dang long spyod spul sku gsum// dag
32b4(rgyud): du mdor bsdus pa// dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gsang ba'o// bdun dang ldan phyir chen por// sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po ste bas kyis mazhugs par// sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis// snyoms padra
32b5(rgyud): gas na 'dod pa ste// 'di ni rkun pom rungs pa// dper na ljon shing rtsa ba las// yal ga me tog thams cad skyes// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod chags las// duka gsum la sogs thams cad de// swa
32b6(rgyud): kas nga ba 'khor ba ste// gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba mnar med dmyal ba dang // dur khrod brgyad po dregs pa can// snying rje zad cing sha khrag pa// shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// s+ya
32b7(rgyud): 'das pa su gsum ste// skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang // 'chang tsha 'khor ba'i tshul du ni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yis su// sems can don yang dag 'jug/ chos sku spros bral na mkha' 'azhan/ 
32b8(rgyud): nyis ldan ma yas/ sgra gnyis mas can don pa dra ga/ bams can pa sa dang then pam tibs/ dpe thongapa kyi spang babs/ ba dag ded dang dramed/ thugasu me byed padi
33a1(rgyud): du bgrod la sogs parda du shes// sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda// brgyad ni gzugs su gnyis kyi brda// gzhan yang brda mi bye brag ni// skem pa gsang pa'i rdo rje bar/ 
33a2(rgyud): khro mo gas nga ba'i pad+mang 'dra// sku dang drang ba yon tan gyon// mdzub mol rten mthe'u chung ni// nga yi gan du tshur shag yin// mthe ba la brtan mdzub mo bar// khyod kyi gan du 'ong gas yin// mthe'o
33a3(rgyud): mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni// b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin// b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum par ston// bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang // srad dman mgung tho rangs gsum// mdzub tshigs dang po nas gzung nas/ 
33a4(rgyud): rdza ba'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyis byin 'arlabs kyis// lan gsum bar du nan tan gnang // gzhan yang brda'i bye brag rnams// rgyud rnams kun du ma gsungs pa// gnas ni thabs/ 
33a5(rgyud): kyi 'dug stangs so// nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs// zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs// de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing // 'dub thabs ni 'ong ba ste// shes rab 'ong ba nye 'du yin/ 
33a6(rgyud): zabs kyi snyan dang byan// shes rab bzhi ts+tshan+do// du bgrod thams kyi rna ma tog brag// de lan du shes rab nye du thaMng // gnadas shA dz+ra 'i byi brag rnabs// ba dag de bzhin dbyibs dang yang // na
33a7(rgyud): lagatsul las shes par bya// de nas lha mol sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur ro// // dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyam na po gsong ba ste rang bzhin gyi
33b1(rgyud): du ni de gagag sem su dag gas pa dzin byug / 
33b2(rgyud): na mo rdo rje sring po dang / rnab 'byor mablangs med pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' rdorje snying po la nas 'dzum pa mad nas/ dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/ dam cig dang nim ldad // 'bra'as/ 
33b3(rgyud): zang dgu' bar mi 'gyur te// sku med pa 'i 'bras bu bzhin// me yi dus byas dmyal bar s+ho// de byer mchog shin tu bsrung // sangs rgyas tham las thob byar//  mong mtshan dum yi// rdza bsring ba dag
33b4(rgyud): gasrung bar bya// thun mong brgyad dang 'acu bzhi ste// de rnams nges pa shes par bya// de rnams sbyim dam tshig ste// bye brag dam tshig 'asrung bar bya// phung po ldani rigs lngas// 'thung ba ldan sum 'a ro// skyes
33b5(rgyud): mas dpa' sems ma yin// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la// brjed dang brnyas pa la sogs spang // de la mchad dang bstod sogs bya// don dam par na rang rig ste// chags gsag phyir na nga yis
33b6(rgyud): gsungs// tshor ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spun yin te// spyod lam gsum dum yengs bya// gang du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung // tshul sogs pa de bzhin no// migs sogs pa de
33b7(rgyud): bzhin no// gzugs ma lags pa de la/ na 'grung// dkyil labar du zhugs rnal 'byar ba// do nga 'dzin pa bzhin du chod// banas shing gzhi ba la sogs spang // sems can mod yo ldan la/ 
34a1(rgyud): / bo dpa' mo dam tshig bsrung // bza' ba la sogs dus su yang // bdud rtsi sbyor bas dam tshig bsrung // sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la// rang gi spyod dang gzhan spyod la// rjes
34a2(rgyud): sku yi rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// dam tshig bsrung zhing mchod pa'i phyir// lus kyi nyes sdom sku yin te// ngag gi nyes sdom gsung du gsungs// yid kyi nyes snga ma thugs su gsung
34a3(rgyud): oM gyi 'od zer dkar po las// 'dod khams dag par gyur pa ni// sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba'o// de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// bsdu ba oM du shes par bya// 5\u0f7f ni kha dog dmar po las// gzugs
34a4(rgyud): khazas dag pa gsung dam tshig/ hU~M gi kha dog nag mo yis// gzugs med dag pa dam tshig go// oM ni skye bar yang dag gnas// dz+ran de bzhin mgrin par gnas// hUM ni snying gar spro dang bsdu// sku le
34a5(rgyud): / 'gro bcu gnyis su// 'dod khams dag pa dam tshig go/ gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs khams dag pa dam tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'phro bcu gnyis su// gzugs med dag
34a6(rgyud): bdam tshig ste// i dang A dang rgyal bsdu// oMn chu 'i sku bcu gnyil// mAn las kyi sku bcu gnyis// hUM ni 'bras bu sku bcu gnyis// bde 'a chen po'i sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig skye
34a7(rgyud): sdom pal// dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// sangs spyod rdzogs pa'i skugs thugs// ye shes gcig gu bsdom pa'o// skal ba yang ni sku gsung thugs/ 
34a8(rgyud): ga bya ma //  ting bab da // sgra ga zugs dngas na/ sa ni rnamapa sa// me dang mad tsu ngas / de lag zhan bzhi khyams gsangs/ 
34b1(rgyud): sku dang la ba dang 'bras bu la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// a dang ha gnyis rang bzhin gyi// sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya// sngags kyi grangs ni nyi pra stong // drug brgya bzlas par shes par bya// lag
34b2(rgyud): ba bskyod pa rang bzhin kar// rkang pa rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gnas na dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag yang // 'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir// mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang // 
34b3(rgyud): dab bo mkha' 'phro ba zhes pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje pad+ma dang // ji ltar rol pa'i spyod bkun// tha skad kyang na lam sa 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu// theg pa che la smod pa
34b4(rgyud): dang // gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang // rnal 'byor kun la gnod pa dag/ sems can kun la 'tsho byed pa// 'di gsang ba ni dam tshig yin// sbas pa bsrung ba'i rim pa yang // sa kyin blang ba'i dam tshig
34b5(rgyud): 'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i// 'dod chags spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra// rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro rtsa'i sha dang bcud kyi sha/ kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang // mar la
34b6(rgyud): gcig ste'om gnyis// gzhan ni gsum ste yan log bcu// 'di ltar dam cheg yin par gsungs// bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste// dang por grangs dag sa ma ya pa/ 
34b7(rgyud): kha'i khams kyi tshul du ba'al// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gu na thadas kyi dus// nam sras nas ni langs pa dang // na
34b8(rgyud): zhes rab dus// du jug sachod pargyan ma gcad// dam tshig can las mnyams // phyogs 'gyu garten 'ams 'jugs pa'o// dpa' rom pa 'grom 'a rnams// mchod dang bsrung ba ma sa gas
35a1(rgyud): byed// gzhad yang gsang pa'i bye bragapa// gsang ba rnam pa'i dal 'byor ba la// lus la me dang grags gdod// srog gas zug rngu byed pa gtogs// srog chags 'dod pa smod pa
35a2(rgyud): nad/ rang gi rnal 'byor shor sa bya// dam tshig bsdu phyer dben par 'dug/ las su rung na g.yon par 'byam// 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gi bcu pa ni yin par gsungs// zos pa'i dus
35a3(rgyud): gcig lnga bcu'i dor// bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu// sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag yid// rdo rjem byed phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis brgyan mdzes/ 
35a4(rgyud): thA ga mnyam par 'jog pas so// snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa// bye brag yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin
35a5(rgyud): nibacu po'i rang bzhin te// ma ni lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// yA ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs// e ni srog chags gsang ba ste// baM ne ma byin len pa'o// ma ni brdzun du smra ba'o// yAn 'dod chags
35a6(rgyud): // me ni sra me ma chag ste// bi ni gsung gi dmatshig go// ma ni thugs sde da ma tshig go//  ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go// dus gsupa dam tshig ma bsrungs na// 'jig rten pa da 'jam
35a7(rgyud): 'i// rnam smin che ba rang pos gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan pa ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'brang // ngag gnyis pa sna tshogs sgra// kha dog dbyabs rnams 'gyur ba dang / 
35a8(rgyud): sa dmas pa pa/ sa da grubs pags 'grub// dbenas 'bya rnams 'dag// des mi gnyims pashin pasas// zhem spyad thal du// tshogs pa
35b1(rgyud): /  ga / da ma mdzug nga/  ga dang // gas na rgya / ma / de na/ 
35b2(rgyud): chen po bskar// tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pags// gal te nyams pa ma gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan// gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig gam// yul dang lam gyi gan
35b3(rgyud): gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya// 'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // gtor mam chod dang bzlas pa dang // ri lumig sman la sogs dang / 
35b4(rgyud): masogs pas rnams dang // ga tshan pa brgyad dag dang // jig rten 'das pa nam na// sangs rgyas mi mi mtshan ma gcig/ gzhan pa da rgya sa pa// da batshig
35b5(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye 'gyur ba// rin chen sa las skyes pa bzhin// dam ba sku gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das na cham par 'gyur// di lta bu ni med pa'i kyes// shi ma zag
35b6(rgyud): stong pa par gyur// de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// pi wang gling bu skyong kun sogs// rgyu dang brab na brdung mi rung // de bzhin dam tshig med gyu na// sngags bcwa
35b7(rgyud): bsgom pa la sogs pa// 'bras bu med par brlag par 'gyur// nas las nas kyi mu ru ste// dmachag mas ni rdo rje 'chang // tshe 'di ngob par gsungs pa ste// dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus/ 
35b8(rgyud): na ben te// skye ba gzha na pa dang // yan pagagazhan minas mas// na na yin pa gsu la'o// de sa tshig dang rdzun pa//  med da ga ba thal la
36a1(rgyud): 'byor ma mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar ston// nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang // rgyal po'i 'khor yul la sogs 'du// ngag ni snyan cing bde bar 'gyur// 
36a2(rgyud): gcod la sogs tshig smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyi sems can bsad byas kyang // rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sku ni thob par gsungs pa'o// ngag gis phra
36a3(rgyud): gasmras kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur gsung thob 'gyur// yid kyis mnar sems bsams byas kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no// e ma'o rgyud ni
36a4(rgyud): mtshar// dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs pa'o// // rgyag kyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / mo sna pa dge slong shAkya se shes kyis bskur 'gro// / rgya gar skad du/ shrIHd+d+ha
36a5(rgyud): nArA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
36a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sring po la sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang // lA ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro mi'i tshogs dang // rnab 'byor
36a7(rgyud): mtshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la skams par bzhugs so// 'jig rten na ni cher grags pa// dgra ni chen po drug yin te// ji ltar nyi ma nub pa miH// grong khyer kyi ni mi rnams kyi/ 
36a8(rgyud): d+hadang glang po la sogs pa// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin yul drug gi ni da gras// shes rab gi ma dzub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa yi sudapa
36b1(rgyud): khya'othams cad kyi// mgasas pa sogs pa sa// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed/ bde ba med pa'i gnas bu ste// dgra de yongs su gzhom par phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med/ 
36b2(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor med// klod dang sgos pa 'asam gtan med// g.yeng ba'i chos dang skar ma'i tshogs// thams cad spangs te bde ba yi// bstan la bdag nyid legs 'dug te// shes ra
36b3(rgyud): shes bsla yar bya// shing rta li ni 'khor lo sbyar// yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems// de dag las ni bad+mog nas su// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos// ye shes meni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog khrig ste bdud
36b4(rgyud): ros// til kyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skye ba med pa'i gnas su gzung // de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas// mtshan mar snang ba 'gag par 'gyur// de nyid las ni bzlog nas su// rang sems stong par bsdom
36b5(rgyud): bya// chos la bdag med rtogs pa na// de tshe sems ni rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong par ros gang ste// bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod do// shes rab la rol phyin pa ste// 'di la pa sam pa ci yang ma
36b6(rgyud): bstan par bya ba ci yang med// de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol// rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs snga rigs ni brgya la sogs// de nyid 'di la tha dad med// ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas/ 
36b7(rgyud): rjes ni me btsam ltar// sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyung na// rnam rtog gang yang mi btsas lo// ji ltar drug ni 'dod pa la// sman nyid drug tu sbyar te byin// sman las dug 'byung spong ba ya hA// sman pa mkhas pas
36b8(rgyud): shes/ gzhan yang mar dang bar dang // mar gyi snying po mi bags pa// bzungs te 'un kun du 'gyur// de bzhin pa mes gsungs pa yang / drang ba don dang nges pa'i dad/ sman yin na'i bzhi pan/ da
37a1(rgyud): 'jug sa bya// ji lta skye sman pa sre// dgra du gyur pa'i skye bo yis// skad yin rdzas te gardzun na// sman du migs te drag pos nA// zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur// thabs rnams rnams
37a2(rgyud): skusgra ma ste// shes rab brjod du med par gsungs// ji ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis// dug ni dug gis 'byin par byed// ji ltar me yi tshig pa la// de bzhin me yis gdung bar bya// ji ltar 'dod chags
37a3(rgyud): // 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// de na sdang chebs// de sdang nyid /  ra bya// de bzhin gti zug che ba sa// gti mug nyid rjes snang ba bya// dper na rmang nis dpe 'jig
37a4(rgyud): de nyid nags sreg me yi grogs su 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa brten pa bde ba'i yul// dug gis dgra rnams btsam nas gnyis med tha'o// ra lu mig smad la sogs 'di las byung // ji ltar ba rol
37a5(rgyud): thabs ldan pas// gzings su brted rnapa pha rol 'gro// pha rol byin nas 'dor bar byed// de bzhin dang reg tsob 'am kyang // dud med sbrum la brten to// rang rig ye shes thob par bya// rang rig le shwe
37a6(rgyud): thob pa dang // bud med ku mdor bar bya// zab mo'i dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zab mo'i spyad pa spyod par byed// sems can dmyal bachen por ltung // ji ltar ri'i rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig srung
37a7(rgyud): 'thung na// doni phreng ba chen 'o 'gyur// gzhan pa dang kyi srin bu mes// rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed// mtshan mo mel srin bu ya // rab gis 'dzin sreg par byed// spru ma tsam gyi tshul gan
37b1(rgyud): shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par krol// spros pa thams cad nye bar zhe// mtshon bya mtsho ma byed pa men te// lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o// dpal stoms po che'i rgyud las
37b2(rgyud): mngon par rtog pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // gang zhig brtag par byed pa yang // gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa ru// khrud pa yi maN+Dal la// dang bo pa yi rna ma lnga yis// sor gcig tsam du byuka par bya// de das
37b3(rgyud): chen dri chu yis// blugs te me tog sngon po dkras// rgyud la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan// bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang dbus// de nas bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum// bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs te// gang zhig
37b4(rgyud): brtag pa'i mi de la// dang po mtshams gcad grub byas te// klog pa nag po phyer bzlog gon// sma ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang // ber gzogs te shar sgor gnag/ tshil can me mar shar du gtam/ 
37b5(rgyud): btu me long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la smad lnga dang // dri lngas byug ste bkru bar bya// de nas me long nang du yang // gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag bya ste// gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' ru // gdan
37b6(rgyud): sngags btags na// lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan mar 'thung 'the tsom med// mi de rgyan ni tha dad de// lha la sogs mthong bye brag go// dus na 'byung po'i nyim sogs// mtshan ma sna tshogs byung
37b7(rgyud): pa'i tshe// de cigadon ni dbang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang // mdza' bshes zug rdul sogs pa// gdon la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs// 
37b8(rgyud): rus kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang tshigs kyi 'khor la sogs// bskor la mtshan ma brtag par bya// dbang bsrung dus su la shes kyang // dpa' pa de bzhin sdig la sogs// mtshan ma me long dag sa ni/ 
38a1(rgyud): brtags te gnan mang kyi 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma brtag la bla ma yi// nal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug du dbyung ba'i phyir// gas pa dag pa las gas
38a2(rgyud): pad kan mkhris pa dang // 'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhir 'khor lor gnas pa ste// lus kun drus byas gnas bzhi ru// sngags pas lag pas mnye bya ste// me long dkyil du ba
38a3(rgyud): byas na// rlung la sogs pa shes par nges// de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// dug ni brtag pa'i rim pa yang // nad grol yan lag thams cad la// gang du dug zhugs ma
38a4(rgyud): ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i spyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te// mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya// dpa' stobs po rje rgyud las mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i maru ste gnyis
38a5(rgyud): pa'o// // gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang // gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// gtso bo'i bzlas pa khri'am 'bum// bsnyen pa byas te de nas yang // gsar
38a6(rgyud): dngupa las paco byas te// nang du dkyil 'tshar rdzogs pa 'am// yang na 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas// rdo rje rab la sogs bya// yungs kar la sogs 'acwa lnga dang // rin ce lnga dang smad lnga dang / 
38a7(rgyud): denang gzhag ste rab gnas bya// yongs su rdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang kro ga 'am shing shun nam// dur khrod dag gar ras la// bsad dang bgegs bslad tshul bzhin bya// @
38a8(rgyud): dang 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyur na// sngags kyang yongs su rdzogs pa bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo los// lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongs su ma rdzogs ca
38b1(rgyud): / dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris te// bsrung ba'i lus la ma na bar bsgog// rtsibs pa can drugs gsung dru // ye gadrug ni byas pa ste// bcud bya grus pas chan par bsgos// dbu la ge
38b2(rgyud): brib te// bar ma dathams cad bsal bar bsam// cho ga yongs su rdzogs bya ste// bco byas snod ni 'dog gyur// legs par smras te spyi bo 'am// mgrin pa de bzhin dpung ba yi// tshangs pa'i phug yongs
38b3(rgyud): mnyam// sor bzhi dag tu bcing bar bya// gzhan yang na da pa'as rnal 'byor pa// dag la srung na dang per yang// din pasal bsangs te gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byas sngags g.yum dgod// 
38b4(rgyud): yang gnas ni sum cu bdud// thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mtshan pa yang // nus bzhin mthun par shes par bya// de nas stan nam mal cha la// oM AHbadz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hA phaT// 
38b5(rgyud): gzhan la'ang bri bar bya// gzhan yang lags pa g.yas pa yis// mthil du gur kum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sbom mo khro ma yis// skye bo dpral
38b6(rgyud): ba dang // 'og gi slo ga nyis yan lags// sngags dang bcas nas legs pa bco// gzhan yang byud pasnga la// sngags dang bcas na/ bsrung bar bku // dpas sponas kyi chen chud las
38b7(rgyud): 'khor mo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // bgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal te// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ltar na// ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags/ 
38b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes kyis ni de nyid kyi// rtog pa rab tu bshad par bya// del mi shes kyi ni gnas// rnam pa ldi du shes bya ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang
39a1(rgyud): gsu // dmas pasha kyis legs pa tod// da rgyas pa shes no// u ma dag sngags can da la pa'o// de sbyar rtogs pa rgya migs// nang gzung dgas
39a2(rgyud): rtogs// de nyid dang bral ye shes so// de nas gsang ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa dang rlung dang theg ler rtogs// rtog pa de dang bral ba ni// gsang ba'i ma shes yin par bshad// dga' ba mchog dang bral
39a3(rgyud): dga'// lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa// bde bar rtog pa rnam rtag ste// de spong rab gsang ye shes so// de nas ye shes chen po 'ani// dang por mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i// ye shes de nyid yod pa
39a4(rgyud): drab tog / spang ste de bzhin 'jog/ de nyid rang rig chen po ste// de nyid pe shes chen po'o// de ltar shes da rdong 'dzin gyi// sa ni nges par thol pa'o// dpal stoms po che'i rgyud las ye shes brtag pa'i
39a5(rgyud): chen po yi// rtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang po ro mnyam gyur pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la// sku mdog phyag mtshan ya segs pa// phung po khams dang
39a6(rgyud): mched chags//  dang bla na cig me dang // dag da mtshig dag 'bral bdang // de la sogs pa mas cad dkun// smram ma nas par bya// denyid gan ga ces kyi// rang ga
39a7(rgyud): kyi nyid la// gnyis su med par bsgom pa ni// de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa'o// / dpal stobs po che'i rgyud lam ma shes chen po'i le'u ste lnga ba'o// dek+Sha
39a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang // rdo rje zhing sa la sogs padalal po dang / mkha' 'a grom dang / rnal 'byor pa dang // ma mo mchog khothams cad rjes su yi rang nas phyi nang gsang
39b1(rgyud): mchod nas/ gag zugs nas la nAgs banapa byas na ga// dab ma jugs // b+hU sad+hA dag na
39b2(rgyud): kyis sgyur ba mo// // rgya ga skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+da dz+nyA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub phyogs chos
39b3(rgyud): cu rtsa bdun gyi// ra sus rna le lab ma zin che na 'o// slong po la yang dag phyag 'tshal lo// dbang bani do nyid bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje snying po che bdag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lhan
39b4(rgyud): gr-i/ de nyid dang por bshad bya ste// drug cu rtsa bzhi dpe byad yod// sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs// snga ni ye shes lnga yin te// dpa' ba gcig pa chos kyi dbyings// phyag mtshan su mdog ga/ 
39b5(rgyud): / nas gsungs// gu h+ya'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad// nas dang sor tshigs yin par 'dod// de nyid thabs dang shes rab yin// don dam nyid la dbyer med de// bsgom bya med de slob pa med// bsgoms pa
39b6(rgyud): thob pa ci yang med// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du med// sems kyi gzhi la sku lnga dang // ston pa med cing bstan pa med// 'jigs dang rnam rtog kun dang bral// de nyid bzhi pa'i nga nyid do// 
39b7(rgyud): nyid de// srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang haM// ya ni chos rnams thog ma nas// ma skyes pa yi don yin no// haM ni gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong // rdzing 'jug gsum ni sku gsung thugs/ 
39b8(rgyud): dang spu lnga dang // rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad sogs// de dag rlung gi de nyid de// de nas theg le 'de nyid kyang // nyi zla thabs dang shes rab ste// sngags kyi phreng ba mtshan dpe
40a1(rgyud): thig le ye shes lnga rang bzhin// gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yin// phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shes// de nas 'og gi sgo dag ni// de nyid yang dag bshad bya ste// rtsa gsub lkugs
40a2(rgyud): thugs kyi skye// rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yin no// tsa ni nyi shu bzhi// de nyid me shes nyi shu bzhi// chos sku'i phrin las nyi shu la na// kha sbyar thabs dang shes rab ste// 'dzag dang 'bar ba gnyis med pa
40a3(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste// drug ni de nyid drug yin te// sgrol ma rlung gi de nyid de// mo ni gos dkar ngo bo nyid// bcu drug stong pa bcu drug yin// bzhi ni ye shes bzhi yin no// rnam par thar dang stong
40a4(rgyud): pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad dang // reg sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu// ye shes lnga bcu la sogs pa// rgya 'dab de nyid yin par nges// rtsa de gnas pa'i rim pa yang // 'khor lo bzag/ 
40a5(rgyud): khrug pa las// g.yas g.yon sprul ltar 'brel ba ste// phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu// gsum pa'i dbang gi de nyid kyang // sih+la shes rab chos dbyings te// gzur thabs kyi ye shes pani/ 
40a6(rgyud): cani log sen gnas yin to// dga' mamachog dag byang chub phyogs// rang bzhin dga' bachos su ste// bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis// bcu drug stong ba bcu drug go// rgyud
40a7(rgyud): sbru ma tsam// gang zhig rang rig 'dod pas kyang // dang byor rngo tsha shes bya ste// de nas de nyid shes par bya// gal te de nyid mi shes par// zab mo'i lam nyid sgom byed na// 'bras bu med cing brla/ 
40a8(rgyud): pari reg/ rgya me nyid pa shes na// du khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra// de bzhin du grang zin mo 'dra// rgud pa'ide nyid pa zhes na// grong khyer gnas pa'i ston pa 'ang // kyi lag srin po dz+ra/ 
40b1(rgyud): phyag mtshan de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra// phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal ba bang gi btsun mo 'dra// rlung gi de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin skye bo'i du ba 'dra// rtsa yi de nyid pa
40b2(rgyud): shes na// tsan dang shing gi sbrul sogs 'dra// lus kyi gnye sa dag dang dz+ra// lus kyi dram chu dang 'dra// thig lo'i di nyid mi shes na// tsan dan shing gi mdze 'dra// 'khor motsha nyid ma shes
40b3(rgyud): na// brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra// de bzhin srid pa'i 'khor lo 'dra// pad+ma'i de nyid ma shes na// 'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 'dra// stug pa'i de nyid ma shes nA// mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra// 9
40b4(rgyud): nyid ma shes na// thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra// gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal pho brang 'dra// byung sems de nyid ma shes na// mi gtsang sgo yi'i lud pa 'dra// sing+ge'i de nyid ma
40b5(rgyud): nan// mtshon sogs las byung khrag dang 'dra// dga' ba de nyid ma shes na// smad 'tshong ma yi 'dod chags 'dra// spang bya'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po 'dra// gnyen po'i de nyid ma she
40b6(rgyud): rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer 'dra// rang rig de nyid ma shes na// 'dus byas nam mkha' stong pa 'dra// gzhan yang de nyid bco brgyad ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad snga ma'i tshul dang ni/ 
40b7(rgyud): glog dang sprin sa bu// de nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur// kyi ho mgon po thugs rje tshe// rang rig la shes tshol ba la// rang dang gzhan gyi sde pa la// 'di la khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das
40b8(rgyud): la pa// khyad par chen pa nyid de// gzhan ni khyad par dbang ba zhi dang // de lalam gyid nyid brtags// chad pa bdag dang dbang phyug dang / bya ba da byed pa pa nyid las// rgyu lags rgyud las kyang
41a1(rgyud): tshigs// s+yAd pa ga ga chags pa// kau kyims bad+mag pa pa shan du gso'o// bcom sngon 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//  pa gas pa'i sa kyis// gdan
41a2(rgyud): rnamapa' rnam ma rang nan// rang ga mi shes gang da pa'o// na na sa nyigs sa rnam pa min// dpan pa rnamasas phyi mi gad// de da la coM po gnanas/ 
41b1(rgyud): dang // ba ga na kya gas// / da sa to// dpa na tsha sa ldan// rdo sa tshe rnam pa rna
41b2(rgyud): dpe da tshu pa sgom pa min// dngos dang dang sa med domanyam na// ma bsgoms na yang bsgoms pa nyid// bsgom dang me ba sgom gnyis ka med// 'dagasas de la sems ze na// gzungs
41b3(rgyud): yi dpung rnams 'joms// phyogs bcu'i dag rten khams bcas pa'o// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spangs// 'bring gis rjes thob stong
41b4(rgyud): rnams rjes thobasku ma ra// seng gi lha bu'i la spyod de// bzhi ba yin par gyi sku gsungs// de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod parnab pa gsum yin te// kun tu bzang po b+ha su su// a 'a rkyen
41b5(rgyud): yin no// spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang zas// gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang // ngo bo dang ni tshad dang pang // thabs dang dgongs pa dgas pa dang // mkhas pas kun la sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas
41b6(rgyud): rigs// rin chen rigs dang 'ad+mad rigs// las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin// sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang // dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa dag/ sangs
41b7(rgyud): sa kyi ni mchog gi spyod// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin// bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod// dmachog yid 'ong dus bzhi ru// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rin chen spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam ches 'dzin// 
41b8(rgyud): spyod pa yin// dam tshig thams cad ldan pa dang // ma grol la sogs dgrol ba ni// rta mi rgyal po'i spyod pa yin// rab nyal la 'chag pa gsum// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas rkye
42a1(rgyud): gsang bas g.yeng bathos ni// tha phrag sa spyod pa'o//  ma ba dang dun ci gyu// sdug tu bsnyed da ma pa gtsug/ la hU~M sto ste// kun ma drug ste byug
42a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas// mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o// gnas ni kha nam tho med// spyi nang g.yeng med gnas yin no// rtog pa 'joms pa smo' pa'i dus// grub na rdzu 'phrul ston
42a3(rgyud): dus// rngabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang // sgo dang skur ba med pa'o// dgongs pa gnyen po'i stobs yin te// rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa dang // 'ug rngu'i kha zas ma yin te// bla ma'i
42a4(rgyud): legs bsten blang // kha zas rnam rtog rdung// las dang po yis bya bar gsungs// dbye ba gsum dang bye brag ni// gong du gsungs pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog med sems de nyid// 
42a5(rgyud): 'gags dang sbal bston// 'di nyid 'grub pa'i tshad men no// dgongs pa sa yang gnyis yod de// gtsang sme spang ba dag dra pa'i don// dgongs pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang sems brtan ga
42a6(rgyud): pa dang // phyag rgya khyad par tshol ba dang // nges 'dul gang zag gtsug pa dang // mi mos skur ba dgag pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i rka spyod kyi sa// 'khor gyi dpa' ba mkha' 'gro
42a7(rgyud): dang brgyal dang 'brel gyur pas// dbugs dbyung ba mi te 'dzin gyis// thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas// thams cad mkhrer gcig 'di skad gsol// dngos po mnyam gyur pa / 
42a8(rgyud): pa 'dis 'a mtshar te// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spang ba mo// spyod pa 'di sang ngom tshar te// chos rnams stong par rom nyaman// lha dang mi lhag ma yo// gtsang sde 'dud rtse rog cig la/ 
42b1(rgyud): dpe spyod gal yod// dbang bsrung 'dang drong 'dren// mnyam gan gra rjes rnob ga la yod// thams cad sems kyi la// gzu dang yin pa lamarjod// mngags byed napas bka' dul ba/ 
42b2(rgyud): 'khor ba thog pa med pa nas// lhan cig skyes 'i sgri ba g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// drwa ba 'i byed de// mig gi rang gi rdub mthong // sems kyis de nyid mi rtog
42b3(rgyud): par// za dang gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin// de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// bdud rtsi'i de nyid ma shes te// gtsang dang ma gtsang la sogs brtags// de phyir
42b4(rgyud): rgyal po bstan// gnas pa'i rkyen dang g.yeng ba'i rkyen// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan// rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag rjes tho ba rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa pi rab rib kyis// 
42b5(rgyud): khrul pa sa gzung 'dzin gnyis su brtags// de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan// sgra spyod 'di sa nan tan gyis// de nas thams cad dga' ning mgu nas yi rangs te/ phyi nang gi mchod pas mched nas mi
42b6(rgyud): bar gyur to// dpal lo shes phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod bung du 'jug pa rdzogs s+ho// // rnam 'byang ma tsan+da ma pe dang / dge slong shAkya le shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / 6// phya gar skad du/ 
42b7(rgyud): shId+henA dz+wa la tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal kun tu pazang po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye sa sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// rgyud reg
42b8(rgyud): rgyal ba gag/ mi shes gang lags 'bar ba gang // dpas ni gang lags bdag la gsungs// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// dpal de gnyis med la shes te// gnyis med pa dpon roms byus
43a1(rgyud): gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang reg go// sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes che// rang byin brlab paste bar te// dkyil mthor mdza ma gas par 'o// srin ma tshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar// rlung
43a2(rgyud): gnas shing ring du 'gyur// de nyid dra dag pa dbye dang// rgyas par bya gsum yod de// dang por drang ba'i rnam pa yang // 'drongs pa'i tshad ni gsum yod de// sgo gsum yon tan gsum ldan na// so
43a3(rgyud): du 'byung bar nges// 'brengs sor gnyis tha ma la// sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung // sbom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang por bya gdong nyid na gnas// rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bani// 
43a4(rgyud): bcu drug khams bco brgyad// nyi shu ste bar nyi shu lnga// skeb pa ru'ini gnas pa'o// sman la sogs pa kun ldang bas// dang pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// dam snang sku rags bcing ba dang // rgyab yol da
43a5(rgyud): dang mtshad pa dbug/ gdan khri dbul dang sku klus dbul// sman bzod dbul dang me mchod dbul// de nas reg bya'i mchod pa dbul// kun rdzob ste yi rtse mo'am// khro bo mdzub mo'i rtse mo la// bdud rtsi
43a6(rgyud): legs byas te// mkhas pas reg phyi'i mchod pa dbul// mngon du shra ba gdon mi Ta// bde 'a chen po'i mchod pa yis// khams gsum mchod pa gdon mi za// dar ram men tri sor bzhi'i tshad// 
43a7(rgyud): par ska rags dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// ras phal la sogs rgyab yol dbul// shing bu rigs dang 'thun pa yin// sbom phra rigs kyi bdag po tsam// dri med sman dang
43a8(rgyud): ldan pa'i// zug rngu mi skyed mtshad rdzas kyis// bai re tsana'i lam du mchod// dri ni ma mu yis khrus byas te// khrus kyis lus la mchod pa dbul// sman dang snum gyi phye ma yis// zho gnyis dag tu mtsha
43b1(rgyud): dag// shin tu do ba'i me dag gis// gsus bya'ims chod pa dbul// dad pa cad mnyaH kA ta// gdan sre bsgru ra pa'i mchod pa dbul// dmas 'drangs par gdon mi sa// de nas rgyas par bya
43b2(rgyud): yang // gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma kun// rgyas par byed pa'i las yin te// rgyas pa'i skor ba gsum byas na// dper na me tog pad+ma bzhin// de nas dbye ba'i rim
43b3(rgyud): / gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// dus gsum lce yi rtse mos kyang // bskyed na nges par kha 'byed do// de nyid gsum ni me rang bzhin// me 'bar ba yi rkyen gur pa// rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste/ 
43b4(rgyud): des me nyed 'bar bar bshad// gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag dang // srog rtsal rlung ni dbu mar dgag/ bum pa rnapal med rlung phul nas// sgod bu phyi rol drag tu bud// lus kyi dal dub ma mnyams te// 
43b5(rgyud): rdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen// bde ba las ni rdo rje 'chag// bde ba yis ni bde ba 'grub// rgyu bde ba las 'bras bu 'di// rgyu yi nang na 'di mchog la// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go// de nas bde 'i rtso
43b6(rgyud): // srid pa dag ga dang rlu dgag pa// gan sanas gnas su te ga zung ste// gsas brkyang bas ni rim dgag// dpe' jig nanas mtha' 'grag men// g.yon brkyang bayin kyang ma he/ 
43b7(rgyud): dang ma du gzung // de banan rnam mas dbu mar gzung // de dag ku gi bye brag kyang // dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon// de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye bra/ kyang/ 
43b8(rgyud): bya rgyal gyis// rlung du bye mas byar te// nang migapag tu rgyasas byas na// zin pa di matsam med// dpa ma pa ma sa ni nyis pal// chung mo dzin byab gsas/ 
44a1(rgyud): nams kyi drug/ gzhad yang las brgyad chung rnams dag/ dang ba nyid du bsdus byas na// zin par 'dil ba tsom med// dbye ba ba rnam pa'i ma na go// byed ba sgom par tshu
44a2(rgyud): mi ben pa la 'i chom med// gnas gsum dag tu k+Sha bsams te// dbugs gsum pa yis yar drangs te// ste ba'i sen la drangs kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yin// mdzes pa'i phyi tshe
44a3(rgyud): nyid la// gyen du bkan dang thur du kan// drang por g.yas g.yon btsan thabs la// ka ti'i gzer ni btsan thabs gcig/ sbom po khri mos mnan pa ste// bla mi'i zhal nas ma blangs na// lus kyi
44a4(rgyud): nad pa ni kun nas s+ho// mu 'gags sus spangs la sogs// lus smad nad sA nyi shu 'byung // gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis de// bla ma'i nas nas shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par byab
44a5(rgyud): phyir// lus srog yongs spyod thams cad kyis// dus gsub saN+Dal dang bcas mchod// lus srog btang bar phangs pa bas// man ga dam pa de bas pangs// de bas btsan thabs legs pa
44a6(rgyud): sba// man ga chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas// de nyid chud du shes par bya// zab mo'i don ston rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje phag mo la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad byung 'di// khyod la ga ta
44a7(rgyud): dam du spros// kun la sbal nA dam tshig nyams// kye sa rgyud kyi don 'dri la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// thams cad ngo mtshar cher
44a8(rgyud): te// dga' nings kunas yi rang ngo // dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzog s+ho// // sang+ga la'i gling gi rnal 'byor
44b1(rgyud): le dang / dge slong gakya shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @6// rgya ga skad du/ hrIHn+d+ra mA la tan+ta dang / bad ska du/ dpal zla ba'i phreng ba'i chud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpar pa byug
44b2(rgyud): po// kye ho mgon pa rje can// sgron ma nyi shu rtsa bani me// nges pa gang lags tshad gang lags// rang bzhin grub pa de ltar lags// mgon po bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
44b3(rgyud): sbal pa// rang yinan grub pasgrub 'dod pa// bla ma'i bka' drin legs mnas te// dung khrod ma sogs sa phyogs su// bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan// brtags pa las dang po yi gnas// gang
44b4(rgyud): mchog la brtag tu med// yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'dug ste// bla med sems gzung rnal 'byor pas// sgo gsum dpa pa'i tshad brtag ste// bcing ba gsum ni nges bsgoms pas// skye ba gcig gi
44b5(rgyud): / grub par nges// dbugs pa cing kun rdzob sna rtse yin// yid bcings sor bzhi nam mkha'i khams// sems bcings rang reg bsam me khyab// chu rkyen las ni sna tshogs las// sems can mos pa
44b6(rgyud): 'byung // de dag bcings gsum dag pa yis// sems can bcings las nges par grol// bla ma'i nal nas shes par bya// 'du shes gsum gyi cha las grol// thig le cha gsum phra mo ni// yan lag
44b7(rgyud): ldan 'byung ba'i rim// sgra dang rang rig re rer snang // stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul// sa dang lam sogs rim pa kun// rang 'azhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar// de nas sgron ma'i tshad bstan te/ 
44b8(rgyud): dare spyi dang bye brag ste// brgya phrag gnyis deng bcu gnyis dang // yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba// gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum cul// yi ge bcu dgu las thung
45a1(rgyud): // 2Sh+ka ga stsa //  ra bcugs pa byung ba/ phyugs zugs kyi sto 'o// rgya rgyas m-ig nag/ 
45a2(rgyud): b.las gang gyur ba// gsang ba bsam gyis sde khyab 'o// rgyad du gnyis yi ge gcig/ rin can 'bar pa'i rdzang ca dade// sum cu rtsa gtsigs gos// nyi Ta rtsa gnyis las srung ba// ra
45a3(rgyud): mkha' mnyam pa'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ dam tshig chen po'i rgud kyi tshad// drug cu yi ge nyi shu gcig/ gsang ba rdo rje rab tu grags// drug cu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// bcu drug
45a4(rgyud): che yi tshad// bzhi bcu rtsa gcig la ge lnga// nam mkha' chen po'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ ye shes 'bar ba'i ldang med do// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge dgu// ye shes phreng ba'i cha
45a5(rgyud): ro// sum cu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i tshad yin no// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag/ me yi phreng ba'i tshad yin no// nyi shu rtsa gnyis bco brgyad dag/ ye shes rgyal po'i ldang tshad do// 
45a6(rgyud): dud cu rtsa brgyad rkang pa phyed// chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshad yin no// chags su bcad pa nyi shu wa// ye shes bsam pa'i ldang chad dade// dgu bcu go brgyad las byung ba// ye shes gsang ba'i tshad ma
45a7(rgyud): ma pa gang yin la// gsang ba rdo nga rgyal po'i tshad// brgya dang nye shu rtsa gnyis ni// rdo rje rgyal po la'i tshad// snga bcu rgya gsum le ke ban+d+ha// du khrod rgyan gyis yang med do// sum cu chags
45a8(rgyud): / bzugs pags rdzos cad// klu dus gas rnam sa// byung bags sa 'dud gyi kyil// banas rje le ga ga zhu bte// nyi ma 'amatsha ba'i gzhung med do// sum du mig
45b1(rgyud): drus na cig kyis ston pa shes byas sa// de zlog pa med pa'o// sgra sa de nyid gang ston pa// gas pa'i rgyal po'i da ltar des// nges pa lnga sngon dang byab// du khyod brgyad kor dung khrod bcas// dang /

45b3(rgyud): hrud// sasnang pa des spyon nyi la la'o// chud des bsgrub gsum thor na phreg/ nad sogs lnga snyed pe shes 'byar// den pa 'khor thams cad dga' nas chud thams cad byed na pa yi rang lngar gyur to// dang

46a1(rgyud): rna ma/ bod skad du/ dpa' rin chen par ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpam kun tu babang po la phyag 'tshal mo// he he do phreng po dang // mkhar spyod mas sogs bdag/ 
46a2(rgyud): gsum legs par bsdus nas ni// ra 'i chen po'i dbye ba nyon// la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud// ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud// i byes a las gnyis med rgyud// thabs ni sku ste shes ra
46a3(rgyud): gsungs// gnyis med zhugs su shes par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ba'o// a ma la ho e ma'o// thabs ni la las ji ltar byung // ra las shes rab ji lta
46a4(rgyud): a las gnyis med ji ltar byung // sku gsung thugs su ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhir ji ltar dbye// e ma'o mgon pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// a las aH

46a6(rgyud): / 'di nyid las ni shes rab kyi// ra mi 'byung ba'i rgyu dang gnas// ra ni chags phyir shes rab ste// shes rab yi ge bcu drug brda// la ni nub phyir thabs yin te// thabs kyi yi ge bzhi bcu'i badz+ra/

46b1(rgyud): ma dAni gsung // zhe sdang snyeng stobs yid len te// sku gsung thugs kyi 'gyur ba'o// yul brgyad de gsung la brgyad// thugs la brgyad de nye shu ba'i// rel nyi shu bzhi rungs// gnas na te

46b3(rgyud): dkyi nges pa dang // nu ma gnas dang gnas nges pa// gtong ba des dang gor ba des// grangs dris rigs nges bco sngar nges// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa 'o// dman pa'i rim pa dang por gsung /
