49b6(rgyud): za ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po ma spangs su mar bsgom// phung sogs pa brten lnga rnams la// sgo gsum dpo ma spangs pa// tha mal ba dang bskyed rim gnyis// gong bag khyad par shes bya ste/ sna
49b7(rgyud): gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// bdud pa rnam dag la sogs pa// sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs rtog pa las logs nas// phra ba'i gnas su gnas byed pa// gnas kyi khyad par ma
49b8(rgyud): 'o// 'i rnam par 'jug pa dang / gong du sumar bzlog pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs nyid// ye shes men cher 'bar te// srung sogs spru mar gang 'dzin pa// rten gyi khyad par bgrang la
50b1(rgyud): gzung 'dzin char// 'phob ma spangs yang te// rten ma grangs gteg pas// sems 'gras de nyid dang ga pazhas// shong ba ma spangs par yul// dbang cam nos su ba spangs// 
50b2(rgyud): gnyen pom spangs pa'o// rang rig skyi la sems pa las// sngon 'gro ma spangs ma spangs brgyad// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la// 'phob ma spangs rang rig bsgom/ 
50b3(rgyud): phyag rgya bgrang sa rang rig las// phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni// bla mi'i zhal nas shes par bya// ded med bla ma ma bsten dang // bla ma dam pa ma rnyed dang / 
50b4(rgyud): ngo bo ma shes par// rang dag 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dpengan sprul gyi 'om bzhin// de na sa ngas pa bco lnga yang // rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas dang yang // gtang bgo ma
50b5(rgyud): grangs dang rim// nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs// sngags ni spros bcas spros med des// rkyen ni ye shes me rlung des// rgyu 'bras gnas ni a haM ngas// dbang bzhi gongaH
50b6(rgyud): 'byin gnyen po nges pa dang // ngo bo nges dang dbye ba des// las nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag/ bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes// ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan gyi
50b7(rgyud): su shes gyur na// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // gong bu chu dang gtsu
50b8(rgyud): /  ga zugs pas 'das te// gnas 'arnam pa pa ba// spyod nadapa 'a ste/ da ma tha pa gnas// dbye sa su da sa ca/ 'a
51a1(rgyud): chen pos phyag 'tsham mo// sde sa sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas//  rgyas mongs pa migs// gang phyi sems can thams cad kyis// mya ngan 'das 'tho'i bya'i phyes/ dad da
51a2(rgyud): 'grus rdzogs byas te// kla sa'i rjes su 'jug par bya// rang rig gnyis su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gcod nas ma skyes ma grub la// bye dang grub pa
51a3(rgyud): 'phrul// dngos por mnyam gyur ba la// dman dang rgyan pa 'dzin pas 'khrus// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la// sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'jus/ 
51a4(rgyud): rang bzhin ldan gyis grub bya 'o// nu dang rkyen ces skyebs 'phrul// 'ad+ma da ba spyad bras bas// sgo sa spyod yul byeng pas la la// mama' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// dag dang rnas
51a5(rgyud): bas 'khrul// shes brjod yul las 'das pa la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtogs kun gyis stong ba la// dngos por
51b1(rgyud): 'dzin pas 'khrul// rang nyid gnyis su med pa la// bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi// theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la// spro dang skur pa 'debs pas 'thur/ 
51b2(rgyud): sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis// las kyis rnam smin la sogs la// lta bas skur ba 'debs pas 'khrul// rang rig gzod nas 'od gsal la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/ 
51b3(rgyud): rje 'dzin par 'dod pas 'khrul// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste// 'khrul bzhi 'khrul ba las 'das na// 'dod chags chen po com ldan 'ad
51b4(rgyud): sdang zhe brang bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin ne sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de 'din gti mug bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis nges par grol bkur gyis// 'di sa
51b5(rgyud): gzhan gyis grol ba min// bdag posu dang bla ma spun// bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhar// skye ro'i bems
51b6(rgyud): dadam tshig gtso bor bzung // 'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung // kye ma mgon rdo gyi sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na// de'i ngor ji ltar lags// ni spang sa sogs de
51b7(rgyud): rje snying po sring rje che// legs par nyon la yid la rung // las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi// chu 'bras mi shes gti zag s+ho// lus sems kun nas 'khrug pa dag/ zhe sdang yin te sgrogs
51b8(rgyud): kyis// kun nas bslang te nor bu'i mthar// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chags so// dbang sogs ngo bo gang las shes// 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rang dag ngo bo klang pa gnas/ 
52a1(rgyud): rigs spang bar gtan poste// dbang sgyum gang nas dang // dbang po sgo bsdus thabs ldan no// gongs smra ba'i rgyud 'thung ba la// phyang sang chen por gyur pas/ 
52a2(rgyud): gzhan gyi don du gyung ba dang // de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang // mang po me mos spong ba dang // nyon mongs spyi yis zil mnon// bye brag 'dod chags na sdang sogs// ril gyis ma
52a3(rgyud): 'og ma yi// rnam rtog gang yang me skye dang // nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spyong// gnyen po yin par nges pa dang // nyon mongs su rtse tsamami ste// gnyis ni gong de 'dra ba ste// bcu yis
52a4(rgyud): chags chen po dag/ bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste// ni sdang sa sogs de bzhin no// zab mo'i lta spyod ma rtogs par// sngags stong bzlas pa la sogs byed// de dag ngal bdon
52a5(rgyud): // de dag thus dpapa saste// 'any+dza ga dam pa brgyas T+Ta!// 'phrul des zhin mas// sa bar byad kyi cho thang /  kyi don pa dag rjes dul
52a6(rgyud): dpal ye shes rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgyag kyi mkhan po gA ya d+hA ra dang / mo chub dge slong shAHye shes kyis bsku pa'o// / rgyag
52a7(rgyud): badz+ra DA ka gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye// dbang rnams
52a8(rgyud): dpel bde ma so// gce la tshang byad par med da pa ci// sems can de ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag pa dang med dam ci// dam tshig chung du myar mchis// de nyams bgags babs par
52b1(rgyud): dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes blugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang
52b2(rgyud): denges g.yon te// lus gsun nas pa 'ang 'a la// de byer sems kyi pade// bakhrud dang gtor dang sreg pa dang // mabyin pa'i rten dang gon byed pas// sa dang bla dang mi dang drung // nam pakha
52b3(rgyud): bo gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim gyis pa ba phrad dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzog
52b4(rgyud): 'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsung // gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go// 'di yis ngan 'gro srid
52b5(rgyud): bas grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi bzhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin// 'di ni rang
52b6(rgyud): ga bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i// gzugs brtan yongs su rdzogs padang // ras dang
52b7(rgyud): na la sogs pa yi// gzugs brlan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byed brlabs ye shes dba' byas nas// ma yin 'ang nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma la sogs dre k+Sha ran// phung sogs
52b8(rgyud): benas sangs rgyas la// tsa'i byed namatshad mi byed// dan pa gzhan yang dbya ba dag/ 'bral ba dang ni la khrul nga'i gzhi// btsas mche bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba yin pa lta bu yi// dbang / 
53a1(rgyud): banas rlo par mi gyu te// man pa'i thad pas sred pa 'ches/ ma rnam pa mamatsha zas 'bang bdag 'o// debang dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // b+h+ya sa
53a2(rgyud): bdun // ma dum pa rtag tu brnyan//  mas dregs nga sa ste// nga gi chud mkhyen pa dang // logs smrang shing go myunag// yan dag cid ma yin pa zlab/ 
53a3(rgyud): dbyed cing // che ba'i nga rgyal ma gnas shing // 'jig rten lta spyod dong 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gcol por dbye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste/ 
53a4(rgyud): rgyan gyi kyad 'ang thal ba'o// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags// da
53a5(rgyud): napha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis// pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi byog// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi ni dkyil
53a6(rgyud): ste// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med pa yi// grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam
53a7(rgyud): chog nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dmachog nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dmachog nyams gyur na// brdzun dang
53a8(rgyud): ba dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dmachog nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam// dmatshig nyams pa de dang
53b1(rgyud): dpe na ma rgya po dag/  dun pa dang shugs/ rnamam zhi/  pa gyu// dngas sa
53b2(rgyud): rgyas sems can pa // rdzu cis kyan pa me myed kyang // rang ga gzhan ga rkyen dag //  sems las sus gu dang //  rkye pa dang mas kyi par// mig padun sa mig pa// don
53b3(rgyud): // yos su rdzogs da mardzogs pas/ sangs rgyas sems sa su /  san ste// sa lugs mu shA' 'is/ nga
53b4(rgyud): de dag pa dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pa na// sems can gdod nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje phag thos yang nus pa// phrag gcod la sogs dang tshig gi/ dbye ba byed kyis bdag la/ 
53b5(rgyud): gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa kar stsal pa// rang gi nus dgas mas g.yos kyang// gsad pa'i 'du shes ma gyu // srog gtsad tams bcung du rjes// gzhan gyis gnang
53b6(rgyud): ca ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs payin// dri las bzlog pa chen por nges// gangashegs byed chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs char skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du des/ 
53b7(rgyud): srungs can mongs su na 'khrig/ chen po las nan mongs rjebya// de ni che gtsa des// dum 'tsha/  // mi shes pa dag med nga// brjed dus la rdzogs
53b8(rgyud): tshogs /  lda da / ma nga gan //  dag // ltung ba mi pa
54a1(rgyud): byinang rdo rje slob dpon gyis// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor man po bzhengs// tshul dang 'thun par bshad par bya// dam tshig grong 'og bye brag gas// bla ma ra
54a2(rgyud): shes par bya// gzhan yang phyogags pa'i bye brags// sbyin theg gis ni sdig pasreg phyir// nang gi sbyi meg chen po 'tsham// rab pa'i don rkun gnag me// thabs kyi
54a3(rgyud): lo bdun dang ni mo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun gzhag chen po'i me// zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni// 'bring du gsungs te nag bdun sogs// rgyun gzhag mon tung ngu
54a4(rgyud): gsungs// rgyas pa la sogasad bzhin te// rang bzhin ga ded nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes ma rang 'azhin// 'di ni rgyun gzhag chen po'i mye// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i
54a5(rgyud): phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi thad shing yin// man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang ga
54a6(rgyud): la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dga'i nang mgu bar gyur// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi
54a7(rgyud): rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang // lots+tsha ba dge sbyong shAHye shes kyis bskur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shA dz+wa la ik+Sha kuh+ya tan+d+ha rAng / bod skad du/ 
54a8(rgyud): dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos 'dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
54b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun to zlog sa stoms par zhugs so// tsha' khor 'dus pa'i nang na rdo rje phag mos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor gang logs 'pho ba gang // 'cha ba gang lags
54b2(rgyud): shi ba gang // ro ni gang lags ro chen gang // de bzhin shi ba chen po gang // thal ba gang lags thal chen gang // cha cha gang lags tsha tsha yi// chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis
54b3(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor shes ni gsungs pa yin// dus min lha ni gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i
54b4(rgyud): / dang yang // dus tshad nges par shes bya ste// bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyis// 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar dris// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// sraH/ 
54b5(rgyud): rtsol ba la thim ste// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang ba dang bral ba yi// skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas nag
54b6(rgyud): 'dun par du gzhag/ lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das// de ni shi ba chen por grags// lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra// 'di nyid do zhes gsungs pa ste// ye shes dbab dang ye shes brtan// mkha
54b7(rgyud): spyodas spyod sa 'og spyod// skye bo mgrin pa snying ga ru// dri'i thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/ khrus byas gnas ni bcu
54b8(rgyud): // dri mi theg sa bcug nyis bya// dpa' tsham kha' 'gros byin gyis brla'o// gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kur// dngos su gnas pas rar tu nges// re bar bris pa 'bying ba ste// rlom
55a1(rgyud): / chos su gzugs brten dam bzhin bcig/ na Ak+Sha )// gnasams 'dis rtsegs pabacin cu byed dming po dang // ca du ku yum la sogs pa'i/ 
55a2(rgyud): drims zhugs shing bzhom bya// can na dmar po la sogs pa'i// drinim ldan pa'i shing za'am// yang na 'bras bu med pa 'i// zud shing chad dang mthun pa yis// zag zung chen por rdzog
55a3(rgyud): byas // rnam nas nga dag gas // rba sa// thugs pani mi 'jigs dka' 6// kwas dang ga tu
55a4(rgyud): cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang // rog kyil 'khor gzhug pa dang // sngar gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun gzhag me sbar te// me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'ang // de nas
55a5(rgyud): pa de nyid kyang // mi yi khang pa mangs pa ru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzugs su gsol// me mchod sdig pa bsreg pa yi// sngags dang rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra// me dang dub drung
55a6(rgyud): gyis// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste// bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs// med na sdig pa bsreg par bya// dung la sogs pa zung na ral// ma byung ra yang cho ga rnams
55b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa las byung ngus pa rnams// 'dod thal bachen pa ste// dmasu gnan 'thal pa gzungs// de nas rus pa nag gsum ni// gung kus las nas dris gtong te// rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag
55b2(rgyud): ste// kha dog dbyibs drang dri dang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung // ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su
55b3(rgyud): pa yi// steng du seng ge'i khri dag la// seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi rgyar// steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas derang rus pa gnag byas la// me tog byas nas zhag lnga ru// bsnyen pa byas te du
55b4(rgyud): ba la// gdung byung sta gon bdun pa la// cha tshe rab tu gnas par bya// dang por nga bsregs dus su yang // shi ba dang po nas gzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste// drug pa ro'i sta gon no// bdun pa
55b5(rgyud): dur khrod rab tu gnas// dang par snang ba gnyis pa dAr// gzum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsus// gzhan la med cing rang la sbed// dman la med cing de rjes med/ 
55b6(rgyud): sum gsungs shes rab kyi// rtsa brgyad bshad rgyu dbye ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud ci smon par li yi// rgyud du khyod lang yis bshad// de nas
55b7(rgyud): tsha'i rim pa yang // snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// mthun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs blang // mi snangs bdag la sogs la// gtor ma me yis sa sogs blang // de nas skur pa rnam lnga lang // phan pa
55b8(rgyud): dang lang // gzi brjid gar dang rdo rgyal// srad bus sa gzungs spyad sogs// cho ga gzhan dang mthun par bya// dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lha grangs
56a1(rgyud): rga ga // da pag dag nas nabyas/ gcigags lnga'am bdud man// he shurtsa gcig brgya rtsa bcas// nus par na gdab par bya// dus ni mtsha mags pas// da
56a2(rgyud): la ni dkyil 'khor gyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa ste// gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab// bum dbang sa la gdab pa ste// gsang dbangs dang nyal gdang
56a3(rgyud): ba ma dang drung la gad ba// bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o// dang po 'phobs ma lhung la// gnyis pa ro bsregs lhung ba'o// gsum pa mtshas ma srung na// 'chi ba sla ba'i dam pa ste// srid pa'i 'chib
56a4(rgyud): grol nges// dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// lhung zhing 'chi ba kho na nges// debs srid las grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa rab mnyes te// 'pho ba la sogs gdams dag blang // rgyud 'di gtang
56a5(rgyud): legs par zung // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab po// dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro langs cha
56a6(rgyud): thams cad chud kyi don la rjes su yi rangs par gyur to// dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / yo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
56a7(rgyud): rgyagar skad du/ shrI a mri ta guh+ma tan+t+ra rAng / bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bris pa dus
56a8(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsur mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdorje sring pos gsol pa/ 
56b1(rgyud): /  so// na sngun ga sa pa shAd du gan /  ldan das rgyas ra stsal pa// dang par rgya
56b2(rgyud): ba yang // phyi la gzugs brtan snrel 'khor te// nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gas bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te// bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sams// de rnams lha yi mtshan nyid kyang // su mdog phyags
56b3(rgyud): dgas pa la lA ya// pra tshul drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bar ba'i ga dgu phyag brgya drug/ mtshan nyid sbrum lta bu les// thamal pa yi rnam tog spong // lus kyi dril thun sdang dag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i slar chub
56b4(rgyud): di dag spyi mi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur po// de nyid kyi ning kyil lakhor te// rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gache brjid dang // pad+ma ga gyi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin te bdun rdo rjes
56b5(rgyud): snyi po yongs gzung dkyil 'khor te// de dag kyi yi dkyil 'khor lam// de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang // rnam gos steng du gdan khri drug/ rang gi bdag pa'i sgra yin no// dang po nga nyid shes bya ste// rags/ 
56b6(rgyud): pa dang ni phra ba dang // rdung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang // tshig stong drug brgya chu ba cam// las ni rags pa ri lam 'joms shing // ngag gi dri 'bru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi drur gyur pa// mkha' stong
56b7(rgyud): shes par bya// gshig sdang ba bsgom pa dang // de bzhin mun pa bsgom pa dag/ nyen dang mtshan mor rab tu grags// gnang mangs lha stangs dman pa ste// tshul de de las bzlog pa'o// dang por yid
56b8(rgyud): lda \u0f7f// de bzhin sems pacing drung ba cir yang // nam mkha' long bani de nas su // danas par mig le yang // phanal ga dang bcas yan lag meng// shen yan lag me pa ste// yan lag bcas pa
57a1(rgyud): / rlung ste/  //  na namags par bya/  dus zho gas sa// denas na9// baspyad nga ni sdug pa mags// rkyen da
57a2(rgyud): dang rang bzhin dang // bdag spyad pa dang gzhan spyad dngo // gtum mo rang bzhin spar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbang ba dang // gtum mo rkyen gyis spang ba dang // gtum mo na ral sbar ba dang // gtu
57a3(rgyud): spang ba dang // skye bo'i gtumam spa ba dang // grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang // chags pa'i rang bzhin gtum mo ste// nang gi lha mi ngo ba ste// gsang ba'i lha yi ring 'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyis
57a4(rgyud): yang // da'ang po gnyis spyor kun du ru// de ma phyir na b+ha ga yin// dga' ba la sogs bla ma yi// phra ba lam spong las yin te// sems kyi dri 'thud 'dod chags drag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i rgyu// de na/ 
57a5(rgyud): bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med na mkha' bzhin// rang reg stong pa'od gsal la// bsdams pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa min// bsgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste/ 
57a6(rgyud): pa yang rtog pa nyid// bsgom du rdul tsam mang ba la// yongs su skad cig med pa 'di// lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig ye shes me bo che// thams cad 'di
57a7(rgyud): la gnas pa ste// dper na 'khor lor sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang // yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i// las dang bya ba
57a8(rgyud): kun// bems byed nyid shes gyur na// sems cad 'di la bsdud par nges// las ni rab pa'i lamathong ste// sgogasum rnam dag dug gsum 'jams// gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu
57b1(rgyud): ma pa bani yin// sde ma yin par gas sa/ ngan sa nang na sbyin grag ca pa/ kye basbe na/ ma sred// rags ni ngas pa rgya baju // na no thogazung mgrin pa// snying ga zugs kyi yon ta dag/ 
57b2(rgyud): phrin las gtum mi gnyis grangs/ rtswa dang da mig padag/ nga zhin gnas pa minas /  ga pas dag pa'i na//  mdon b+hag rteg pa dag/ glegardzas 'khrig ste ma mchod bya/ nye sa ni / 
57b3(rgyud): / pra dang // rnam rtog sreg byer sbyin sreg ste// rang lus ye shes me yis ni// rtog pa'i bud shing bsreg bya ba// 'di ni sbyin sreg chad ma ste// ti la sog sdig pa rengs pa'am// las kyi ma nyid ye shes sam// bsregs pas nges par/ 
57b4(rgyud): tshig gamaci// sreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed me/ dbang pos spyod yul ma yin te// de phyir las kyi ma nyid la// ti la sogs pasreg pa'i las phyis kyang // nges par sdig pa tshig mi 'gyur/ mchod pa la sogs de 'azhin no// 
57b5(rgyud): stan pa tsam du nges pa ste// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtogs pas bstan pa med// dgang gza dbugs gzar la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang // thab lung
57b6(rgyud): 'jam sA ce ste// chags klas gnas ni nges pa dang // rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba ye// gtum mo ye shes ma sbar te// galas g.yon dgang gabar thugs gar gyis// shu krarba dang drung grogs kyi// phra mo'i rtog gi// 
57b7(rgyud): / breg rdzas bsreg/ bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya// ni rgyas las kyi rim pa dang // bzhi bzhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba lang // phye yi sngags ni ma~M AHhUM// nang du bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid de/ 
57b8(rgyud): gas ba pa chog cad pas gnas// mar thugs pa 'bral gas/ blab seMnas skye'i mchod pa'o// dud kyi la sogason // gas ba de pa'i ma tshad//  drug
58a1(rgyud): nga/ byas sa nas hU~M kA // tsan gags gas pa bye/  dugagasang// gsags bzhan gsas// ma rtag dgags
58a2(rgyud): myed// 2de bachen po ba 'angs/  gdon rkyen ni byas pa// 'di ni gas pa'i gang ma gsungs// 'ang rig sa pa'i bdud rtsi'i sa// bang chen gdan rten byas pa// 'ad ni 'an
58a3(rgyud): ba ngas// phyag 'tshal rdo bu la sogs dang // sbyang sogs 'i nam nas shes// gang gi bying dpyir sreg ni// dngos grub dam pa stong ba dang // nam tog sreg byang srin breg ste// shing sogs
58a4(rgyud): pasbyin sreg min// mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste// spos sogs phul bas mnyes pa med// rang sems las su rung ba dag/ mnyes pas mchod pa chen po ste// gdon dang gnod pa ni ba dang / 
58a5(rgyud): chatsha ni dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste// 'bras sogs phyi 'i gtor ma yis// gdon sogs ni bar ma 'gyur te// rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag/ gdon la sogs pa
58a6(rgyud): ba ste// 'khrul ba'i rnam rtogs spangs par// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'akur phyir// sgo gsum rnam rtog 'joms pa yi// sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang // dam
58a7(rgyud): gso dang lha rnams 'go// dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gtor mar nges pa'o// rgyud rnams nye bar ni ba dang // lus las 'byung phyir lha yin
58a8(rgyud): khrus dang yan lag lha ma yin// kha mig la sogs phra ma yin// lus las mabyung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po ni gsum g.yang ba dgag/ rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung // sgo gsum ni
58b1(rgyud): nas brjod// med skyob phyir na sngags min to// rangs bsalas su rung ba dang // nam tog gdon rnams las skyo ba phyir// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs// gzhan yang dngos grub 'dod pa/ 
58b2(rgyud): sa// thams cad shA ma yin la nas blang // rgyud 'di ga na kyi na tan rjes// de'i tshal 'dus pa thams cad spyod kyi don la 'i sha shu // dpal gas pa bdud ci'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
58b3(rgyud): / rgya gar kyi mkhan po gA la d+ha ra dang // lits+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shA~M sh+ma shA ni a laM kA ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal du khrid rgyan gyi rgyud kyi
58b4(rgyud): bo// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed tshul phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bos legs btud nas// drir khrod gang lags rgyan gang lags// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang / 
58b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so rdo rje snying po lags// legs par nyon la legs par zung // dang par dur khrod bshad bya ste// dur khrod spyi dang bye brag gnas// gzhal yas
58b6(rgyud): khang gi phyi rol te// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol tu// ringags pa chen po spyi yi gnas// bye brag shwar la sogs pa ste// snod kyi len pa bzlog pa yang // lcags ro nag po tshun chad de// rdo rje rabs de nyid/ 
58b7(rgyud): do// chen po b+hu niSh+Ti mu ste// chung 'khru gang phan chad do// dengs gzhan pa dkyil 'khor ni// chang las nges par 'das pa'o// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brgyad// mA mnga'i rtags
58b8(rgyud): srod brgyad// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu dgod// tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtags su shing brgyad rim pas dkod// de bzhin gdug pa brgyad bcom pa'i// rtags su
59a1(rgyud): brgyad rim pas dgod// tshogs brgyad mi dag bcu bcom pa'o// rtags su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod// lus dag gnyis kyis sems can gyi// don mdzadu
59a2(rgyud): char smin dgod// de nyid du khrod 'jigs pa che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyu// rnam rtog zil gnon brgyad po 'ashad// mdzes pa'i phyer na rgyan yin no// de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyi
59a3(rgyud): dang por dung khrod bshad par bya// shar du gtum drag nag po che// lho ru ha har dgod ser che// nub tu mi bzad dab nga'o ste// byang du tshang tshing ljang gu che// me ru g.yer ka can yin te// bden bral
59a4(rgyud): tshams su 'bar ba 'dzin// rlung mtshams dmyal sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan du ni dbyibs can du// b+hu tsa ri khe tsa sha ni// sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod// pa ta li dang bA sa ni// sa 'og rlu
59a5(rgyud): kyi phyi du dkod// dur khyod 'di rnams mtshan nyid kyang // 'bar 'a tshig dang mchog sogs// gang rus thong ba la sogs dang // ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas// lce spyang skra yis 'jigs pa
59a6(rgyud): gzugs// shar du shi ri sha yI shing // g+ho mu sa shwad pa yi shing // nub tu wang ge ling gi shing // byang du tsu ta'i shing du nges// gong dang mtshungs pa n+ya gro d+ha// parka ti lcug bA thA dag/ le nas dbang ldan patsha
59a7(rgyud): su dgod// ngi n+d+har grags pa'i gzugs su 'dod// shar du dbang po gnas pa ste// lho rug shin rje gnas pa'o// nug tu klu dbang gnas pa ste// byang du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas// shar lho'i me ni
59a8(rgyud): gnas pal//  ru' mtsham bu srin po gnas// nub byang ma sems su rlung dag dang // byang shang mtshams su dbang ldan dgod// nyi zla ga las bdag rug// ji ltar grags pa'i gzug su dadong
59b1(rgyud): shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste// 'dzin po rgya gyi spobs tu rug// pad+ma byang la bad chen po// hu wa thas srin por dgod// rags stan drung mtshams dgod pa s+ho// dung skyong dbang rngan mtshams su 'o/ 
59b2(rgyud): pa sbrul gyi gzugs su dgod// kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye// shar du char sprin dkar por dgod// lho ru bu mi ti dgod do// nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas// byang du a ba yang dag gnas// sngo nya mer
59b3(rgyud): dag gnas// g+hA nya srin po'i mtshams su dgod// rlung gi mtshams su par shan// gtum po 'di brgyad char sbyin brgyad// btsod kyi mdog 'dra gur kum mdog/ nar mkha' mdog 'dra ngu ba'i mdog/ s+thi
59b4(rgyud): bdog 'dra sprin gyi gzugs// sha ba la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs// de nas ye shes phun sum tshogs// rang rig don ni phud sum
59b5(rgyud): gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yin// rtags su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas// de nas nang gi dur khrod sogs// b.lags pa rdo rje rab ste// rus pa rdo rje gur du nges// dpung pa nye ba'i dpung pa ste// 
59b6(rgyud): dang nga bzhin nye ba'i badra// brgyad ni du bzod brgyad du nges// rjeng panye ba'i rje dngar ba ni// lags ngamanye ba'i lags ngab 'i// brgyan ni nang gi shing brgyad do// tshigs dang de bzhin nye ba'i chags/ 
59b7(rgyud): / 'og tu bani bzhi ste// nang dge phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthil dang de bzhin nye ba'i mthil// steng 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do// rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te// bskyed
59b8(rgyud): nam rtags ma rtags// nga phrad pa kyid ni nang na gnas// rlung ba gas pa rgyas// de byer nang gi gang gyad gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// mang na rtan yang dag kanas
60a1(rgyud): bdag spyod gzhan yang spyon pa'i phyir/ rang sbyin brgyad nanang du gnas// de nas gsang pa'i dung spyod kyang // A rtser rtsa brgyad dung grod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyad do// skye
60a2(rgyud): brgyad phyogs spyong brgyad// mgrin par rtsa brgyad gru brgyad de// skye bong rgya brgyan cher sprin brgyad// gsang bar rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dung khrod brgyad ni gsang bar gnas// thams cad ba dab
60a3(rgyud): dung khrod kyang // rnam shes brgyad ni de nyid brgyad// dur khrod brgyad du ngas pa'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de nyid shing // lhag ma gsum dang tshor chags lnga// brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges// nyon mongs rdzu
60a4(rgyud): deye gnyis// brgyan po dag na klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag ni// de dag bzhi pa'i char smin brgyad// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad// stobs sogs ma
60a5(rgyud): / yon tan rgyas// rtags su shing brgyad nges pa'o// rnam rtag gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtags su klu brgyad ngas pa'o// gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi// don mngad rtag su char sprin brgyad/ 
60a6(rgyud): nga bla ma'in la nas shes// de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // bla ma 'azhal nas shes par bya// rgyan chags phyi nang chud ces bya// rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o// gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa
60a7(rgyud): cig nyed du gsungs kyang bya / dub nyid du saso lnga pa/ chos tshul du ma 'i bye brag dang/ mas pa dum 'i bye brag dang// 'du gas dma'i bye brag gis// theg pa'i mapa la thug pa med/ sams pa
60b1(rgyud): bya/  rjes thAng ba ste// rnams gnon pa sa/  nyid 'ardzun mdzo gis skyes// de gsung 'an drugs pa yibam// rig pa'i gnas sngam khas pas snad // mkha' 'byos ma lu
60b2(rgyud): brtsams sa yini yi mthil sa des// de lta'i mar dag mthong bA ra/ thugs kyi sa spyod gang d+mo// rang yang phung la gzhan yang phrug/ mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshom/ dbas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// 
60b3(rgyud): ma dab pa mnyes byas te// man ngag dam pa blang bar bya// nges pa'i lha spyod ma rnyed par// gsang ba'i lha dang spyod pa dang // mos pa'i rjes su gang byed dang // nyon mongs ril non la sogs dag/ gsang sngags ltar
60b4(rgyud): bur spyad pa skyod// 'di dag rku po ma rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skye// dang po sred pa skye ba yang // yang ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// sad+bi'i dang po tha ma dang // 'bras bu sred pa skye ba yi// dus der du
60b5(rgyud): byed na// 'byung ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na// nad gzhi bsdus shing nad gzhi skyed// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung // de la 'dod pa'i mtshon chas ni// g.yeng ba ma dang gtar ka bya// phyi des rigs kyi
60b6(rgyud): po// srid par skye ba'i dus tshad kyang // rgyun chad zhag gsum zhag lnga dang // bdun dang dgu yi dus rnams spang // de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'i don// khyod la gtad kyis legs par zung // de nas 'khor thams
60b7(rgyud): cad dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// paN+Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo rgyu ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// 
60b8(rgyud): rgyagang ga du go 'dra blangab hA tan+ta/ bad skad du dpal rdo khyim pa zin pa'i rjod/ dpal ma pa'i rgyal pa'i phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
61a1(rgyud): 'das dang nan gshegs pa blam kyi zu dang / gzung dang / thugs pa btsun ma 'byug sa do snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' khom par 'gro grangs ma dpar ma
61a2(rgyud): tu bzhugs pa'i dus su kyi gsang ba blan med pa'i mchong pas tshod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du rdzogs pa dpa bam ldan 'dus la zhal 'dum pa ma dade/ pi byung ba rnams pas
61a3(rgyud): rdo rje gang lags chen po dang / rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// don gyi rnam pa pa ni// dbang bani'i gras su shes par bya// ma rtag 'jams kyi rdo rje ste// 
61a4(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyinang gsang pe ba gsang gnyi ga// rtse gsum rtse gcig rtse lngang // sde dgu pa ni nyid yin no// bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste// rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// gnyis su med partse gcig pas/ 
61a5(rgyud): /  thams cad spangs pa yin// rtse gsum sku gzhung thugs yin te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gta mug gsum// 'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam
61a6(rgyud): so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos dbyangs shes// nyon mongs ldani spangs pa ste// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang // phrag dog gti mug 'joms par byed// rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa// ye shes rtse dgra pa
61a7(rgyud): bste/ khams gsums dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// nyan thos dang rgyal byang chub sems// reg 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes che// sa dgul nis
61a8(rgyud): sgrib pa'i// sgrib pa spyod par byed pa yi// rdo rje rtse dgur bstan pa yin// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin// ma reg pa las 'ang
61b1(rgyud): de// 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes// ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang len// srid pa skyed nga rga shi ste// de rnams spong ba'i gnyen po ste// chos kyi ye shes
61b2(rgyud): 'don du bya// de las ye shes drug rang bzhin// de las sku gsung thugs ngobo// de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis mang reg pa ni// de las nyams myong ba de chen po// ra reg de nyid sde
61b3(rgyud): kun ston byed len pa ste// srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru bshad// rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan 'das// 'od gsal stong chen dang du thim// de phyir rdo rje bcu gnyis pa/ 
61b4(rgyud): rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/ 'bigs shing rno ba nur gsum ste/ gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas/ 'jam zhing dpal 'joms par byed// pha lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms// zur lngas thams cad
61b5(rgyud): gar byed// de nas chen po'i don bshad de// dmigs dang pasam pa spyod pa dang // gul thugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang // de bzhin ya shas chen po ste// de la yang 'dun bdun sbyar// de phyir chen pom
61b6(rgyud): de bstan// rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tugs dadang gsang pa che// de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la// rgyu 'i rgyud du bstan pa yi// de rnams don ni ji bzhin rtogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud
61b7(rgyud): bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa// rga ni gnyis su med pa yi// rang rig ye shes mthar thug pa// mthar thug bla na med pa'i rgyud// rgyal po la yang lha yin te// phyi nang gsang dang rab tu gas // 
61b8(rgyud): shin dugasang 'chen poste// de rnams don la dbang bskur dang // de yi mi mthun phyogs 'joms phyir// de byer rgyal po lnga du bstan// rdorje srung pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji lcang lags
62a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kye/ gru gsung thugs na ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i byug de ltar lags// rdo rje gang lags snying po gang // dpa' bo gang lags mkha' 'gros
62a2(rgyud): dpag tu zad pa ji ltar lags// thabs gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i// mchod nas zhes pa ji ltar lags// mngon phyogs 'khor ba ji lar lags// zhal 'a
62a3(rgyud): mdzad pa ji ltar lags// gzigs pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni nga chi bdag bdud// phung po'i bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom
62a4(rgyud): pa'o// ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun yum tshogs pa la// drug po de ldan zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te/ 
62a5(rgyud): ltar bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsun mo zhes bya
62a6(rgyud): kyidabyengs// de las byung pyi b+ha ga ste// dbyer mi byed pas bzhugs par bshad// rdo rje chos rnams 'jigs pa rtse// snying po po shes chen po ste// sogs pa med po 'dzin yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pak+Sha/ 
62a7(rgyud): / dang gsang ba la sogs kyi// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin// mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' 'gro ste// rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya// thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir/ ma zhes de yis gsungs pa yin// 
62a8(rgyud): yongon la mi dpogs pas// de 'i phyir na dpag du med// babam gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid don dang dbyer med phyir// gcig gi don du bshad pa'o// gnyis pa ma yin de dus su// phyi
62b1(rgyud): mchod pa ni// g+h+ri 'i mchod pa bshad par bya// me ga bdun pa yar me dang // dri dang g+ha ba shos btung ba dang // ral mos pa ldan dbyangs nyid dang // nag dang rgod dang gang nyid dang // dang klang chen sogs// de nas
62b2(rgyud): nang gi mchod pa ni// b+ha ga btsums la kutsa bcing // bdud rtsi lnga dngang tung balnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas te// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// de la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nas ga'
62b3(rgyud): pa ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le ste// de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis// rtsa dang rang sogs thig les mchod// de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni// dang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang // dga' bral de bzhin lnga skyes dga'// 
62b4(rgyud): bde ba'i khyad par de nyid kyis// rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod// de nas bla med mchod pas ni// rang rig stong par rtogs pa yis// 'odogs la de nyid chos kyi sku// de nyid bla med mchod pa mtsho
62b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bul napa/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgunas rjes su yi rangs par gyur te/ g.yon skyogs nas brko ba byas nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
62b6(rgyud): snang ba gyur to// dpal 'a bar lo sdom pa de rgyal po'i nyung rdzogs so// // nal 'byo ma tsan+da kA le dang / le n+de ba dge slong shAs ye shes kyis bskar ba'o// 66// rgyag skad du/ dz+nyAn A
62b7(rgyud): ye tan dang / bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'asam po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha'
62b8(rgyud): 'khor grangs med pa dang / ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su dpang po ye shes mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs las ngos gtugs te/ thal mas
63a1(rgyud): nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shed mnga' bdag che// ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang // ye shes skye gnas gang dang gang // rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang // gang la dbang byed
63a2(rgyud): 'dul// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gro nyon// ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga// de nyid don la shes pa dang // log rtog shes pa
63a3(rgyud): bsgribs phyir// spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o// de la me long ye shes ni// dper na g.ya' dag me long la/ 
63a4(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin// de bzhin sems kyi me long la// nyon mongs g.yas ni dag byas na// chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong // sems kyi me long gang yin la// sku ma tsam
63a5(rgyud): snang ba de// tha dad mi byed mnyam ye shes// mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa// kun rdzob snam tsam de ni// las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa// de nyid so sor rtog ye shes// de nyid nan tan sgrub byed do// de nyid
63a6(rgyud): grub ye shes te// thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin// ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa// kha sbyor dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med tshul// 
63a7(rgyud): dang lho dang nub dang byang // ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas// de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni// chos dbyings ye shes skye ba'i gnas// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so sor rtog dang bya ba grub// chos dbyings pa
63a8(rgyud): la legs pa// bdag po byed pa'i phyir dang ni// zhe sdang dang ning rgyam dang // 'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mugs sogs pa'i// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa'i phyi// rgyal po zhes ni
63b1(rgyud): pa yin// ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid bye ba gang lags dang // de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas// nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang // de nyid kyi ni
63b2(rgyud): budag rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rang rig ste// dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su bstan// de yi gnas ni rtsa
63b3(rgyud): lor te// nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni// go bzlog pa yi tshul yin no// de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtags ni lus la khrag thung dang // bsdu langs dang 'drar ba dang / 
63b4(rgyud): zas dang chung lus yang dang // skra dkar gnyer mdengs pa dang // le la med dang brtson 'grus ldan// de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub// de nas yon tan bshad pa ni// rkang ma rgya shes sa stengs 'og gi// 'a
63b5(rgyud): na dngos grub gang yin dang // 'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas// rang rig 'od gsal de nyid de// ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te// rtags ni 'od gsal re
63b6(rgyud): do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'o// sa ni nges par bo ba'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung bsgom pa brtag/ lus sems chags su bcug nas ni// rang gi sems kyi de nyid la// de nyid dbyer med bsgom
63b7(rgyud): bya// de yis thob med 'bras bu thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang nas de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas
63b8(rgyud): chod de mi snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / pa Na Ne ta g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tshab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// 
64a1(rgyud): / rgyug rga da du/ shrI rAg d+hAng tan+ta rAng / bad sa dadu/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal pa'i chud kyi rgyal pa/ dpal dang mkha' 'grol byag 'tshal lo/ 'ad sang bdag gis thos pa das
64a2(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
64a3(rgyud): pos spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he he dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin nas// mtshan dang dpe byad gang dang gang // stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang / 
64a4(rgyud): brdzus skyes mangs skyes rgod skyes dang // drod ga byer gnyis gsub bzhi char ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa// ya ni dbu la gtsug tor te// a ni dbu sgra ga las su bgyig// oM ni dash+tal
64a5(rgyud): ba'i dbyes mnyam po// I ni smin mtshams mdzod spu ste// u ni spyan smig mthon mthing la// ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// U tshems bzhi bcu mang ba ste// ri tshems mnyam tshems thags bzang // le lI
64a6(rgyud): tshems dkar ro bro mchog/ e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// oM ljags shin du srab pa ste// o ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// oM ni dpung pa go shin du hU~M/ aM ni bdun mtho ba du gsung// a
64a7(rgyud): gro rgyas pa ste lnga 'di dag dun drug g.yas skor ro// de nas gapan sgor mtshams nas kyang // a ni pags srabs do// gser 'dra// A ni bzengs bzhin ma btu pang // phyag gnyis pus mo sgrib pa'o// 
64a8(rgyud): da dpa she ng+ge/ mi bya thos pam chu ga zhigasapa'o// yun mengod sbrus las grub kyis// ldan surnams gyen du byon sa// ri dmas phrab rdzangs ga/  du men
64b1(rgyud): 'o// na zhabs long tshigs mi mdor// ke Ni phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon// ldan phyag mthal zhabs kyi mthal// 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o// en phyag zhabs dra bas 'bral/ 
64b2(rgyud): mo ring ba ste// o ni phyag dang zhabs mthil la// 'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin// oM ni zhabs ni shin du gnas// aM zhabs rting pa langs ste// aHni byin pa ri klas ni// e nA ma yi lta bu ste/ 
64b3(rgyud): / shegs snying po te// ston pa sumacu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra/ kha ni sen mi medag snum pa// ga ni sen mo mthong ste// g+ha ni sor mo rnams zlum pa// nga ni sor ma rnams rgyas pa/ 
64b4(rgyud): na song rnams byin gyis phra// cha ni rtsa rnams mi mngon pa// dza ni rna mdud med pa yin/ ni yong bu mi mngon pa// nya ni zhabs mi mnyam pa med// Ta ni seng ge'i skabs su gshegs// ShA ni g+hang
64b5(rgyud): stabs bu gshegs// Da ni dang pa'i stabs su gshegs// D+ha ni khyu mchog stabs su gshegs// Na ni g.yon phyogs ldog cing gshegs// ta ni mdzes par gshegs pa ste// tha ni mi g.yo
64b6(rgyud): gshegs pa// da ni sbrul 'khril bag chags// d+ha sU byi dor byas pa 'dra// na sgra rim par 'tshams pa'o// pan skra gtsang ze sku 'jam// bskurnam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid// mthu
64b7(rgyud): khe lags yangs shing bzang // ya ni gom pa snyoms pa'o// ra sku shan du gzhon mdog can// la ni sbrul 'khrul pa med// sgo ni sku lus rgya so ba ste// shen shin du grims pa'o// nga ni yan lag tha
64b8(rgyud): cad mdzes// sa gcig pa rab ris med cing dag/ hadagu zlum pa nyid yon te// kA ni su skabs byed pa'o// ya ni klu snyoms pa yin te// ra ni phyam phyab med pa yin// la ni lha ba zab pa ste// wa ni lte 'a galas
65a1(rgyud): 'khyil// d+ha ni kun nas mdzes pa ste// d+ha ni kun spyod gtsang ma yin// 'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu yin// de nas g.yon gyis pa
65a2(rgyud): bcu ni// kun sru sme gnag bag med// kha ni shing bal skar 'jam phyiH// ga phyag rim mdangs yod pa// g+ha phyag ri mo zab pa dang // daphyag ri mo rang ba'o// tsazhal hacang mi ring ba// cha zhal
65a3(rgyud): gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang // dza dz+ha ljags mnyen ljags srab pa// nya ni ljags dmar ngo bo ste// glang pa'ang ro 'brug sma Ta// tha ni gsung snyan mnyen 'jam pa// Da rnamache ba zlum dang no// 
65a4(rgyud): mched kAr ta choms mnyam// tha ni mche ba byin gyis pra// de shangs shin tu motha ba dang // dra shangs shin du gtsang ba'o// na ni spun 'od rnam par dag/ papa spyan bzang rnga ya spug/ ba ni dkar nas
65a5(rgyud): pa ma'o// 'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra ba pa'i spyan// blan de bzhin smin mchims ring // sam spen mtshams smin su mnyam// rin de bzhin sbyin ma sdug// yo ni phyag de rgyas pa'o// de bzhin ldan

65a8(rgyud): / lce baphrul ba slong ba ma//  ya myed rgyad l+r-i rdzan// man byed stong panyid// mAn stong pa nyid stong pa// ma chen pa stong pa nyid// smin don dem stong pa nyid// sun 'dus byas
65b1(rgyud): A ni 'dus mabyas stong ba// dri rnamatha' las 'das stong ba// rlon zigs tha' stong ba nyid// man dong ba med pa song // m-in dang bzhin stong ba nyid// semachis rnams thams cad pang /

65b4(rgyud): mabyam nas rdzogs pa // de da/ rnam tha dgasapa pa// gzugs kyi 'du shes kyis 'das pa//  tshogs 'du shes yid ma da// namam la mtha' las la ldan la// namam 'a
65b5(rgyud): las 'das te// rnam shes mtha' las la gnas shing // rnam shes rnas 'a la la rdzogs pa te// nami shes mtha'i las las 'das nas// ci lang med pa la gnas te/ de nyid rdzogs pa bstan no//

66a2(rgyud): cha ru zung 'jug nyid// rgyang mas rim la 'khyud cing // g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsung thugs// de sgra sngags su rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud
66a3(rgyud): dngos grub sogs// de nyid las ni byung bas ni// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba 'azhi yi rim pa yang // snod bcud ya'i yus la thim sa// yab yum nyi ma zla bar

67a3(rgyud): 'jug pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// thugs ni dbyang dus ngob ste// gnas bsku gsum gru ba gsum// ya nas sngon gyi dum yin te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum// dang tsa rnams pa

67a8(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po yang babs par gyur to// de nas dpa' bodang mkha' 'gro sa rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgus rjes su li ring nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal chags pa'i rgya
67b1(rgyud): rgyud kyil 'jigs // rnam khyo pa shAgs dang /  pa dag rlung sa bsgyur bgro// / rgyag sa du/ ga sa pa tan mA na ma/ 'od sa dang / 
67b2(rgyud): dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas// thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang // he haM mgon pardo rje
67b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gros ni ji ltar lags// de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig bsrung ba ji ltar lags// rdo rje phag me bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyor// dang po dmatshig mtshan nyid kyang /

67b5(rgyud): pa'abrid du gsungs pa yin// rang gzhan 'khrugs pa tha ma yang // nyams pachung ngu yin par 'dod// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la man ra sams ma skyes
67b6(rgyud): kyang // gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi// bdag gi g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang // gzhan la nyes pa chung bas na// 'di yang
67b7(rgyud): nyams pa 'bring du bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang // 'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// lta spyod gang la gzhan ma mos// zab mo'i don la skur
67b8(rgyud): 'debs pa// ltung ba cha 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis mnyes gzhan cher gyi khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chung ngu bshad// riri'i dbye ba gzhan nas shes// de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang
68a1(rgyud): phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol la// bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur// g.yengs pas nyams pa
68a2(rgyud): chung ngu// mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // de nas mkha' 'gro mtshan nyid kyang // mtha'
68a3(rgyud): chuganas paste// phag mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad// gzhan ni lnga po tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// gnas g.yas skor ka yi bar// mkha' 'gro drug cu bzhi du nges// ka sogs zung
68a4(rgyud): gabang groH// byinas dmapa' 'gror// mkha' 'gronas bzhod mtshams kyib pa// sum cu rtsa bdun mapa' 'gros// lce bstsal par yang nag gnas// ma sogs na mkha' 'thob rgyan/ 
68a5(rgyud): rtsa mkha' 'gro bzhi// sdig ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gro re// gzhan rnams rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas// rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas// gas
68a6(rgyud): spyi bor yang dag gnas// danas sdol pa bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bad sdom par yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can// nges par sgom pa yin par 'dod// rdo rje phag
68a7(rgyud): mi 'da' bas// sdom pa dam tshig tu ni bshad// mi phyed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen ni gang lags dus gang lags// chad ni sa
68a8(rgyud): / gas bsrung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // mi shes pa dang bag med dang // nyon mongs ldan dang ma gus dang // brjed ngas dran pa mi gsas pa// 
68b1(rgyud): drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bsten grogs ngan 'grogs// mdor na sgo gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chad chang gis kyos// log
68b2(rgyud): dus des grags 'dod// nyon mongs phyi la nod blams so// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dmatshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// sbyid na rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// ga na sogs ga
68b3(rgyud): pyid brlabs che// bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na// chen por rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du ma song na// bag mad nyams pason gnas// gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong na// de dang / 
68b4(rgyud): nyams chung bar gsungs// 'khor bas skyo dang rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar chad bral ba bshags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos gzhim du
68b5(rgyud): che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya// sbyor ba ltung chung ngu ste// dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung // mjug rdzogs ltung ba chen por nges// rkyen dang phyag rgya phyug mtshan dag/ 'chang ba bsten pa'i da' tshig yin// 
68b6(rgyud): sha lnga bdud rtsi la rnams ni// bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// sems can dpa' bo ma pa' 'grol// longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa// shes
68b7(rgyud): par bya ba'i dam tshig go/ sgo gsum su gsung thugs su bsdam// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// nyon mongs drug drug gzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med par bsgral// bsngal ba'i dam
68b8(rgyud): po yin// dam tshig don du dam tshig do// dus drug dus gnyis lo bar du// brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrung // dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrung // sad cig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang ga lus
69a1(rgyud): kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi gus kyi nyes 'thung ba// 'di grwa li nyes pa bshad// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi ga gi nyes 'grung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams paste// ga'an
69a2(rgyud): la gsung gi nyams par 'gyur// gzhan yang mkhas par shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan la yan laganyis 'byung dang // legs pa las ni nyes bathung sogs/ rdza la'i nal nas shes/ 
69a3(rgyud): byaste// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing ska gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig 'di'i don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtog par dkal// 
69a4(rgyud): mgor po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar thos slar ba dor ba med// ngan skyugs phyir dor slar la za ba med// rang ris byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshor na// log tog 'khrul
69a5(rgyud):  /  'dum ma tsun na rje 'i 'grasas 'a tsha sa/ 
69a6(rgyud): mkha po gA ya d+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge sbyong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// #// rgya ga skad du/ shrIn+da ki nI kuN+Da tra la tarA dang / yod skad du/ dpal ma kha' 'brum gas pa' ba ba'i drud kyirgyal lo// 
69a7(rgyud): dpal 'di 'i chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// myos lal ho// kye sa yil to// mkha' 'gyo gang lagasam gad pags// gas dang cud de rgyal po gang // nyon cig rgya chub sems dpa' khyod// mkha' 'gro badzi
69a8(rgyud): 9/  /  sa so// ma na gas na// dam pa byod rgya nga//  // ma pa'i sa sa la / lus kya na
69b1(rgyud): sumadog phyag mtshan rkang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brul pa la// rlung dang \u0f7fsok+kas tsaN+Da le// 'dad ga mkha' 'gro gnyis paste// dman pa rnams la sku dang phyag/ rlung dang
69b2(rgyud): khaM ga dbyabs// de nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ shes rang ye shes dang 'brel po'i// lhan cig myos pa dga' bang ngo // 'di dag gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro ste// mkha' 'grang de rnams rim pa la
69b3(rgyud): dman pa rnams la phra ba'i gzugs// lus sems tshor ba bde ba las// 'das pa'i bde ba chen po dag/ spangs phyir rang rig ye shes te// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'i // 
69b4(rgyud): shes brjod kun gyi yul ma yin// de nyid lnga la sogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro 'di rnams rim pa lang // sku mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i gnyen// rlung dang rtsa sogs pu ma da'ang spong // bdabs rlung dang
69b5(rgyud): / rtsasogs spong // rang rig stong pas bde ba spong // gzugs sku gnyis kyis stong pa spong // de phyir spong ba gnyen por bshad// rags pa phung sogs bum dbang rgyu// bum dbang gsang dbang rku yin te// gas
69b6(rgyud): ba gsam pa'i rkang nges// bde ba rang rig skyed pa le// rga dang 'bras bu nges pa ste// 'bras bu bzhi dang mi mthun bzhi// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis rim pa'o// ma ni rnam pa gsum yin te// 'dod chags chen pos
69b7(rgyud): com ldan 'das// che sdang chen pos bcom ldan 'dag/ gti mug chen pas bcom ldan 'das// nga rgyal la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyan mong sa yi sras 'byung bas// ma zhes gsungs pa yin par 'dod
69b8(rgyud): gas ba krogs thos pa/ skrag pa phun 'ang ba yin bskyed/ bskyed pa'i byed napa zhes bya// skye ba gcig gis sangs rgyas pas/ sras rnams sun mong ma yin skyed// dal phyid pa skyes bya/ 
70a1(rgyud): / rgyan mong bya ma'i zhal nas shes// de na A ra ba shang byaste// bdud kyi drug dag gsang ba ste// gzugs dang sa dang dring // reg byed bzhin chos yin te// rgyud ni dbang bzhi
70a2(rgyud): ste// brjod bya brjod byed brgyad du bshad// gsang ba lnga ni rgyal po lnga// lta ba spyod pa zung 'jug la ma// rgyu dang 'bras bu sa la sags// bcu dgu rgyal po yin par gsungs// kyo ba dpa' bo 'jigs
70a3(rgyud): pache// gnod sbyin gzugs dang srin po gzugs// gzhan yang bdud la sogs pa'i gzugs// sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi// lha'am klu la sogs pa'i gzugs// sdug pa ston na ji ltar bgyi// 
70a4(rgyud): gnod sran skra dang srin po sgra// shin du 'jigs pa'i sgra grag na// de la bdag gis ji ltar brtse// tshangs pa'i sgra dang ngang ba'i ste// sgra snyan byung ni de ltar bgyi// bya rgod dri dang bAtsi dri// ngan skyugs la
70a5(rgyud): sog sa dri byung na// de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi// gur bum tsan dan ga bur sogs// dri zhim byung na ji ltar bgyi// bdud rtsi la sogs drug cu sogs// bzang po ston na ji ltar bgyi// ngan skyugs la
70a6(rgyud): sogs dman pa'i ro// sna tshogs ston ni ji ltar ba gyi// reg bya lcags kyi sku gri sogs// rtsu ba pa byung na ji ltar bkye// drar men la sogs lus kyis reg/ 'jam pa byung na ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten
70a7(rgyud): chos rnams sna tshogs dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos rnams ston// de la bdag gis ji ltar bkye// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa 'a stsal ba// gzugs ngan khong khro ma bskyed cing // gzugs bca
70a8(rgyud): 'dod par mi gyi ste// de la lus kyi rgyag bya snad// yar byed dpa' jog pa pa 'ag ye// dngos grubasngal pa yin par sa// brgyal zhugs can gyis dngos grub byung // lan mod bdud bye bar chad de/ 
70b1(rgyud): bdud bsal ba yi cho ga bcom// kun la mkhas pas sbyor bar bya// sgra sman 'dod pa mi bskyed par// 'jigs pa'i sbal khong mi gro// de la gtang snyoms sems bya ste// rdo rje glu yis brtag par bya// de
70b2(rgyud): dri bzang mi chags zhing // dri ngan khrong khro mi bye bar// mnyam par dmigs la brtag par bya// dri phyag rgya de la bstan// lar byed mkha' 'gro'i sprul pa ste// lan med bdud kyi sprul pa'o// ro babang bza'
70b3(rgyud): bya zhing // rong na dor bar mi bya'o// mnyam par gzhag la brtag par bya// de la rol phyag rgya bstan// de bzhin bye brag shes par bya// de bzhin chos la chos phyag rgya// brtags te bdud rnams bsngal ba
70b4(rgyud): bya// lus la byung ba'i bdud rnams kyang // kha dog dbyibs la shes par bya// dang po dngos grub byang ba yang // mig gis gzugs la rna bas sba// snga yis dri dang lce yis ro// lus kyis reg dang yid kyis
70b5(rgyud): chos// tshul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang // de nas bdud ni bsal bya ste// yang na stong pa'i rjod la gnas// yang na srin las bzhi yis bsal// chu yis bde ba 'jam sogs pas// nang gi bdud ni gas
70b6(rgyud): ba'o// pad ma khris steng sgo bdus pa'i bar// rlung can mgo ye sgo ru ste// chud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // de ltar byas na dngos grub thob// dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i chud kyis rgyal po rdzog
70b7(rgyud): s+ho// rgya gar phye mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / bad kyi la nub dge slong shAkya yaM shes kyis bskang ba'o// #\u0f7f// rgyag srad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ba bide raN+Datan+ta dAng / bod sa dadu/ dpal rdo 'jigs byed rnam
70b8(rgyud): papar 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi la los pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su kyang chub
71a1(rgyud): sems dpa do snying pos/ bco ldan 'das la la /  nas 'angs/ dacas gsol to// thugs rjeche ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo/ gang la
71a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed gang // 'joms pa gang lags rgyud gang lags// rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang stsal pa// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// nyon mongs bdud
71a3(rgyud): sogs 'jigs par byed// nyon mongs dgras gos rnam par 'joms// chu mi rgyud dang 'bras bub rgyad// mthar thug chung ni gang yin la// rgyal ba zhi ni brtan pa yin// dzarnga snying pos yang gsopa pa/ 
71a4(rgyud): khrag ma 'tshal bas// de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdorje rnam pa gsum yin te// don gyi rdo rjed nas rtags// rdzas kyi ngorje dang ni gsum// de nas don gyi rdo bsha/ 
71a5(rgyud): bung 'dzin rtog pas me byed b+hir// don gyi rdo rje bshad pa'o// dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste// rdo rje bzhi ru bshad pa yin// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dag pa// rtse gsum sgra gsung
71a6(rgyud): thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga yang shes lnga yi rtags// rtse dgu khams gsums dgu'i rtags// don gyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa/ 
71a7(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// 'jigs dang 'joms pas rdo rje'o// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la// gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtog pa// 'jig cing 'jom
71a8(rgyud): pas rdo rje'o// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel pa'i// khyad cig skyes dga' la sogs la// gzung dang 'dzin par gang rtog pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel la
71b1(rgyud): samanyid pa// gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rtags kyi rdo rje ni// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs su bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mu/ 
71b2(rgyud): gsum// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// nga rgyal la sogs rnam pa sa// 'jig cing 'joms byas rdo rje'o// de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa ste// zur gsus
71b3(rgyud): do la 'bigs pa dang // gru bzhi dag ni gsal bar byed// zlum pos rdzas rnams 'joms par byed// bur lngas 'dod bkrub rdzas rdo rnga// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa ba'i// chu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i gyur// mthar
71b4(rgyud): nu/ rgyud ni rgyal po ste// de rnam kun la dbang byed pas// l-ig lha'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dpa'
71b5(rgyud): zheng mi gunas rjes su yi rangs te/ g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / baN
71b6(rgyud): ta kA la d+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// #// rgya gar skad du/ shrI a g+ni mA la tan+da rA dza/ bod na dadu// dpal ma'i phreng ba'i chud ci rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
71b7(rgyud): ta bye// bdag la lhung la zhub mchis/ zhon gang lags rtse gang lags// du ni gang sazhes kagang lags// dab ga zhinyi drug gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin
71b8(rgyud): gtes med pa shes te// nyen rgyu sogs rnam par spangs// rin du ni chogs dang bral ba nyid// ga ni gang du'ang mi gnas so// de rta'i dpal ldan te du// rtag tu lus dang sems la gnas// de nyid la
72a1(rgyud): par rnam pa bzhi// dbang pa ni grangs kyis nges pa ste// dang po bum dbang te drug/ u dang phyug mtshan snang ba'i tshe// rang sems las su rung ba ste// de tshe 'jig rten thamal pa'i
72a2(rgyud): ma/ rkyen pa zhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i phyir ni haM zhes brjod// las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral// de yi byi na du nis brjod// 'jig te tham la rnam rtog gi// gzung 'dzir gang yang 'i gnas
72a3(rgyud): phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis bgags gnyis su med// de yi phyir na shrI ru brjod// bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka/ phag mo la gnas chos
72a4(rgyud): dang ldan// bag med rga rkyen kun dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul// de na pa gsang dbang he ru ka/ nyi zla phyag mtshan yig 'bru' chog pa// bskyed rim cu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs las
72a5(rgyud): rung bas na// de yi rkye na he zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i// tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na du// bskyed pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang // dmigs dang sta
72a6(rgyud): la yang // mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med pa'i// phyir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste// rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan// rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// 
72a7(rgyud): sogs snga ma'i dbor gnas// rtsa rluyang bzhin gnas la sogs// nang gi chu dang rkyen sogs ldan// nang gi dpal ldan te draka/ de nas gsum pa'i he ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa pa/ 
72a8(rgyud): phyiphye ni he ces brjod// rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi// tshogs dang bral phyir du zhes brjod// rlung dang rtsa dang theg le dang // naN+DA li li kha dog dang // dbyibs po mi gnas kyir na ka/ sems nyid
72b1(rgyud): gnas pas so// nang gi thabs dang shes rab med// de'i phyir na shrI ru gsungs// migaser nad kyis btab pa ltar// rang sems bde bar gnas pas so// sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang // bde ba la/ 
72b2(rgyud): bsten tshogs dang ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad med// sems dang bde ba gang gnas pa// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// gsum pa'i dpal ldan haM
72b3(rgyud): nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka/ rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral// de yi phyir na he zhes bya rjod// pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam// thams cad stong par ro gcig pas/ 
72b4(rgyud): nyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod// bde ba tsam la'ang mi gnas phyir// ko zhes nges par brjod pa yin// sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas// stobs sogs phun sum tshogs pas na// rang bzhin gyi
72b5(rgyud): cig skyes pa dang // gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan// shrI zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// dngos por ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gan
72b6(rgyud): bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdud rnams kun la mo 'tsham zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol// mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin med// snang zhing gsal la rang bzhin med// me long bzhin 'a
72b7(rgyud): bla bzhin// mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang // de ltar don ni mi rtogs par// kha cig sa mdog phyag mtshan la// he ruka yi rnam par rtog/ kha cig gzugs brnyan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngos
72b8(rgyud): 'dod/ bzhin rtsa dang drung 'dod sogs// de 'azhin da jig te dug/ bla'am bsnyen partson pasu med// shes rab me ldan pa zad pogs med//  sa na zeng rtsal can/  dang grags brjid dpa la dzun pa pa to
73a1(rgyud): // bskyed// de bas he ru kar grags pa'i// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang ldan gus bcas pha rol phyin// rdzogs byas bla ba dam pa las// man ngag yang dag blang bar bya/ 
73a2(rgyud): / mo tshogs kyis yang zhus pa// he ru ka dpal de ltar na// nga rje phag mo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsum sta phag ni gnyis// don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags// zam
73a3(rgyud): cing rje ste// don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi phyed byer na rdo rje ste// dbang ba zhis rdo rje de'o// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtsa lnga rtse dgu ste// rtse gsum
73a4(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te// khams gsums dgu 'jams pa yi// rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu'o// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// rdul po la sogs rnam pa bzhi// mi shes drims
73a5(rgyud): ches gos pa'i// dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang // shes rab char byung phag mo sa// de nyid rnam pa bzhi rungs// bum dbang zhe sdang gti mug phag/ gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug pag/ gsum pa chags
73a6(rgyud): dka' gti mug lag/ bzhi pa chos dbyings gti mug phag/ 'di nyid khyod pa lags par gtad// thams cad rjes su ye rang ngo // dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal lo shrI he ru ka'i nges par 'thung brjog
73a7(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA la d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur cing zhus pa'o// #/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra sid+d+ha dz+wa la saM bar ta n+t+ra rA dza~M/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom
73a8(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'grol phyag 'tshal lo// 'di gad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dis dga' ldan gyi gnas rin po che'i khang babang gnang na byang chub sems dpang / 
73b1(rgyud): kya a ra dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang drim med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon btsun mo'i bla gas snyoms par zhugs pa
73b2(rgyud): su rikas sgyu ma'i dbang du mdzad de thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
73b3(rgyud): thal po sbyar nas gsol pa/ mgon po thugs rje tshe ldan pa// de nyid don de ma gang yin pa// dpal dang rdo rje don dang ni// dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don// des bstan don ni gang yin pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du ka
73b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa la sogs la dzor rnams kun// phyi rol don la g.yeng ba'i sems// nang du bsdus la rje gcig nyon// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// de nyid mchod
73b5(rgyud): 'os yan la// gnyis med bde bas mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir// rdo rje zhes ni bsten pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chom su rdo rje 'chang chen po
73b6(rgyud): nr-i a par 'thob pa'o// dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rig tu bstan pa// grangs med rgya cher bstan pa ni// nam mkha' dang mtshungs som pa'i don/ nam mkha' ngang ma dzangs sems
73b7(rgyud): de nyid stong pa'ingo// skad cig de yi nan nyid la// rgyud kyis bya bar bstan pa yin/ da na gyi rjem pa'i le' sa pa'o// ban
73b8(rgyud): ye shes bya ba'i chu dang gnas// rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul// bye brag se dzem thas dang / na me mags gang yin dang // phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang / don dam de nyid chos kyi dkyi
74a1(rgyud): 'dir ni bshad par bya// rgyu ni rang reg ye shes te// rgyu med d+hu yi rang bzhin can// rang rig klu mar byung ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te// 'khor po bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad/ 
74a2(rgyud): de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// ye shes skye ba'i rten yin la// gnas ni da dang mnyam par rtse// grogs ni ye shes rlung yin te// ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas de nyid byung ba yin// grangs ni snga ma
74a3(rgyud): ltar shes bya// ngo bo thig le nyid yin te// thig le mdud pa'i grangs su shes// de yi phan yon gang yin pa// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// phyin ci log tu brtags pa yi// rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin
74a4(rgyud): 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje dra pa'i sdom pa'i rgyud las ye shes kyi chu dang gnas la sogs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad byar/ 
74a5(rgyud): / 'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs yin no// de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni// 'dab ma bcu drug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma la
74a6(rgyud): sprul pa'i 'khor po'i 'dab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi dag yin no// bad chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste// sangs spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo
74a7(rgyud): bcu drug/ bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba ru// haM ni dkar po zur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// oMn dmar ba gyen bltas pasam// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lho dbus su// hUM ni
74a8(rgyud): bzung ba ltas pasam// sprul pa'i 'khor ba'i ste dbus su// i ne dmar ba rkyen pa ltas palam dang pa'i 'khor ba'i bad ba sa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni// lugal 'thung thugs men dgodang
74b1(rgyud): / nga nga sa kyin pal// dbyangs pan ga sa bzhin da// chos kyi ma ba'i 'dabs la// bam pata/ phyag 'di rnams g.yon nas dgong // ma rdzes// bacham nas/ 
74b2(rgyud): gabasus dgod pa \u0f7f// sgrul pa'i 'dangs pani rtsibs ste// gas pa kyang y-i su cu gnyis//  sa byung lugs las zlog rgyal spyod// lkug su rgyas kyi gang yin// dbus nas/ 
74b3(rgyud): de dkar po thur bltas pa// mar gyi rtse la thug par dgod// g.yas nas thabs kyi rtsa gnas te// ka li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// thabs la lan gsum bskor byas na// lugs/ 
74b4(rgyud): byung 'og du kha bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas lanyam mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni// gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// sgal tshigs la gnas srog la brten/ rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i
74b5(rgyud): gnas der ni// rin chen dang 'dra mdud pa ni// dgu por gnas pa bya gdong tshul// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// bde ba reg ster ma ni bzhugs// gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis// gru gsum
74b6(rgyud): nas su yi ge raM// de ni yongs su gyur pa las// me yi 'khor lo gru gsum pa// tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te// lte bar raM ni dmar po bsam// 'dab ma gsum la oM AHhUM// gru gsum zur la dkod
74b7(rgyud): bya// rdo rje rtse gsum bsam par bya// rlung gi gnas su yaM ge yaM// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// mdor nag gan yi kyings 'drab// tshad ni song bzhi nyid yin no// dbus su 'dabam lnga yin te// 
74b8(rgyud): bar yang na dag po 'asam// 'dab ma lnga la d+ha lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o// rlung gis dam tshig me sba rabs// dam tshig me yisag tu
75a1(rgyud): // ni bsros pa lis// haM 'azhu bdud ci'i char yang bab// lte ba'i gnas su thig leng gyur// rgyun du 'bar bar krur ba yis// rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang slebs nas// rang bzhin dka' ba tam
75a2(rgyud): myong bas// rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'o// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpa'ar rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rlung
75a3(rgyud): lngal 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i// nges don du ni nga yis gsungs// de yi don la khyed rnams kyis// rtseg
75a4(rgyud): las kyis yid la rung // bcom ldan 'das kyi ba de skad ces dka' stsal pa dang byangs pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la logs pa dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor pa'i 'khor dpag tu
75a5(rgyud): med pa thams cad dga' zeng mgunas rjes su yi rang nas lha'i mchod pa rna ba pa du mas mched pa ni nam mkha' la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg pa dang / rgod pa dang / dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang / paT
75a6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / zhal byas kyi mchod pa ro brgya pa dang / btung ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ gzhan yang nang dang / gsang ba dang / 
75a7(rgyud): sang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal de rje phung ba dra ba sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal
75a8(rgyud): // a sa na po /  / slong kyis shes rgya ci grus pa'o// 9/ ga ba du/  'dun dpa nga / po spyad/ 
75b1(rgyud): chen ye shes rgyal po'i rlung kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la b+ha ka 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas zas pa nas gcag sa bcom ldan 'das de len tud 'atsun mo phyag la
75b2(rgyud): 'bo rnga rje la sogs pa mkha'i 'gram dang / mamo'i tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs pa'i dus su/ dpa' ba rdo rje ma'a' 'gro ma la sags bas pa yin phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum byas nas
75b3(rgyud): tshig tu 'khod do// dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la skye bos gtugs te/ ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// rtsan gang lags rlung gang lags// thig le dang
75b4(rgyud): zhi du// de la sems gzung ji ltar lags// 'khor lo ji ltar lags pa dang // de yi grangs ni du zhig mchis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji
75b5(rgyud): ba rtse sa pa ni// yi ge dgar ba gang dang gang // gtam mo skar ba dre ldar lags// ba tem ji lta sags// gnas ni gang dugazung bar bgyi// rkyen gnyis 'gyur ma de ltar lags// kau 'ag
75b6(rgyud): de ltar lags// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi gang lags// de rnams kyi na dgongs pa dang // de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung // stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa yi rim brda ltar lags// de rnams
75b7(rgyud): dgas pa dang // dgos pa'i dgongs pararda ltang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la// nyon cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod// khyod la bshad kyil legs par zung // rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni// rnab
75b8(rgyud): gnyis med thams cad byed // dar gnas srung shi ba na ni// g.yab rnam shes g.yo pa yid// theg ma stong gde po ste/ nga rtad pas ma du med pa'o// ga le grang ni ludrug ste// rtsa nga drubang pa
76a1(rgyud): de nas sems gzhung bstan pa ni// rtsa rlung dang ni theg le la// gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin te// 'de chen 'khor lo longs spyod chos// de 'og spu
76a2(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo ste// re re la yang bzhi 'gri ste// bcu druka grangs su shes par b+ha// me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te// ro ba'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni// spyi gtsug 'khor lo dbang bskur gnas// gsang
76a3(rgyud): lo bzhi yin te// bde skyong 'khor lo dang po ste// rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor lo yin// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs su bstan// rtsa rnams
76a4(rgyud): rang bzhin nga yis bshad// rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te// rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no// de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// bde chen 'khor lo mum cu gnyis// gsal byed sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas
76a5(rgyud): bskor te dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dbyangs yig bcu drug gapon nas dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// sum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon nas dgod// thabs ni mtsham

76b1(rgyud): gnag gzhu// dbyibs// dbus su d+ha lnga dgod byas nas// bdan ldan mengs pa'o// klu gsum gnas su yi gong// me la 'khar la gru gsum dbar // dbus su e AHtA ni dgod// bur la
76b2(rgyud): gsum gyi mtshan// rkyen gyi 'khor la da ltar yin// rlung kas bskyed pas dngam tshig mes// ye shes men bskul ba mkhas// 'khor la bzhi'am brkyang gnyis bshad// bde chen ma rtogs gnyis tsab

79a3(rgyud): gatha' dang bar te grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas// 'byung po'i gdon dang ro langs dang // stag dang khyi dang ce spyang dang // wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // khyed tshig pa dang rnam par dbyangs//

79b1(rgyud): tsun mo'i b+ha ga je lta bu// bzhugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi ba dag bdud// mAl bu dang phung po'i bdud// bdud pani bcom
79b2(rgyud): pas bcom pa la// ldan pa yon tan drug nyid de// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba 'bang // ye shes phun sum chags pa ni// dran po de la ldan zhes gsungs// 'khor//
