79b6(rgyud): bye yi dpa' bar bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yau// lha rlung theg le 'aslobs pa yis// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni// nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// 
79b7(rgyud): dka' ba la ni yi don bsgoms pas// gzung dang badzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms// de ci gsang ba'i dpa' bo yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas// tha dang rtog pa
79b8(rgyud): 'jongs pa'i phyir// de kho na yi dpa' bor bshad // dpa' mo la yang rnam pa 'azhe// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdong nas spos bral ldan grub la// lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// don gyi yi dpa'ayo
80a1(rgyud): bshad// nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin mang bar byed pas ma// gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pas ma// rang reg sems kyis rang/ 
80a2(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgom pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po N+DI yi mchod pa ni// me tika bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang lha ba shas
80a3(rgyud): btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang dag bya 'jam pa dang // 'khor lo rin chen glang po ta// btsun mo dpag dpon blon pa rnams// phyi yi mchod
80a4(rgyud): bathun myong ngo // rang gi lus las byung ba yi// bdud rtse lnga dang btung ba dang // sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// 'khor lo rnams la bachad pa nang // de nas gsang
80a5(rgyud): 'i mchod pa ni// rang snang thabs kyi rim pa yis// skra gzung b+ha ga kun btsod// rtsa dang drung dang thag le sogs// dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang // sman cig skyes pa'i bde ba brjod// rang
80a6(rgyud): / rig stong par rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos sku la// zhen pa rnams dang bral ba ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol ba// gtor ma zhes pa gang la bgyi// de yi phan yon rje
80a7(rgyud): ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// phye nang gsang ba de khor// dang po phye yi gtor ma ni// thun mtshams lha ye mdun nyid du// ri la pa pe dang la
80a8(rgyud): rgyu// skyed gsum ma las drum gcig pa'i// na dung sha snga la// sbrugasang drugs kyi sbyor b.la'i// lha rnam lam nyel par byed pa dang // mkha' 'grod kyis par byed pa'o// gnyis pa dang gi 'dor
80b1(rgyud): ma ni// phung pa khams dang skye mchad rnams// lus na lha yi 'khor logaN+Da ni ye shang mkha' 'grom// srin bu las sna mkha' 'gro mchod// gsum pa gsang ba'i gtong ma ni// la r-i lob ni ri ka d+ha
80b2(rgyud): rlung dang thag la bdud rtsi lo// dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mthong bar bya// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni// phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dkris kyi bad snod du/ 
80b3(rgyud): ngan dam sems kyi gsum sngags kyis// bde ba chen po'i ngang ba mtshad// phan yon dngos grub ster ba dang // phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang // zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang // khams dang mched rtas pa dang / 
80b4(rgyud): nas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // sgra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang // 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin ji lu dra
80b5(rgyud): de las 'khrus nas ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar gzhag/ de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// sapa sa las ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems las ma
80b6(rgyud): gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing // ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te// nges na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sems kyi gamang 'di gabang ba'i mchog/ khams gsung ba
80b7(rgyud): dang g.yod bcas pa// snang ba snang zhing grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// thog sar pa skyes rang bzhin dag/ glo brang sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin// kun rdzob
80b8(rgyud): ngam gnyis ma yin// rang bzhin rig pa 'od gsal sogs// slar med brjod du med pa ste// dper na lkugs pas ro myang 'dra// ras dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la/ na log tog rtse sogs rnam par 'a
81a1(rgyud): / khams gsum btan dang ga yor snang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang // ded/ slong ba sna tshogs dag/ de nyid ga pang dang martag ste// 'a sa 'phrul nas nga ses 'chid/ 
81a2(rgyud): gis gsod cing rang gis za// rang gis lhung zhing rang sdug bsngal// rang reg ye nas spros bral la// sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'khrul// rang rig rang gis 'od gsal la// ma reg mun pas bsgribs
81a3(rgyud): lakhrul// dngos po stong par ngo mnyam la// blang dang dar bar byed na 'khrul// 'dod yon rang gis 'gag pa la// de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul// rang reg ye nas stong bra la// 'dod yon lnga
81a4(rgyud): brtan da gardul// dmin dang gya nom med pa la// sgo dang srung ba 'debs na 'khrul// gdong nas spros bral spyan grub la// sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma
81a5(rgyud): / dedag gnyis su 'dzin na 'khrul// don dam kun rdzab gnyis med la// bden pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rga la// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul// 
81a6(rgyud): la ma gnas blar// dngos po mtshan mar gnas na 'khrul// sems kyi glang cher me 'dul bar// g.yed pa'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul// nam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa la// rang rig ye shes 'di
81a7(rgyud): 'khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar// che ba'i nga rgyal sman 'khrul// rang rig nyams su ma myong bar// dkar po'i chos rnams spong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul/

81b1(rgyud): chen pa 'byung // des na rang sems 'phrul pa dag/ dod du snang ba btu rtse// skye ba med pazhin snga bas lajug// ga bsregasas gan dang ga sems/ mi sogs kya pa gan na sa// bkras
81b2(rgyud): bsngal rang gi sems// zas sgom bkres pa gzhan na med// brdeg brtsag lcags bzhus rang gi sems// sreg gcod shan pa gzhan na med// 'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun// rang gi sems sum
81b3(rgyud): na// de yis sangs rgyas spang ba yin// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// theg chen zab ma'i mdo rgyud blta// bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms nA// ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// 
81b4(rgyud): nga bar mi 'gyur gang yang med// de las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung // skra dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung // de dag sems kyi phan yon no// lha mos gsol ba
81b5(rgyud): man 'das// rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis// gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// 
81b6(rgyud): dol bko lpags mkhan la sogs// gzugs ngan gsod pa'i don gnyer ba// theg pa 'di las 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa dang // gtso bo yab yum bsgom pa dang
81b7(rgyud): 'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed ram spos dang bcas pa'i lam// rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lha sogs bu mo mtshan ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// la
81b8(rgyud): rgya tshogs pa'i lam// gnas pa rtse dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang sems dman pa dbyabs// bab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar drug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa// chos kyi phyag cha grol
82a1(rgyud): / la ga/ tan yod ma yan len pa med // dmigs pa thams rgya rnam 'asal te// b+had cig rgyal pa na pa pa// phyag rgya chen par nga byen pa cwa// nga rnams gnyis su bsdu ste/ 
82a2(rgyud): gang zag mchog dang lngas dang ngo // las dang pal phye nang gnyis// mchog la yang ni phyi nang gnyis// dbang ba ni bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen po
82a3(rgyud): gsungs pa ste// 'di yis chung rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum// ba shar rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis te// lan lag chud ni grangs las 'das// rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang // phyi ba'i phyi
82a4(rgyud): mar bsdus pa yin// bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dmangs rigs gdol pa gdul don du// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// kye spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol ba bcor rdza
82a5(rgyud): 'das// gnas gang du ni gtso bo bsgom// thabs ni rnam pa du zhigs ches// de bzhin thabs las byung ba ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po// ri rje drar khrod do steng du// gcer bu sba bshig sgor
82a6(rgyud): bkrus te// A le kA lis lus bsrungs la// dpa' bo'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// smid par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam// lam gnyis la ni badzin nas su// sngan

82a8(rgyud): dang spang ba nyid dang de// 'dug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis bad+ma ba dang bang bkrung dang // nye 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la// nya bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'angam// ma gnyis mnyam bdag na
82b1(rgyud): nas su// rdo can gyis chos 'chad do// stong pa mngon cur chas sru la// mtshan dpe bad pa longs spyod klu// rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul sru la// sku gsum dbyer med bde chen dang // lha mos gsol pa bcom
82b2(rgyud): ldan 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// gang la bor chad 'thung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'kha rabs sgonas sdom gsum ldan// thos tshe dang ldan mtshan nyid
82b3(rgyud): bzang // dben par dkyil 'khor bris sgra bcad// chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyad// thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'thung bar 'gyur// g.yeng bache
82b4(rgyud): ba'i rnal 'byar la// bsgom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'thung bar 'gyur// le lo che ba'i rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'thung bar
82b5(rgyud): 'gyur// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// rmad kyi tsong g+ha Ta//  ba'i rgyud ces gangal brtse// bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la ba gyi// 'byung ba'i dus ni nga lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
82b6(rgyud): pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la// rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yong ba rgyu la bsgrub pa'am// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin// thog mar gsungs pa rtsa ba'i rgyud// phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i

82b8(rgyud): 'byor bu med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// bab mo'i chud 'di gang las// ji lta bu la sbyin par bya// ster na lung nod nga ltar bya// bka' 'di rgya yis ji lhur gdab bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhing
83a1(rgyud): // stsal pa// snying rje med cing khral 'dug/ khengs shengad rgyags pa tshul khrims med// dad med regs par thazas sgo// chos rgyang sring ring rnams la swa// dpa' nang du la ba gros
83a2(rgyud): ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sku mad// dang ldan rigs bzang gtong yong che// thos me ngamachog ldan la sbyin// dbang ba ni bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la// yang ngo //

83a4(rgyud): lan gsum brjod la chung rnams sbyin// phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la// chags sems thod pa'i sgo

83a8(rgyud): ge 'tshal lo// sems can rnams pa phan 'dad pas// rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// chag gi yul las rnam par 'das// ni zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan par/ 
83b1(rgyud): mtshan spangs// ngang shes pab rgyas 'ang nye tshul// mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs// khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas// bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yig// rmongs patubs/ 
83b2(rgyud): pad 'dod pas// nye rje 'dini bstan pa yin// kha cag spang bar 'dod pa dang // kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang // kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni// blod dman dag ni 'dzag par byed// de nyid nges par

83b5(rgyud): brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags ni yang rag dkang // kha cig dkyil 'khor bre ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'thung dang 'brang las gyur pa'i lus// de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog

84a1(rgyud): kyi gleng ni rnam par brgyan// bya ba nan tun kyad 'phags pa// byang gi ltang ni rnam par smos// mnyam nyid ye shes chen pon// bag chags mang gA rjes rtogs byed// gzhan du'ang pa lnga
84a2(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa// grwa yi dbus ni thams cad du// de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas// ye shes spong yul du ni brtag/ sgo ba nir yang dag brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa 'anar byung ba// de bzhin sra ba ni

84a8(rgyud): shes kyis ni mtshan// de yi 'o/ tu rtag tu gsungs// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir// rdo rjerje ran 'chi yis sras// zlas nyis gang gsungs pa// thabs dang shes pa do
84b1(rgyud): mdzong byi// thabs dang shes pa bdag nyid sems// ye shes 'das rirnam par badz+ran// khrug su dza rje smras// de nyid dkyil labar dun gsungs// sku gsung zhug sa ni ne 'i / rnam
84b2(rgyud): gcig tu mtshan nyid med// glu ma sleb ma rnams gsal ba// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs// sbyin sreg yang ni bshang ba yang // lha rnams tshim pa yis brjod// rnam tog med pa'i sems ga
84b3(rgyud): ba khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid// bye brag skyed pas me nang du// gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams// sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid// thams cad kyi ni sreg lugs bya// gzug
84b4(rgyud): sogs pa gang byung ba// yab shing zhes na rab tu grags// nga ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas de// rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni// gang zhing sems ni brtan gyur pa// de nyid pa
84b5(rgyud): rnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos po so// gang ni gasngags kyi mtshan nyid de// de ni gsal bar brjod pa bya// yid rnams kyis ni skang du dang // gab nag gsangs bang gagis badzang /

84b7(rgyud): par bya// phung po kham pa dang byer ched kyi// rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang // yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shed// gal te sems kyi nyer brtags gang // lha zhes
84b8(rgyud): ra yang dag pa shad// sna gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni// gsal ba nga yis brjod par bya// de nas skyil krung bcas nas de/ 
85a1(rgyud): // rtse mo bkrus nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnal #// de nyid thong ba gzhag par \u0f7f// snying ga'i gnas su la ga gnas// 'bad pas mnyam pa sa nas su// mi rtag pa ra
85a2(rgyud): bzhin du// gang tshe sems ni brtsub// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ de cod de la sleb 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ spang bar byin gyis rlab par 'gyur// sangs
85a3(rgyud): thams cad 'dus pa'i bdaka/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag/ gags kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// rnal 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur// de pes gsapa bar brjod pa ni// sa gsang
85a4(rgyud): rigs kyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i dor// thabs dang shes rab spyod yus don// sems can don du snying // sangs rgyas byang chub rabasgrub pa// rtse'i dkyi pa la
85a5(rgyud): gsungs// de dag thams cad dbyings tsam du// mdor bsdus thams cad sa byas so// ras dga' dam tshig la bar la yang // de nyid zhes sum gsungs so// gas pacung ba tsam gyis n-i/ 
85a6(rgyud): nga 'grub de ni ris dga' yang // gsung gi 'khor long gzung kha yin// rnam rtoto/ meng bar lhag ro pa3// sgrub po dam pas bslab par bya// khra ka dang khu ba de'ang/ na sha// bshang ba dang ni
85a7(rgyud): // dum che ga zhes bya ba 'bud par// gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa// de rnamang kun la de bzhin gshegs// de rnams the skad tsam gyis gnas// gang tshed mtshig 'dod chags sems
85a8(rgyud): ti ngang tu da// gang cesems ni chags kyar pa// de ni sems can yongs par// dal bun du rtog pa pe// khrag dab bar 'gyur ba'o// khrag ni chen po bas nas ni// 'od dpag mang ba'ang
85b1(rgyud): // nga sa rnams las smos pa/  rtogs par byer// 'dra' bar yang dag gsungs pa da// dngos po na gyi mnyam pa nyid// shA

85b3(rgyud): phragros bdod// ngos dang chos panangs pa'i sems// zlas pa'i byar ni gnas pa 'di/ chos rnams thams cad dngab rtogs pa'o// bshang bapo bang yang dag brjod// dmatshig nyid kyi mtshan nyi
85b4(rgyud): 'di dmas thabs cad gsapa bshad// 'dre rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i chung
85b5(rgyud): / brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkhar 'gro sa dra ba sdom pa'i bdag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// ya d+ha rmA he ts+tsha pra b+ha b+hA he tun te Sh+Tha na ta thA ga to ba ta/ te Shany+tsa la na rod+ha me byai b+ha ma
85b6(rgyud): byag kyi mkhan po ga ta bA la d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tshab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// / rgya ga skad du/ shes pasapas ma tan da ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde bachog na me me/ 
85b7(rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di gang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
85b8(rgyud): rang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun po'i b+hag la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byed kyis brlabs kyis rdorje snying pom gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pas kyang tshe
86a1(rgyud): // gsang ba// gsang ba chen pa de bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdorje snying po kong nyon cig/ srog dang lnga pa de bzhin du// lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin
86a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyog gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste// sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do// rdo skyong pos ga
86a3(rgyud): ga/ bcom ldan 'das lnga pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sangs rgyas lnga dang 'thung ba lnga// lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
86a4(rgyud): lam gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smin pa dang ni grol ba'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ smin pa'i lam ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bum
86a5(rgyud): ba gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste// de yi rnam pa de la gnas/ phying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba'i lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
86a6(rgyud): la snying rje chen po las skyes pa// dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog/ bde ba chen po la ma yin no// rdo rje sring pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong
86a7(rgyud): chen po ni gang / dka' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang / shes rab ni gang / gnyis su med pa'i gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog/ dga' ba gnyis
86a8(rgyud): med bdeb che// thabs ni he ru ga dpal nyid// shes rabardo rje rnal 'byor ma// gnyis su med bzung 'jug mtshog/ dza rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das he ruka ni gang lags// rnal bkyod ma/ 
86b1(rgyud): dgu gas na las ga stsal ga na /  //  //  [।]s+ho// 9 ya spyod du// b+h+ya
86b2(rgyud): shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru ka gang lags// khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ he ru ka dpal bdag nyid
86b3(rgyud): dngos// dri ma med pa'i kha dog can// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis brgyan cing dgu dang ldan// zla chos sna tshogs rdo rje dang // rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste/ 
86b4(rgyud): chags pa med pa'i sham thabs can// shes rab rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma// ban du dmang po'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan cing // dag pa lnga bcu'i phreng bas mdzes// rdo rje pad ma'i sdong rnams pa/ 
86b5(rgyud): yab la 'khyud cing ba rkyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med 'de ba la dgyes pa// chu skyes nyi 'i dbus na bcing // khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las bskye
86b6(rgyud): ba'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang po'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni gang lags// ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das
86b7(rgyud): / kyis bka' stsal pa/ brtan dang ga pho ba thams cad kur// shes rab rang bzhin pa nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal nyid // bskyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku// brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab// rtog pa med
86b8(rgyud): ma mkha'i dbus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yong med// gnyis su med pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o// dpal bde mchog
87a1(rgyud): // dang mnyam pa'i chung las rdzogs pa' dam pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / rdo snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa rnam par dgu ba ni yang lags/ bcod/ 
87a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byaka' stsal pa/ sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ba dang // dbang gi rnam par dag pa dang // maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du// theb pa'ingo bo ltang shes pa// sngags kyi de bzhin gnas pa'o// 
87a3(rgyud): dam ni bang/ dbang ni gang / maN+Dal ni gang / bum pa ni gang / sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan
87a4(rgyud): 'das skyes bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal po s+t+wa~M/ a shrI badz+ra hi he ru ru ga hu~M hUM phaT/ DA ki rI dz+wa la sa kA ra swA hA/ oM hrIHha haH hrI phaT/ oM sarbabud+yA nA ki rI ye badz+wa la tA rI le ts+tsha rU / 
87a5(rgyud): swAt+ma/ oM dz+ra ni me nI la swAhA/ gas sngags rgyal po di dag zhes// bskal bstod mi lags pa 'o// sdig pam / 9//  na pa la stso shig// li ba lo dag gis ni me / 
87a6(rgyud): oM tA da tsa gro/ dwe pa lasags de bzhin du// bzhi pa'i dpor yang dag shes// sha lnga dang ni 'dud rje ste// chen spang rmugs pas// nga 'a la 'byod sa kun dkyis// dban pa
87a7(rgyud): la pa nyid do// bdud ce chu lis legs byugs nas// me tog dmang pos bachod pa'o// rin chen sdod pa'angs bruM rjes mdzes// dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byang chu// zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// gdu/ 
87a8(rgyud): bas lus kun 'dul zhing // sgo dang bsdu pa'i rnam pa can// da je snye pos gsapa pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das skye mched kyi mkha' 'gros gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
87b1(rgyud): bu zab pa'i mdog can te// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang kha tor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
87b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ oM dz+wa la mu khi NA~M dI kaM ka ni hUM phaT/ oM ba ri nA ya ne DA ki rI hU~M phaT/ oM ma Da ri DA ki nI hUM phaT/ oM ba ra mu khin+ti ki nI hU~M phaT/ aM u lu ka te DA ki nA hU~M phaT/ oM a ra da ma ne Tu ki nI hUM phaT/ 
87b3(rgyud): skyes dag gis rnam brgya cing // bdud rtsi rje 'is rnam par mangs// dpa ma drug ni ma nyes byar 'gyu // dzarje snying pos gsol / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang / sprul pa'i jo ba ni gang la
87b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa'i ngo bo g+ha nyid de// sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag por bshad// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi bdag po ni gang / bcom ldan 'das
87b5(rgyud): bka' stsam pa/ dbang gi kha dog dbar po ste/ zhab gcig pa la phyag ci zhig sgrul ba 'khor lo'i ni bas la gnas/ brkyang bskum tshul gyis menan pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsal ba/ bcom ldan da
87b6(rgyud): bsnyen par bya ba gang bags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de// oM ga Na ba ta le swA hA// nag po 'bru li re lu la// bsnyen dang grub pa'i lhar gnas pa// sngags kyi
87b7(rgyud): bor shes par bya// dpal bde mchos rnam bakha' dang banyam pa'i rgyud las las tshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka phul ba dang / byang chub sems da
87b8(rgyud): rjesnying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje garod gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor pa dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su pi ngas te/ bcom ldan 'dab kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
88a1(rgyud): seM brjin pa sa rgya mangs gas // 9 aHma/ ga tu sa/  ma sa / 
88a2(rgyud): maM ga laM g+ha wan+tu/ shuSh+TAM ma s+t+ra sarba dzA ga taM// / rgya gar skad du/ DA ki nI sarba tsit+ta a dA ya a tsin+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra bA rA hi a b+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro
88a3(rgyud): thathas cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa pos ma phyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal ba zhes bye ba/ mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal che
88a4(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ phyi dang nang sa gsang ba'i dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / gti mug 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / 
88a5(rgyud): / ngargyal 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / 'dod chags 'jobs pa'i he ru ka dang / brag dog 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / yum sangs rgyas spyan dang / yum mA ma kI dang / yum gos dkar mo dang / yum pa
88a6(rgyud): sgrol ma dang / yum kun du bzang mo dang / de rnams kyi byug pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis me khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi
88a7(rgyud): dang / gros ma nag mo dang / bde chen dkar mo dang / ser po don grub pa dang / dmar lo sa sgrog ma dang / sna tshogs mthar phyin pa dang / las kyi gtso mo la sogs pa'i ye shes dang / las la grub
88a8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ba'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang bdun sIni dang / rat+naH kaini dang / bad+ma tra ka ni dang / barba d+dakIr+the dang / sa ma ya T+Ta ken+te dang / bedz+re DA ka nAM dang / sarba nA ki dI dang / la ka
88b1(rgyud): logs te dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang dpa' mo tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mes po tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i chags dpag tu med
88b2(rgyud): dang / gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi po rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / phyogs sbyong ba bcu dang / lham srin sde brgyad dang / 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig pa'i tshul gyis gnas so// pang
88b3(rgyud): de'i chen ye shes kyi mkha' 'grom dur grod kyi bdag pa zhes bya ba gyi stan kas langs nas bkon po dpa'i tshe 'jigs byed he ru ka lA 'di skad ces gsol to// rtse kye bgor po bdag la gson// kye
88b4(rgyud): yong du 'dus pa ye al dang ldan pa 'di rnams la//  a log mu stegs ma la[।]9// dman pa nyan thos ma lags pa // basprin mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i// bsam kyis me sa
88b5(rgyud): cig nus// phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ bsam gyis mi
88b6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// spen par byed pa dbang gi mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan te// bas ba
88b7(rgyud): bi khyab bshad du gsol// rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal sna// bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ mkha' 'grom thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsapa kyis mi khyab pa/ bag po mngon
88b8(rgyud): ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi 'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas mgon pa des spya byigs ma tshams kun la gzigs nas zhe mardo rje makrung 'dzum pa yang nas bka bsngal ba ni/ em po// 
89a1(rgyud): // gcig dung khrod bdag mo khyod// dus 'dir tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la// mngon par byung ba'i rgyud band byas// bsru napas rdol brim can// sdod skyon gsum po spang byas pa/ 
89a2(rgyud): gcig sems kyis mnyan par gyis// phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba de// gdug ma'i sems kyis blta bar gyis// dmigs gtad med pa'i slob pa de// gzhug ma'i yid kyis bsgom par bya/ 
89a3(rgyud): dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ gtsug ma'i yid kyis spyad par bya// bar chod sel ba brda yi mchog gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsapa bar bya// smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog/ gnyug mchi
89a4(rgyud): gyis bskor bar bya// rtsi gcil 'bras bu sangs rgyas de// gtsug ma'i sems kyis bsab par bya// ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan de// ma btsas sems skyes bsgrub par bya/ rnam rtogs la byed
89a5(rgyud): rnam tshul lnga// ma bcos sems kyis gcad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi zhugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa las phag mo mngon par 'brang ba'i rgyud las ston
89a6(rgyud): zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas// dang po gdeng chen lta ba gces// des na lta ba dang por bstar// phyogs
89a7(rgyud): ris med pa lta ba'i mchog/ nam mkha' lta bu shes par gyis// thams cad 'degs pa lta ba'i mchog/ sa gzhi b+ha bur shes par gyis// thams cad bsdu dang lta ba'i mchog/ 'thung brgya b+ha
89a8(rgyud): bar gyis// nyon mongs bsreg pa lta ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba me ltar shes par gyis// ngos zung med pa lta ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba rlung ltar shes par gyes// de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa// 
89b1(rgyud): med pa lta ba'i mchog/ re bo lta bur shes par gyis// g.yo 'ayul med palta ba'i mchog/ rgya mtsho lta bur shes par bya// gas lum 'dis lta ba'i mchog/ 'ja' chen lta bur shes par gyis// gnyis
89b2(rgyud): pa b+ha ba'i mchog/ gapur lta bur shes par bya// de nas yang gsangabs cheg 'di gsungs te// zil gyis gnon pa lta ba'i mchog/ seng ge lta bur shes par bya// nyam med pa lta ba'i mchog/ gla
89b3(rgyud): khur shes par bya// skabs dang ldan pa lta ban mchog// tu mchog lta zung shes par b+ha// kun du drug pa sdu ba'amatsha// stag mo lta bu shes par bya// 'jigs pa med pa lta ba'i chog// dos su m+b+ha zla
89b4(rgyud): shes par bya// de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig 'di gsungs te// skyon gyis ma gos lta ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems de dkar por sdang // dus gsum mi 'thar lta ba'i mchog khyang
89b5(rgyud): k+Shang/ khon tan rgyas blta pa'i mchog / kyang chub sems daseng po sdang // dran la khyab pa lta ba'i mchog / byang chub sems de de mang bar snang // pri pas rdzogs pa sna ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems
89b6(rgyud): snga dra pa/ danas yang gas ga gsus te// dus ga / rnam pa pa 'di zu pa/ chos med do ldanag sems pa la/  sems sa ra
89b7(rgyud): tsi banyam ci nyid rtogs pas//  chen krung ldan thang shas// chos chenas song ma 'brel bas// snang 'amatha' yas lha bu shang// sna tshogs snang lam 'dres pas// dor long klu ba
89b8(rgyud): zhes pa gsungs so// mkha' 'grom thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes pams kyim ma gyib pa lag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las lte ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de das
90a1(rgyud): / khrod bdag mo ngas// ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus// rtogs blta ba'i rjes chog pa lan bsgom pa'i go rim de skye sa// zhes zhus pas/ de nus ston pas bka' stsal pa// sangs
90a2(rgyud): thob par 'dod pa yis// rtogs pa'i don go bsgoms las byung // gzhan du 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ye nas spos dang bral ba la// rtag par 'dzin pa ba
90a3(rgyud): pa'i skyon// phyi dang nang gi chos nyid la// chad par 'dzin pa bsgom pa'i skyon// 'o na ji ltar bsgom zhes na// lam med lam gol
90a4(rgyud): sems bskyed de// sgron 'jug gnyis po sngon du gces// gzung ba yul med skom pa'i mchog/ chos kyi bdag med rtogs par bya// 'dzin pa'i sems med bsgom pa'i mchog/ gang ga bdag med rtogs
90a5(rgyud): bya// chos rnams par yi dmi 'gegs pas// thabs kyi lam du shes par bya// ngo bo ni yang ma grub pas// shes rab lam du shes par bya// chos rnams rgyu med sgom pa'i mchog/ stong pa nyid kyi rnamadzar yin/ 
90a6(rgyud): 'bras bu stong pa sgog pa'i mchog/ mtshan med pa'i rnam thar len// rgyu 'bras dbyer med sgom pa'i mchog/ smor pa med pa'i rnam thar yin// kun la byams bsgom pa'i mchog khyams pa tshad med dang
90a7(rgyud): yin// kun la brtse ba sgom pa'i mchog/ snying rje tshad med ngo bo nyid// kun la phan pa sgom pa'i mchog/ dka' ba tshad med ngo bo nyid// kun la khyab pa sgom pa'i mchog/ btang snyoms tshad med ngo bo nyid// 
90a8(rgyud): rnadams tshogs sog skom pa'i mchog/ bzhi ga sum bcu gnyis bdag nyid can// lam la bsgoms pa sgom pa'i mchog/ nges 'byed bzhi'i bdag nyid car// ye shes mthong ba skam pa'i mchog// d+ya la la
90b1(rgyud): lag rnam bdun yin// goms par byed bsgom pa'i ram// 'phags lam brgyad kyi bdag nyid can// goms pa mthar kyin rlom pa'i mchog/ bcu pa la ni yongs su grol// sangs rgyas pa 'i rnamathar yin// 
90b2(rgyud): sems bral ba sgom pa'i mchog/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin// nga sems dag pa sgom pa'i mchog/ tshul khrims pa rol phyin pa yin// ji mi snyam bsgom pa'i mchog/ bzod pa'i pha ro ba phyin pa
90b3(rgyud): sbyor ba slom pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yin// g.yeng ba med pa sleb pa'i mchog/ bsam gtan pha rob byin pa yin// 'khor 'das shes pa sgom pa'i mchog/ shes rab pha rob
90b4(rgyud): pan// nyon mongs mi spong sgom pa'i mchog/ thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa yin// mi mthun zi ba gnon sgom pa'i mchog// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin ci bamangs 'grub bsgom chos rmod la kar
90b5(rgyud): yin// ji snyed mkhyen bya sgrim pa'i mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa yin// chos dbyings ye shes sgom pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin// me long ye shes bkrol pa'i mchog/ tha bas
90b6(rgyud): gzugs brtan g+har shes yin// mnyam nyid ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog/ dun la snyoms pa'i bdag nyid yin// sun ti ga ye shes sgom pa'i mchog/  'dres gsal ba'i sa 9// byagrub ye shes
90b7(rgyud): dbadag po des// he ru ka la 'di skad gsol// gams par bya ba'i rjes thob la// spyod pa'i gor ma de ltar ba kyi// de nas ston pas gsang ci'i tshig 'di skad ce
91a1(rgyud): stsal to// cung bang drod ni thob pa dang // de tshe spyod pa spyad par bya// dang po gas pa'i spyod pa bya// byang chub sems ni drong thong nas// rig pa tu bzhugs spong bar bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i dra
91a2(rgyud): / nas// kha dang zlog pa'i spyod 'bya// chu tshong lta bu'i dro ba'i nas// tshogs kyi spyod pa ci der spyod// smyon pa lta bu'i sems thos nas// phyogs med na ba rgyal spyangad ba bya// de ya bye ba gzhan nu gas pa/ 
91a3(rgyud): gnas dang grogs dang dus dang zas// le'u gzhan nas shes par bya// kun gyis bkur ba spyod pa'i mchog/ rgyal po lta bu'i spyod pa bya// ngo tsha shes pa spyod pa'i mchog/ rje rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya// 
91a4(rgyud): chags sngang 'khru ba skyed pa'i mchog/ bram ze'i lta bu'i spyod ba bya// srid dang bral ba skyed pa'i mchog/ dmangs rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya// dmams 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog/ gdol pa lta bu'i spyod
91a5(rgyud): bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// mthos 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog/ seng ge lhu'u'i spyod pa bya// nyam med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ glang chen lta bu'i spyod pa bya// shugs dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog
91a6(rgyud): tamadzag lta bu'i spyod pa bya// rnam tog gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog/ srung ke skye bu'i skyo ba bo// drag shul su byed spyod pa'i mchog/ dred ro lta bu'i spong bo'o// de nam gzhan yang bye shad kyi ste/ ra
91a7(rgyud): gtad med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ ri dgas lha bu'i spyod pa bya// ngo na bral ba stod pa'i mchog/ re langs lta bu'i spyod pa kye// ro dang grogs pa
91a8(rgyud): ngam bu'i spyod 'bya// bag yong rngam bstod pa'i mchod/ sa so su ngu'i spyod pa bya// de las gzhan yang bshad par bya// rlung du 'brel ba spyod pa'i mchog/ rung ba lta bu'i spyod pa
91b1(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi mthong spyod pa'i mchog/ khAta n+ta bu'i spyod pa bya// dug pa spyod pa spong ba sa rog/ byan ngur spyad pa bya// dus tshad 'dzin pa srung ba'i mchog drug lta bu'i spyod ba bya// nyes pas ma gos skye
91b2(rgyud): pa'i mchog khya rgod lta bu'i spyod pa bya// de nam gzhan yang bshad bya s+ho// rim gyis 'jog pa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ sme su rtsa pa'i stong pa rgya// 'jigs pa med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ ngom bu lta bu'i spyod pa
91b3(rgyud): tshan po rgyub spyod pa'i mchog/ zhag mag can gyi spyod pa bya// gang la mi gnas spyod pa'i mchog/ bung ba lta bu'i spyang paH// srung ba lta ba spyod pa'i mchog// 'bar ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya// de las
91b4(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ste// dgos 'dod 'byung ba spyod pa'i mchog/ nong bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya// sman dug gnyis med spyod pa'i mchog/ ga bur lta bur shes par bya// cis kyang ma tshugs
91b5(rgyud): lta bur shes par bya// bi ma thun gcod pa spyod pa'i mchog/ ral gri lta bur shes par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// thabs dang shes rab spyong pa'i mchog/ mda' gzhu b+ha bur shed par
91b6(rgyud): stong ba'i tha 'byed spyod pa'i mchog/ shag ti sa bur shes par bya// 'bigs par byed baspyod pa'i mchog/ mdung drung khung shis par bya// nga bdag gsong ba kung ba'i mchog/ sgra ri wA bur shes par bya/ 
91b7(rgyud): gdul bya badren pa spyod pa'i mchog/ lcags gru lta bu shes par bya// dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang // grang khyer dag tu rnal 'byor zla ba'i tshe// de 'dra'o gyis 'am tha tu rtogs byed// de nyi
91b8(rgyud): 'ang bameng gyu // btul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sa la 'gro// sems nyid gnyis kyi gnang dang ma thal na// rtul zhugs spyod kyang sdug 'asngal sna tshogs skye// bags kyi me bya
92a1(rgyud): // zhugs rang ldan na// rgyal ba rgya ma rigs spyi bor dbang bskur sngar// thogs pa med pa zug tu chen pod// skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas sa la dag ces gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma thams
92a2(rgyud): thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas dur khrod bdag mo des// ston pa la ni 'di skad ga
92a3(rgyud): nga dag brda ni brda chen po// kun gyis mi rtog sbas pa'i don// bar chad sel ba brda'i chos// bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// de nas ston pas bka' stsal ba// snang ba thams cad las kyi bar / 
92a4(rgyud): de snyed dag ge bang // de la bsam kyis mi khyab gnas// don gyi bang du shes par bya// de na 'du bakhrod pa dag mos yang zhus pa// gang bag 'jug pa'i rib pa dang // dpa' ba brtag pa'i rib pa dang // byas
92a5(rgyud): brtag pa dang // mchog dang thun mong dngos grub dang // tshogs kyi 'khor po'i dus ngag dang // rnal 'byor phal mo rdzogs byed dang // khang yi bye brag ji snyed pa// 'gro mgon khyed kyis bshad du gso pa// 
92a6(rgyud): po dpa' bos bka' stsar ba// thabs cad kun gyi bar chen po// smras pa'i bang ni bshad bya ba// dpas pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang // g.yon pa shas rapa rang bzhin dang // sus kyi brda rnams rdzogs par
92a7(rgyud): slob paston pa la// lag pag podan pa bstan pa ni// sa ro zhes ni 'arjod par bya// rkang bgrong khyer sa bgrod pas// spyod pa nyams kyang shes 'gro ba// kho ba'i phyir nas chung bstan te// sa gru ba shes parjod pa
92a8(rgyud): na lag mkha' 'grom yin// de yi phyi na de bstan te// shes rab chen por so kyi'i kyi// b+ha ta zhes brjod par gyi// lce yis ram kyar pyor ltar// stong pas bde ba srong bstan gyi// kye bstan na d+ha g+ha zhes
92b1(rgyud): la ba ldan pa bad/ nyid do// yul la ga par bya sa byar// stong bas da ldan pa// san d+hamags brjod par bya/ stobapas kyi snang yin phyir// de bzhin sa ngan bstan par bya// bla ma'i btud / 
92b2(rgyud): // ba tag zhes brjod par bya// so po rlung baN+DagaN+Da pA/ khwa pa ma Ta// 'grus kyi seM ma la bstan pa/ na s+ho zhes brjod pa pa// so'i skyongs kyis pas 'dul sa pa/ 
92b3(rgyud): rtogs par byed// gang gis so ni bstan byas pas// ci la ni zhes brjod par bya//  ras lus kyi stongs rtse// goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir// go byin pa ni bstan byas pa// mig pa zhes brjod// 
92b4(rgyud): pa/ sag pe 'gro ba kun 'degs snapa/ 'bras bung tshig gis bsnyen ltar// ma dges pa ni bsnyen byas la// m+b+ha la zhes thang brjod ba la/ khor ma thun d+ha mardzun byeng// rung rdza gas lngar rgyam sa
92b5(rgyud): ngal// gabs pa'i song mo lnga bstan pa// sa ran zhes brjod par bya// me spyong pa dang rdo rje zang // rgyas gang ba gnyis ni go bya'i phyir// dadu de ning zung bar bya// de la bur sham zhes brjod par bya// so cha/ 
92b6(rgyud): she sung bes// 'bras bu rtags ni ldan pa'i phyim/ gnyes snang brjod kying mo 'pha' sas// yata tha zhes brjod par bya// shar srog chags thams cad las// badz+ra tshum rnams byams cad ni// sems
92b7(rgyud): pin gyur nas sha bstan pas// tsan zhes brjod par bya// khro ga nyer thos pa'i rtags yin pas// bya ba thams cad sdug bsngal che// rtags yin byer na khro gnyer bstan// ne re ga zhes brjod par bya// bsdams
92b8(rgyud): bas dbye ba med pa ltar// 'khor 'das dbyer mi byed pa ltar// b+ha ga na zhes brjod par bya// dpe yis mtshon pa'i don du de// dridr-i ma kun las krol ba'i phyir// bsdams pa bkra sa nas sred da 'arjod// rkyen gyi
93a1(rgyud): / brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin// thams cad tshim par byed pa sa pa/  tshogs snang ba'i mos sun la// bde bachen pa'i ba ma byed/ gtong ma btang ba teg khadzod// stob pas
93a2(rgyud): rin ltar// sems can sangs rgyas snod yin pas// don du lto ba bstar nab ni/ ni gang ma zhes 'arjod par bya// de rnams pan yon dpag med pas// snying tshurang dugasal pa gag nga ldan pa'i rnal 'byong bag ladu cin
93a3(rgyud): po la// longs spyod pa ni thabs kyi mchog byin gyis brlabs dngas bon dang // rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad pas// dpag med rim gyis phan yon 'thung // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// rdza bsdus
93a4(rgyud): rje momaldan pa 'o// bum pa'i dbang skye lus kyi bang // mtheb srim me'i drang ragacig// gsang ba'i dbang ste lus kyi bang // byang chub mchog gi phyag ni// gsum ba shes rapa ye shes phyin// skes da ma
93a5(rgyud): skyes gnyis med pas// bzhi pa yin ste lus kyi brda// de yi ngag gi bang smras pa// ka la sha ye 'um pa'i dbang // yar la la gsang ba'i banga'o// e be ma ya gsum pa'i brda'o// oM hraM oM A bzhi pa'o// 
93a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thug sa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes pasam gyis mi khyab pa pag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las brda'i leru sa drug pa'o// de nas drar khrod bdag monges// ston par tshar te/ 
93a7(rgyud): bzhi dang phrad pa de la hUM 'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / nang gi mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gsang po'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / de lan nyid kyi mchod pa phun pa 'di
93a8(rgyud): mas sa 'o// seng spyod pa sa/ 'bar 'i semasas na rkyen pa la/ ga sa kyi nga na pa stod / mas sa pa'i sems sams sa kyi bla pa chog na dug
93b1(rgyud): sems can la// sa kyi spyan me gsal// rgyal po// bu'i ston pa gyod// kun la byams pa mdza ga pa// na pa rgyu bu'i ston pa khyod// rba la phan pa mang dadu gsol// zhes zhula'o// de nas tshun
93b2(rgyud): ba 'jigs byed he ru ka de thugs rab tu dgyes te/ sku'i sgo nas mdzes gar rnam pa gsum mdzad/ gsung gi sgo nas rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gsum mdzang / thugs kyi sgo nas khyad par gyi ye shes rnam pa gsum
93b3(rgyud): bskyed nas/ 'khar rnams la spyan gzigs nas tshangs pa'i gsung gis rdo rje'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to// nyan cig dur khyod bdag mo khyod// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la// ma rin pa'i mur bas pa
93b4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rtse mtsho chen por lhung // nyor dngos 'dam du bying ba yis// dus gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// chos kyisgom brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kur// nyon mongs pa yi gnyen por bstam// 
93b5(rgyud): bang po rab 'bring dang sbar nas// thun mong theg pa rim yis bstan// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum// bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// bder gshegs thugs rjebs pa mi ltab// sems can rnams la de rtsar pa
93b6(rgyud): nas dur khrod bdag sa ngas yang 'ad gad ces gas to//  med ston pa te / yun mor rtseg pa de ltar ba na// kyad par gas sngags ji ltar lags// chung la rnams kyi bye bzhu// spen pa'i lang ni thar
93b7(rgyud): gas// grol ba'i bar ni gang ba bste// dbar po chen pos bshang du gsol// nas num mo// de nas ston pahe gas// nyon cim dur khrod bdag mo khyod// bral bar ldan pa'i gang cag de// gas dkrugs chung rje/ 
93b8(rgyud): ces// da byon gsum bathongs pa rton// khyab gaN pa byed pa pa/ khrim chung brnam pa kun/ myongabs ba sbed pa la/ gnyis kyi nga rje sa ba da// sems cad gam
94a1(rgyud): dug cogang rdzugs/  da la// rlu pa / da ya da go med ba'i chung rdzu bstan// de kye klung sbengs pa
94a2(rgyud): sngabs rgyad ces bya ba grags// dade la yang lda // b+ha chen te Tun+d+ha wA //  nang 'dring byud pa 'gyur // zhes gsungasas//  nas yang dur spyod bdag ma des yang 'as ga/ N+Did byed bye 'de ltar na/ 
94a3(rgyud): smin zhes bkyi ba ji ltar lags// lam zhes bkye ba gang lab rtse// de yid dbye ba bshad du gsol zhes zhus so// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo kyang // 'khor ba'i sems
94a4(rgyud): mas cad la// de nyid yod de smin lam med// des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// lam log pu stegs byed rnams la// de nyid yod de smin lam med// des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// dman pa nyan thos
94a5(rgyud): rgyab la// de nyid yod de spen lam med// de byer bskal pa grangs med du// dka' thub spyod pa nyon ro mongs// ma smin mdo sder zhugs rnams la//  nyid yod de sprin lam med// des na tshe gcig sangs rgya
94a6(rgyud): dkal zhes so// de nas dur khrod bdag mnges yang 'as pa// spen zhes bya ba gang la bkye// lam zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// nyon cig dur khrod bdags khyod/ 
94a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni sa d+ha'i sgra bas shes par bya'o// lam zhes bya ba'i sgrani a tha ma za'i ska las shes par bya// 'jig rten pa'i lam dang sbyang po// lus dang ga dang sebs dang gsug kyi smin smin par
94a8(rgyud): papa'i thabs// dbang bkung cho ga je snyed bstan// dang po bsnyen pa bya ba gces// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma ye// bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas nas// sa cho ga sta gon tshul bzhin bya// dang pos

94b2(rgyud): ka2// bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur// dkyil 'khor de yi nA na ru// bdud rtse lnga pa mam la bya// skab ldan slob pa der banas la// gsang ba'i dab rnams rdzogs par bskur/ 
94b3(rgyud): de ru ba thon// das kyi thos me byebs bri// wa la ldan srong ma de banag la// shes rab ye shes dbang bsngar te// gsum pa'i dbang rnapas rdzogs par badru // dkyil 'bor popo byang
94b4(rgyud): dri las rnam bzhi bar kha kre// skal ldan slob ma der bzhag pa// bzhi pa'i dbang rnangs rdzogs par bskur// dkyil 'khor de'i pho brang du// de chen bsnol ba'i khri stongs su// skal ldan slab sa dang

94b6(rgyud): na la 'bas bdu kyi da pa// dertsa bar ni bsrung bar // den pa bya ba yin cing // dngom pa bzhin du bgyu la // de nas nyan pa'i dbang rnams 'phru// de nas bshang pa'i dbang
94b7(rgyud): / dmas bcur// de nas skal ldan gang dag la// mnga' gsol sum cu rtsa lnga bya// de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyis// dbang rnams ma lu sa rdzogs par bskur// de nas dbang rdzogs gang zag de// bder gshegs
94b8(rgyud): dmapa kyi sras med te// ba kyed rab bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam// mthu stobs kro rgyal rnams dang mnyam// jo tshang nyi phra gnyis dang mnyam// dang po las can sor ba mas bkang pa rab
95a1(rgyud): // dbang bsrung gnang bam zab na// dag pa sha k+Sha ra tsa la rdzogs kyang // sleb dadon kyal yong ma rul// dngang bsrung gan nga ma mthong na// gzhan gyi yan tan kun 'chang yang // 
95a2(rgyud): shing med pa 'dra// dbang mthob par gas rtsom dang // skyid pa ma ta ma khyal 'phel ba// 'di dag phung po'i rtswa yin no// sgob na mnyes par ma byas shing // dbyang rnams zab par ma byas na// nyan pa la
95a3(rgyud): sogs rtsom pa ni// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag po mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur
95a4(rgyud): le'u sde bdun pa'o// de nas dur khrod phag mo dang // he ru ka la 'di skang zhus// sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i chos// bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum// gang
95a5(rgyud): dang gang gis grol ba lags// dug lnga sdod pa'i gang zag lnga// gang dang gang gis 'joms par byed// de nas ston pas bka' stsal te// nyon cig dur khrid bdag ma khyod// dbang po rab kyi gang dag la// rang
95a6(rgyud): bzhin na pa dag pag mo bstan// dbang po 'bring gi gang zag pa// brjod pa ska yi phag mo bstan// dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/ mtshon pa 'ang yi phag po bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas dur khrod pa
95a7(rgyud): // stod pa tshig 'degs pa// rang zhin dam pa dag pa la/  //  yongs pa// dkyibs kyi ga po skyel// zhes pa la stsogs pa zhus // ga du zing ba
95a8(rgyud): khyod// rang bzhin nyid nas dag bde/  mos kye hru la ngo ba nyid / ga pe sa drug ge rdzag sa yangs rgyab/ khrol 'bru 'dil tshom med/ brjod pa sgra la lag mod/ longs spyo bla thongs nyid/ langs spyod
95b1(rgyud): sa sku'i re ba nyid// khwa dug rnams pa'i snang ba yis// 'grub 'gyung 'di la je tshom med// mchon pa yang yi pha da/ la ba ska yi ngo bo nyid// bla drug gams pa'i steng ba yas// 'a k+Sha

95b3(rgyud): zag dang // phra dog can gyi gang zag lnga// de rnams gang dang gang gis grol zhes zhus so// de nas ston pas bkar gyul te// gti mug can gyi yang zag la/ A yaM phag mo dag
95b4(rgyud): a// gte mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms// 'dod pa gcod byed skyes su la// gsung gi zag po dbang po bstan// 'dod chags tshul gyis bad chags 'joms// the sa can gyi gang bag pa// thugs
95b5(rgyud): rishes lnga zhes ni ka kha bgyi// khrom ldan dza k+Shar bsgom// 'khor lo lnga ni nga ltar gnas/  ldan ltar bzlas// nga chag ldanar 'thung // nyams myong rngon kyang 'phru // rten ma
95b6(rgyud): thung // baM shes rdzan de kur 'phel// grangs kyi med de ji yang bzlas/ mtshan ma'i rtags ning ltar 'byung // dus kyi tshad da da ltar lags// las migs rnams ni lcing 'phrub ces zhus so// 
96a1(rgyud): chen spyod pa yongs spya // nga ba gang du ba sgrub sru dang // sa kya mi shegs rdo rje mAM// nga nyid kyi sprul chog dang // sgru ba gcig se thob pas gyur// rtogs pa'i don la goms par byed// 
96a2(rgyud): 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'job// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud du bshad // thob kyi'i ye shes rnam lnga pang // sgros bral tshas dbyings ye shes dang // me long ye shes gzugs brtan gyur// bdag
96a3(rgyud): gnyis med mnyam pa nyid// gsal la ma 'dres so sor ga// phrin las mthar byen bya ba krug// ye shes ldan da ltar ste// gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la'o// dus lnga spyod pa'i gang bag lnga// rigs ni rnams/ 
96a4(rgyud): rdza thob ste// sgros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// dgos 'dod srung b.rin chen rigs// smon gyis mags pad+ma'i rigs// sems can don grub las kyi ri bol// gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid
96a5(rgyud): da pa'i gang bag de// ye shes cho so coms nas// 'de ba skye bsku ne bas/ didzi na sang mo ba sgrub pang bya// rnas pa yung ragasung yin pas// dpangar ma sngags bsgrub pa/ 
96a6(rgyud): rtogs tshad 'char bzugs yin pas// khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya// brtan par byed pa yon tan te// ser po don grub bsgom par bya// bar chad sal ba srin las te// sna tshogs mthar phyin bsgom pa
96a7(rgyud): rims skyes pa yi meg car men// dang 'brung chul du bya// mig 'bru rnams kyi gnas zhugs ni// skye tsug pade cin lab yon/  byed sku'i mi ge / rang bzhin ce le gzugs can no// 
96b1(rgyud): ngas spyong 'khor lo na// gsung mchog le ge rnam bzhin// rang bzhin cu pa tshul du gnas// skeng ga chos kyi 'khor lon// khrugs mchog yi ge rnam bzhini// rdza yi dbyibs dang 'thun par gnas// lte bkur/ 
96b2(rgyud): ba'i 'bang yon// rten byed yon tan yi ge ba'i// de yi rang bzhin rtsa yid dbyebs// phrin las 'i ge rnam pa na// ni ma dbang drag yi le bzhi// las dang rjeb 'thun gzugs su gnas// snying pa
96b3(rgyud): thabs ni// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // bran las bzhi yi tshul du bzlas// dam tshig lnga'i bsrung tshul ne// bde chen dkar mo 'ad mchog tu// sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms// khros ma nag mo'i dang
96b4(rgyud): tu// dug cing rngu bya ba'i spyod pa bya// ser podzon grub dam cheg tu// dngos po kun la chags med bya// dmar mo sgra sgrags dang tshig tu// sla zhing bud med brten par bya// sna tshogs mthar byin dang tshig tu/
